name: En suite kamer met mezzanine in historisch centrum
description:
Super gezellige en ruime kamer met mezzanine op de 3de verdieping van een typisch Gents herenhuis gelegen nabij de bruisende Sint-Jacobs kerk in een zeer rustige straat.
De kamer is uitgerust met een heerlijk boxspring bed. Op de mezzanine hebt u een gezellige tv hoek met sofa.
De badkamer heeft een heerlijke douche, lavabo en wc.
De ideale kamer als u houdt van hoge ruimtes, trappen en houten vloeren.
Lees zeker aub de huisregels VOOR u boekt bij ons.
neighborhood_overview: Walking out of the house you will immediately see the Sint Jacobs church. This is were the amazing historical city begins. On one hand you can easily walk to all historical places like the Belfry, St Bavo cathedral, Patershol, the Count's castle. On the other hand you are just near the vibrant market places, the typical beer cafés, lovely coffee houses and both trendy restaurants and local brasseries. At the end of our street you have the Brand new Holy Food Market. Great place for foodies.
host_about:
Hallo, 

Wij zijn Annik & Kristof. 
Wij verwelkomen jullie graag in hartje Gent. 

Kristof kwam ooit in Gent studeren en was meteen verliefd op de stad.  Een heel aantal jaren later werd Annik verliefd op Kristof en kwam zo ook in Gent terecht. 

Samen proberen we van elk moment in onze stad te genieten en we vinden het steeds ook heel leuk onze gasten wegwijs te maken. 

Regelmatig trekken we toch ook samen op reis, want dat is waarschijnlijk een van de dingen die we het liefst samen doen.

name: Paparazzo - Ghent (city center)
description:
Paparazzo is a one bedroom apartment in the very city centre of Ghent. It's entirely decorated by owner & photographer Filip Naudts whose work is on show on the web.
You can buy his prints that are exposed in the apartment!

CORONA SAFE:
No contact with the host needed.
You can enter the apartment with your personal code.

Guest access
Couples or friends looking for the perfect location to visit the centre of Ghent. This place is most popular amongst art and photography lovers.
neighborhood_overview: Het appartement is gelegen in het stadscentrum.
host_about:
Born in Ghent, I grew up very nearby, in Lochristi, where I founded my own photostudio and where I still live today. Currently I'm a photographing artist, working additionally for Belgian press. In my work I focus on portraiture as I need the interaction with people. That's also why I decided to start-up this tourist apartment which is popular amongst art and photography lovers.

For more info: enter 'filip naudts' in your browser ;)

name: single room in colourfull house
description:
Single bedroom on the 2nd floor (stairs) with desk + chair, drawer, closet, wifi - close to centre, public transport, supermarkets.. The house is just outside but close to city centre, which offers tranquillity and easy access by car or public transport. You can put something in the fridge and use watercooker, but in covid times no kitchen facilities. if you want a bath towel: 5€. Kitchen can be used when you are a longtime stayer of course

name: Renovated triplex in the city centre of Ghent
description:
Renovated triplex in the city centre of Ghent, 10 minutes walking from the historic city. In a very quiet neighborhood.
On the first floor is a kitchen.
On the second floor is the living area. The sofa turns into a bed for 1 person.
On the third floor you will find a double bed for 2 persons.
2 separate toilets and a shower.

Perfect location to discover the city. Easy to reach by car. Parking possibility in the street (parking fee is 6 euro/ day). Tram is 150m away. Bus is 400m away.
Important points of interest are within walking distance.

name: Completely renovated 19th century family house
description:
Our house, completely loft-like renovated in 2017, is situated in a quiet historic neighborhood in the lovely city of Ghent. With my 2 young daughters (5 and 7 years) our house is baby/kids-friendly, and it's a great place to live: 200m² of living area, close to the city center, but still easy to travel to other places. We don't have a garden, but a big roof terrace, a park with a play ground 25m away, good access to public transport, ...

The space
I bought this house a couple of years ago, and renovated the outside of it like it used to be in the 19th century. The inside was turned around completely.

Downstairs:
- bathroom
- toilet
- kids bedroom (2 small beds)
- kids bedroom (2 foldable beds + 1 baby bed) / study room

Level 1:
- living room + dining room + kitchen

Level 2:
- master bedroom (double bed, Tempur mattresses!)
- bathroom
- roof top terrace

Note: some pictures show ca
neighborhood_overview:
Very calm neighbourhood, with a nice mixture of young families, and older people. There is a park with a play ground 25m away, good access to public transport, art deco swimming pool, ...

Inside the city of Ghent, this neighbourhood is the last one where people started to build houses. these were all workers houses. In the 19th century the famous architect Jacob Gustaaf Semey was requested to increase the appearance of the neighbourhood, hence he designed a couple of houses. Our house was one of these.

description:
The studio has a double bed, sleeper sofa, TV with Netflix, private bathroom and kitchen. There is a separate entrance and access to the shared garden (BBQ available). Easy to reach by car, public transportation or taxi. Located in a quiet area, just outside the city center (10 min by bus or bike, 3 bikes available). Walking distance of beautiful nature reserve the Bourgoyen. Close to supermarkets, bars and restaurants (brunch, lunch, diner, take away, ...).

The space
The private studio with seperate entrance includes kitchen, bathroom with shower and toilet, dubble bed, sofa(bed), TV with Netflix and entrance to the shared garden.
Two minutes walk from café with small dishes and brunch on saterday and sunday. Also walking distance from dinner take-away (Chinese food, Belgian fries, grill,...) , naturepark 'Bourgoyen' and busstop to city center(every 5min)

Guest access
You have acces to the shared garden with BBQ.
If wanted you
neighborhood_overview:
The studio is located in a quiet residential area in Brugse Poort / Rooigem, just outside the city center.
A five minute walk takes you to the unique open landscape of the Bourgoyen, which is perfect for birdwatching, walking or a run.

If you come by car, the central location has a good connection to all major highways and there is free parking in front of the studio.
If you come by train, you can reach the studio by bus and a short walk. There is a fast connection by bus to the city center and we have bikes available.

name: Family home in center of Ghent
description:
Our family house is located in the city center, just at the border of the historical center. There are a few parks and a lot of bars/restaurants. Everything in the center is on walking distance, but stil in a very quiet residential area, ideal for families (with children), couples or business travelers.

We prefer not to rent to groups... our home is locaties in a residential area and we value the good relationship we have with our neighbours.

The space
+00: entrance, dining room, playroom, place with washing machine and dryer, kitchen and city garden.

+01: Living room, bathroom and bedroom with double bed.

name: authentic spacious apartement in historic centre
description:
Huize Maeterlinck is een prachtig gerenoveerd appartement in hartje Gent. Het maakt deel uit van een groter pand dat werd gerenoveerd met oog voor detail en waar verrassende elementen een eigenzinnig geheel vormen. Dit pand was het voormalige huis van de familie Maeterlinck. Gelegen in het autovrije gebied is dit de perfecte uitvalbasis om Gent te ontdekken. Op wandelafstand van Vrijdagmarkt, Korenmarkt, Graslei en het Gravensteen en toch in een zeer rustige wandelstraat, een absolute aanrader.

The space
Appartement op 1ste verdieping
4 zeer zonnige, grote en luchtige ruimtes met originele parketvloer, open haard, smaakvol ingericht met hoogwaardige materialen afgewerkt, keuken, badkamer en groot terras. Een streling voor het oog.
neighborhood_overview:
Huize Maeterlinck ligt midden in het centrum, in autovrije zone.
Alles is op 5 minuten afstand. De straat is zeer rustig, gelegen aan de Vrijdagsmarkt... toffe cafés en bars in de buurt met alle voorzieningen voor de bewoners van het centrum.

name: Cosy studio near the historical center of Gent.

Cosy studio for 2.
We care about your health and clean the studio thoroughly after every guest. We are Corona-proof !
2 minutes walk to edge of the historical center, 10 minutes walk to the city center.
The location on the map is not correct : check location photo.

The space
You stay in a studio on the ground floor of a corner house. The owners, brother and sister lives respectively on the 1st and 2nd floor.
You have your own entrance. There is a bedroom with a kingsize bed a bathroom with large shower and a desk. You have also a kitchen/livingroom with dishwasher, oven, nespresso, tv... There is free wifi.
At the end of our street starts the historic center of Ghent.

Other things to note
You can leave your car in our street. 6 euro/24 hours. Free parking on sundays and holidays.
host_about:
Hi, I am Hilde.
I am a ceramist/potter and live with Paulus, my husband, in the countryside 15 kms from Gent. In the house in Gent lives our daughter (on the 2nd floor), who is an illustrator. On the first floor lives our son Timeau, who is a theatre director, with his girlfriend Nina, who is also an illustrator and their little dog Geertje. 
The guest studio is on the ground floor.
We'll be happy to welcoming you !

name: Cool Studio in Castle Garden...
description:
Studio Prinsenhof

We created a cosy & clean studio with little touches of Ghent art in it.
You will love the location in a very quiet cobblestone street in the old garden of Charles the Emperor (Prinsenhof).
All the highlights of our beautiful city (castle, canals, restaurants, shopping..) are within a few minutes walking distance.
You will feel at home in our light studio, sleeping under the roof of the mezzanine or relaxing after a day in the city.
Welcome!

The space
The studio has a mezzanine where 2 people can sleep very comfortable. The living room area also has a foldout sleeping bed for 2 guests. There is an eating area for 4 people and a small kitchen with all necessary appliances. The bathroom has a nice shower.
neighborhood_overview:
Just around the corner of the bustling city centre you find the medieval cobblestone streets of Prinsenhof. It's a very quiet neighbourhood where you can almost smell the history of Charles the Emperor.
The Gravensteen castle, Graslei, Korenlei, Korenmarkt, Veldstraat... are all very closeby (max 5 minutes walking).
host_about:
We both grew up in and around Ghent, but now we live on the outskirts of the city, with our 2 kids.....into the Wild.
We both work in Ghent. Daan has a silkscreen printing company and Eline works as a teamcoach for the government.
Because we love Ghent so much, we want to share this unique place with you! The studio is situated in the historic centre nearby all the highlights. Enjoy!

description:
Airbnb 'Post3' is een ruim tweeslaapkamerappartement op de eerste verdieping met groot terras en gratis parkeerplaats in het centrum van historisch Gent. Vele bezienswaardigheden, restaurants, bars en winkels op loopafstand. Ruime living met open keuken voorzien van alle comfort. Twee slaapkamers met dubbel bed. Badkamer met bad, douche en toilet. Gastentoilet in de hal. De parkeerplaats is afgesloten en binnen het gebouw. De building beschikt over een lift.

The space
Een groot raam geeft uit op het terras en brengt heel veel licht en sfeer in de leefruimte en keuken.

Other things to note
Ook al ligt het appartement in hartje Gent, op 2 minuten lopen van het centrum, is de straat rustig. We vragen dan ook de nachtrust van de buren te respecteren.
neighborhood_overview: Eens geparkeerd is alles bereikbaar te voet.

name: Room in Ghent - calm, nearby city centre
description:
Welcome to a private room located within walking distance from the city centre. Public transport, bus (nr 3) ánd train, is nearby.
In our nice multicultural neighbourhood you will find several restaurants, supermarkets, bakeries and parks.
The room is equipped with a large double bed, a desk and all basic needs. An extra single mattress or baby bed can be added (to bring yourself).
We share our bathroom with you.
Breakfast can be provided.

The space
The house is being renovated bit by bit. We go for white and light.
We are: me, Joanna, my daughter Siobhán and my partner Francis.
Our purpose is not to make money. We find it nice to share our room with people who look for something more personal or more quiet than most regular options.

Guest access
As a guest you're welcome in the whole house, though we only really share the bathroom. The other rooms we like to keep for our own private use. If you'd like to
neighborhood_overview:
Within walking distance you find three different child friendly parks.
Also nearby are supermarkets, restaurants, bakery's and pubs.
You can walk and cycle along the canal or in the Nature Park Gentbrugse Meersen.

name: La pensée sauvage (A wild thought)
description:
Spacious appartment in the historical centre + private parking included. There is also a private infrared sauna in the building (Health mate). The sauna is not included in the room price. For prices and reservation see more details on the pamphlet in the apartment.

The space
The appartment is on the first floor and has a big lightfull living room and a private terrace. There is one bedroom , a kitchen where you can prepare food, a bathroom with 2 sinks, a bath tub and a seperate shower. The toilet is seperated. In the living room there is a possibility to sleep with two people in 2 sofa beds.

Guest access
The appartment and terrace is private for you.
The hall and stairs are shared with us.

Other things to note
We provide toilet paper, sheets, towels, hand soap, and other basic stuff.
The city tax is not included in the lodging price. This tax is 3 euro per person per night (+18 years)
neighborhood_overview:
In walking distance you can find imposing historical buildings and places, museums, shopping districts and a lot of cool pubs and restaurants.
Wherever you look, in the almost car free centre of the city, you see buildings or monuments with a story. A castle of more then a thousand years old, 3 midevil towers , the most beautiful rows of old houses seperated by the ' leie' (river). A real eyecatcher at evenings.
host_about: Levensgenieters,  reizigers

name: Modern appartement with park-view
description:
Our appartement is situated in a quiet and green area in Gentbrugge, next to a park, 10 minutes by bus from the city center (or 40 minutes by feet) . It is part of a modern building, has a large livingroom, a kitchen, two sleeping rooms, a bathroom, a toilet and a balcony.

The space
The appartement is 90 m². It has a large livingroom with a sofa, television and a dining table, a kitchen with a dishwasher, microwave, oven, fridge, freezer and cooking plate, two sleeping rooms, a bathroom with a rain shower and two sinks, a separated toilet, a hall and a small balcony on the south-side of the building. There's a lot of light in the living room.

Guest access
The total appartment - all the rooms - are available for guests

name: Your own loft in city centre with indoor parking
description:
I offer a very spacious and luminous loft in a former 20th century textile factory within walking distance of the vibrant city centre.
The loft is +/- 120m² and is situated on the first floor and completely available to you.

The space
On the first floor there is the living area with a large L-shaped couch (can serve as an extra double bed), a wood stove, a fully equipped kitchen and a toilet. There is fast WIFI and a television. The floors are fitted with a floor-heating system which keep the loft nice and warm during winter.
The winding stairs go to the second floor where there is the bedroom with a box spring double bed, bathroom with two sinks and a walk-in shower and a second toilet.
On the third floor there is a sunny roof top terrace where you can have dinner and have a barbecue in summer.

Guest access
The whole loft and every space within is available to you

Other things to note
I offer you the
neighborhood_overview:
At the end of the Molenaarsstraat you will find the 'Prinsenhof'.
In the 14th century, the Castle of the Counts was no longer a suitable residence for the Count of Flanders. Lodewijk van Male, moved to Hof ten Walle, a town house in this neighbourhood. It was here that the Emperor Charles V was born in 1500.
host_about: A former banker who decided to quit his job and travel the world as a backpacker. Currently back in Belgium planning the next big travel to New Zealand. As a born and raised Ghentian I am very proud of my city and all of it that it has to offer. I enjoy to receive guests from all over the world in my beautiful city and make them feel at home in my warm historic loft.

name: Charming 3 Bedroom on the Canal Near the City
description:
We are a 20 minute walk to the Gravensteen (center of town) or a 5 min bus ride. The neighborhood is quiet, with ample (paid) street parking (2-3 euros per 24H) paid by bank card. Have a cup of coffee on the balcony, while watching the bikers passing by. The #3 bus is behind our block. After a long day exploring Gent, relax with a movie on our projector!

The space
We are on the 3rd floor, there is an elevator up to our place. The kitchen is fully stocked with pots and pans and all the utensils you'll need to cook a delicious meal! We have a dishwasher too for the aftermath.
Please enjoy any of the food products or spices that are in our cabinets.
We provide coffee, tea and sugar. There is a projector in the living room, enjoy Netflix/YouTube or DVD’s from our Apple TV and PS3, no cable TV provided.
Our place has balconies on the front side of the building and the back. 2 of the 3 bedrooms have balcony access.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet but the street behind us (Bevrijdingslaan) offers a supermarket, fruit/vegetable markets and restaurants.
host_about: I love to travel and do so with my husband, Dieter. We treat your home just like we would our own and love to live like locals! We now also host our home in Gent!

Beautiful cosy 1 br penthouse with big terraces. Nice views from the top floor (4th), right next to great places to eat/shop and right by the city centre. name: Bed Resort - Belfort
description:
Bed Resort - Belfort is een design appartement, gelegen in het hart van het historische Gent-centrum, met zicht op de Sint-Jacobskerk aan het einde van de Belfortstraat.

Op wandelafstand van station Gent-Dampoort, dicht bij alle toeristische attracties, fietsverhuur en zeer goede verbinding met het openbaar vervoer.

Honger of dorst? Vlakbij vindt u tal van horeca zaken en supermarkten.

Het appartement is voorzien van alle modern comfort: wifi, kabeltelevisie, volledig ingerichte keuken.

The space
Bed Resort - Belfort is een volledig gerenoveerd design-appartement in een residentieel gebouw (respect voor onze buren is een must). De maximale capaciteit is 2 volwassenen.

Er is 1 slaapkamer met 2 éénpersoonsbedden (die ook samen gevoegd kunnen worden tot één groot tweepersoonsbed), een volwaardige keuken, grote eettafel en zithoek met TV, een badkamer met toilet, lavabo en douche, WiFi en kabeltelevisie.

De r
neighborhood_overview:
Aan marktjes en ander vertier zeker geen tekort hier in het levendige centrum. Van vrijdag- t.e.m. zondagvoormiddag is er wekelijks Prondelmarkt (tweedehands en brocante) aan de Sint-Jacobskerk, op zondag Bloemenmarkt op de Kouter, lekker eten inkopen op de Vrijdagmarkt ...

Restaurantjes en snackbars bij de vleet, winkels en boetieks vlakbij! Ben je op zoek naar een leuke stadswandeling dan verwijzen we je graag naar visit gent. Een selectie van onze favoriete wining en dining spots, stadsplan en andere toeristische informatie vindt u in de infomap op het appartement.
host_about: Ik ben zelf centrum bewoner van de stad Gent. Tevens ben ik zaakvoerder van café Charlatan op de Vlasmarkt, op 50m van Band en Bed Resort.

name: ATELIER 7 Unique place in city center
description:
This former artist's studio lies hidden in a quiet little sidestreet in the historic city center.
It is recently (2018) completely renovated with respect for it's original atmosphere.
A south oriented garden surrounded by big trees lies behind the studio.
The house stands almost completely free in it surroundings so there is zero noise from neighbours.
It offers you the perfect cocoon in the middle of the vibrant city.
neighborhood_overview:
This place couldn't be better located!

In the historic city center in the middle of all the best breakfastbars, restaurants, shops, museums...
Every sunday there's a bookmarket and flowermarket around the corner.

The small peacefull side street and south oriented garden offers ultimate privacy and silence

name: Room in Ghent, Belgium
description:
A cozy quiet private room for 1 on the first (2) floor of our small family townhouse (1872), located in the central area of Ghent. Bathroom and kitchen shared with us (Maria and Nicolas). Welcome!

The space
Clean comfortable room 14 m2. With your own small fridge, electric kettle and tableware. There are also piano and guitar.

name: Penthouse centrum Gent
description:
Luxueuze duplex penthouse in centrum van Gent, op wandelafstand van historische binnenstad. Bruisende buurt met tal van restaurants en cafés. Bijzondere afwerking, ruime open Arclinea keuken met professionele inrichting, inbouw gashaard, instapdouche, parket, vloerverwarming, airco, Sonos soundsystem enz. Prachtig zicht vanuit alle ruimtes op de Gentse binnenstad. Verschillende ruime terrassen. Voor de liefhebbers biedt dit een uitzonderlijke mix van design, architectuur en luxe.

The space
Op het vierde verdiep kom je binnen in de penthouse, de eerste ruimte omvat de open keuken met eetruimte, haardvuur en terras over de volledige breedte. Het keukeneiland beschikt over een bar gedeelte met vier krukken zodat er tijdens het koken een leuke interactie is.

De gang bevat een ruime dressing, de trap, het toilet en toegang naar de badkamer en twee slaapkamers.

De eerste slaapkamer heeft een dubbel bed van 160cm op 200cm met dimbaar licht, individ

name: The Lighthouse Atelier
description:
Welcome to our charming apartment in the historical city centre of Gent. Located in the city's old beguinage, the apartment is perfect for city trippers with just a 6-minute walk to the centre. The self-catering apartment is spacious, full of light, and has a unique bohemian flair. The bedroom is peacefully situated off- street, with a quirky en-suite bathroom. Tram 4 from Gent St. Pieters Station stops at our doorstep, making it an ideal base to additionally visit Bruges, Brussels or Antwerp.

The space
The Lighthouse Atelier is a unique experience where guests have the opportunity to stay in Leen's eclectic glass art studio.

Guest access
Update: guests used to have acces to the garage at the back of our house but this is - unfortunately - no longer possible

There are ample wonderful bars and restaurants in the neighbourhood.

neighborhood_overview: Our place is located in one of the three authentic beguinages in Ghent. No longer walled it has become part of the city with a unique atmosphere and quaint little streets and houses. It is now more than ever a place of religious tolerance since it has three different churches: Roman Catholic, Orthodox and Protestant.
host_about:
I am from Belgium, married to Matt from South Africa. We are living in Ghent since a couple of years with our 7 year old son, Lennard.

We love music, art, dancing, cooking, traveling & gardening.

A Medieval grain mill (13th century) renovated to a comfortable loft with all modern amenities, in the very center of the lovely old town of Ghent, looking out onto the river Lys.

Gravensteen castle, St Baafs cathedral and the belfry tower are just a few minutes walk away, and so are the cosy restaurants and cobbled streets of Patershol neighborhood and some of the finest museums the city has to offer (MIAT, Huis Van Alijn, Design Museum, ...).

description:
We have renovated our attic into a studio flat. It has a kitchenette, bathroom, sitting area, and a bed on the mezzanine. People from all backgrounds are welcome. Possibility to accomodate 3rd person upon request.

The space
Recently renovated. The dinette (14m2), sitting area (14m2) and mezzanine are connected areas. It has a separate bathroom (5m2) which includes a shower, toilet and washbasin. The dinette includes a fridge, electric kettle, and electric hob. There is a double bed (140cm) on the mezzanine. Guest access
The front door, hallway and staircase are shared with our home. The studio is located on the second floor (attic).
neighborhood_overview: Ledeberg has its distinct charm as the smallest and most densely populated suburb of Ghent. Being located closely to the historical city centre of Ghent, it is an ideal starting pont for visitors. The neighbourhood is multicultural with many young families. Shops and supermarkets are at walking distance. The Sunday market has a convivial atmosphere. The nature reserve Gentbrugse Meersen is at a 5 minutes cycling distance.

name: Stylish Loft in Charming Townhouse in City Center
description:
*The 4 single beds have been replaced by two double beds, pictures will be updated soon*

- Beautiful townhouse with grand staircase, high ceilings and hardwood floors. Completely renovated in the past year.
- Large south-facing balcony
- Excellent location in the city center (Gravensteen). Everything within walking distance.
- Great public transport to train stations (Gent-Sint-Pieters & Gent-Dampoort) and business centers (Dok Noord, Flanders Expo, Gent Zuid...)

The space
You will be staying in a beautiful 18th century townhouse that has been completely renovated in the past year. The high ceilings, large windows and hardwood floors make the place feel very spacious with a lot of natural light. The grand wooden staircase takes you back to the luxury days of Ghentian nobility...

You also have a large, sunlit, south-facing balcony all to yourself!

In the past year, the building has been completely renovated to the la
neighborhood_overview:
Experience Ghent from it's beautiful historic center! Located right next to the Castle Of The Counts (aka Het Gravensteen), all the city's treasures are within walking distance:
- Veldstraat and Korenmarkt for shopping
- Korenmarkt and Vlasmarkt for going out
- Patershol and Graslei for restaurants and outside terrasses
- Lievekaai and Prinsenhof for a romantic walk
- A lot of museums (Design museum, Huis Van Alijn, Kunsthal Gent), medieval churches, cathedrals, belfry... around the corner

All the while you are in a quiet neighbourhood without much street noise. You'll be hard-pressed to find a better location to explore the city from!

Great location right in the historic city center, situated on 100 meter of the main shopping street @ Ghent ! Renovated clean duplex apartment. For business or leisure, third floor whit view on the krook and the Gerard Duivelsteen
So it’s the best place to be in Ghent ;)

name: B&B Schopenhauer in the historical centre of Ghent
description:
B&B Schopenhauer is situated in the picturesque historical centre of Ghent and consists of two beautiful suites with both a different atmosphere.

The Schopenhauer suite - In this romantically red suite you will be surrounded by art from young talents as well as more established artists. Spacious and bright.

The Athma Room - Time to relax, beautiful room with private hammam. This room has a little private garden with seating area and outside shower.

name: Newly renovated house close to the center of Ghent
description:
> Renovated house near the center of Ghent
> 5-minte walk to Ghent-Dampoort train station & the intl. bus station (Flixbus)
> All modern comfort
> Ground Floor: entry hall, toilet, open kitchen/living space & storage area with washer/dryer
> 1st floor: first bathroom with walk-in rainshower, double sink, bath & toilet
> 2nd floor: first bedroom with queensize bed, storage area, second bathroom with walk-in rain shower, double sink &toilet
> 3d floor: second bedroom with queen size bed

The space
The house is part of a renovation project dating from 2015 which turned an office and warehsoue facility of a wholesaler in electrical equipment into 3 modern houses with loft style high sealing and open living spaces on the bottom floor. The house you are renting is the left one of the three when facing the façade.

All aplliances and furniture date from that renovation so they up-to-date with modern living.

The house
neighborhood_overview: Very cozy and quiet neighborhood but still close to the center. A 15-minute walk gets you to the center of Ghent.
host_about: Short introduction of yours truly...Born in the eighties, love to travel both professionally as in my free time, of which I don't have enough, like sports, music and movies, always up for a evening of wine and dine, proud Belgian working in retail.

name: Whale
description:
An old horsestable turned around in a very cosy place to stay. There is room for one couple or friends. It is 5-10 minutes away from Gent, by car. You can use our kitchen, living and dining area as well as our cosy outside terrace for the hot summer nights.

Guest access
Optional we can put a bed for your child in your bedroom or downstairs.

name: Cosy studio at the Opera
description:
Lovely 1 bedroom studio right in the city center of Ghent with a view of the Opera house. Located at 250m from the historical center of Ghent and a 15 minute walk from the central station.

The space
The apartment is located right in the city center right across the Opera of Ghent! It is easily accessible with public transport. If you walk 2 minutes through the shopping street you will find yourself standing between 2 of the iconic church towers of Ghent. Important to note is that the apartment is on the fourth floor without an elevator.

Guest access
The whole apartment is yours! You will have access to a spacious living room with a nice couch, and lots of light. There is also a big table where you can work or have breakfast. There is a bluetooth speaker if you like to have some background music. Furthermore there is a nice 2 person bed, a separate toilet and a nice kitchen where you can prepare some basic recipes.

PS: don't for
neighborhood_overview: Ghent is pretty small and we are right in the center but easily accessible with public transportation and by car! (In January 2017 Ghent changed a lot of the streets so make sure your GPS is updated!)
host_about: Ik ben gastvrij, hou van heerlijk koken en tijdens de week baat ik de "Olé Pistolet" uit, een super gezellig ontbijtzaakje!

name: HELENA's Cabin
description:
"An island in Ghent, sleeping on the water!"
Are you looking for something unique on the water, a touch of history touch combined with a panoramic view on the 'Handelsdok' - in full development.

Come and stay on our ship & enjoy on and off the water!
#alwaysbetteronthewater

The space
* Upstairs in the wheelhouse you have a small kitchen, ideal to warm up small dishes or to make a nice breakfast. There is a fridge, 1 hotplate and coffee/tea.
* Downstairs in the cabin you have a cozy living room with a comfortable closet bed and a bathroom alcove with a lovely bath.
* Outside, on the aft deck you can enjoy the sun and people strolling by.
* In the summer you can use our kayak.
neighborhood_overview: 'Helena's Captain's Cabin is located in the future neighbourhood 'De Nieuwe Dokken' (The New Docks) in the city’s harbour with the concrete plant and the cranes as historical beacons, nearby Dampoort station and close to the beauty of the Centre of Ghent.

name: Cosynest: your home in Ghent
description:
Cosy and light house where you’ll feel right at home. Outside there's a spacey terrace and a city garden (= work in progress!). The bedroom on the top floor has a double bed. The other room has a single bed (can be converted into a double on request). There is a spacious bathroom with toilet, bathtub, shower and washing machine for you to use. The dining table connects the kitchen and living room in one homey place. You can use the stove, oven, dishwasher and all other electrical appliances.

The space
I think our newly built house will give you the comfort of a true Home while staying in Ghent. It has everything you need and more. We have an easy bus connection and are located nearby the train station (Ghent Dampoort) so you can visit Bruges, Brussels or Antwerp from here as well.

Guest access
You have access to all rooms: the ground floor (bathroom, kitchen, dining and joint living room) the terrace / and of course the bedrooms on the firs
neighborhood_overview:
There’s tons of little day/nightshops and kebap places, but there are also some nice bars and restaurants in the neighborhood:

— Coffee/Brunch/Lunch —
Clouds in my coffee
Ma & Ik
Wald

— Fine Dining Restaurants —
Alberte

— Bars/Pub (dinner & drinks) —
Café Botèco
Café De Roos

— Supermarkets —
Colruyt: big, cheap, around the corner
Proxy Delhaize: cozy neighborhood supermarket.

The house is just on the edge of the city, there’s a bus every 6’ during the day that will take you to the historical city centre in 10’ or less.

• TIP •
If you want to see a beautiful movie of Ghent, you should look up “Ghent in 2 minutes”.

name: GUSTAV's HOUSE. A trendy spot to work, love & play
description:
GUSTAV's House.
A renovated (2018), fully furnished, well situated, cosy and trendy house, next to the beautiful river Leie, with spacious private garden, sunny terrace and private parking (2 cars). 6 bikes available. BBQ. Stay in a quiet and green 'hot spot'. Wake up with bird-songs, feel @ home, relax, work or play ... and discover Ghent within 10 minutes by car, bike or rent a boat next door (in summer months). Close to Bruges, Antwerp & Brussels. Enjoy !

The space
GUSTAV’s features & comfort ? Free WiFi. LCD TV. Play your own music on our surround system (sonos). Hairdryer. Bed sheets and towels. Laundry facilities. Iron & ironing board. Vacuum cleaner. Cleaning service. Baby’s things. ‘Pleasure box’

GUSTAV likes cooking. Fridge. Multifunctional oven and microwave. Kettle & coffee-machine (senseo)
Dishwasher. Mixer. Waffle maker. Toaster. Comprehensive set of cutlery, dishes, glasses ...

Guest access
Enjoy the enti
neighborhood_overview: Supermarket, bakery (a very good one !), butcher, ATM-machines, pharmacy, lingeriestore ;-), pubs, restaurant, ... all within a 100 meter walk. Go relaxing in the nearby and biggest nature reserve 'Bourgoyen-Ossemeersen' or go for a walk along the magnificent river Leie.
host_about: Traveller. Explorer. Off the beaten path-adventures

A fully furnished apartment styled by Atelier Ecru, an interior design store annex guesthouse. We have 1 apartment for rent. The Super Kingsize Organic boxspring, in the separate bedroom with en suit bathroom, is a dream to sleep in. This apartment has an open, high ceiling living/dining room and equipped kitchen. We stand for durable subtle luxury. A place to ground.

One secured parking space is available at the backdoor.

Other things to note
The apartment is situated on the groundfloor of a city mansion, please respect the neighbors. No party's allowed. No smoking inside the apartment.

name: Spacious room - private bathroom near Ghent
description:
Bright, cosy bedroom in villa located in quiet neighborhood in Zwijnaarde / 5km from the centre of Ghent.

Offers: 1x bedroom (with double bed and sitting area), 1x private bathroom (washbasin, shower, bath, toilet), 1x roof terrace.

Private parking.

The space
Bedroom:
- Double bed (1.60m), bedside tables, seating area with table and chairs, wardrobe.
- Bedroom can be completely darkened.
- Room has access to roof terrace.

Private bathroom:
- bath, shower, washbasin and toilet
- towels and soap are provided

We provide water and a small "tea kitchen" for you.

Guest access
Fully equipped kitchen (oven, dishwasher, induction hob, kettle, coffee machine) available on the ground floor.
Limited space in the fridge.

Other things to note
No smoking and no pets allowed.

name: Hostel Sport Gent voor groepen vanaf 8 personen
description:
Moderne hostel met 8 kamers met telkens 2 stapelbedden (plaats voor 32 personen) voor groepen vanaf 8 personen die voor een sportieve of culturele activiteit naar Gent komen. Twee sanitaire ruimtes, 1 voor mannen, 1 voor vrouwen. Relaxruimte met zetel en televisie. Kleine ruimte voor ontbijt, maar deze ruimte is niet geschikt om er met grote groepen te zitten. Uitzicht over de Watersportbaan in Gent. Vlak bij het centrum van Gent.

The space
Eén ruimte met tafel en stoelen, frigo, waterkoker, ... waar je ontbijt kunt maken, maar niet met grote groepen kunt zitten.
8 kamers met telkens twee stapelbedden (32 bedden in totaal).
Twee sanitaire ruimtes, één voor mannen, één voor vrouwen.
Mogelijkheid tot het huren van een lakenpakket voor € 5 extra per persoon (te betalen bij aankomst). (als je geen lakens huurt, vragen wij een slaapzak, kussensloop en onderlaken mee te brengen)

Our charming duplex is a spacious (100 m²) two-bedroom apartment with a cosy roof-top terrace (40 m²), located at walking distance from the historic city centre. On the first floor you will find a large kitchen, comfortable bathroom and the first bedroom. The second bedroom and living room are located on the second floor, which also gives access to the terrace. The terrace is equipped with outdoor furniture, all set to give a finishing touch to your Ghent visit!

- The second bedroom (upper floor) has a single and a double (Queen size) bed;

name: Cosy house in historical heart of Ghent
description:
Our beloved home is only a few streets away from the central ´Gravensteen´ and ´Korenmarkt´, close to all shops and restaurants. Escape to the historical center of Ghent in a small house in the ´Begijnhof´or Holy Corner of St-Elizabeth and enjoy the calm and quiet after a day in the bustling city.

The space
We will be happy to welcome you into our private home. We live on a cobbled street in a charming and tranquil neighbourhood. It is a cosy getaway for solotravelers or couples who are looking to stay in an authentic 50 sq meters maisonnette.

The ground floor has a living room with a low dining and lounge table. The old fireplace does not work anymore, but it still looks pretty, lit by some candles. On the same floor, there is also a kitchenette, a restroom and hallway. On the first floor, you will find a cosy attic bedroom with double sized bed and bathroom with toilet, sink and only bath tub (please be aware there is no shower cabin or curtain to s
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is called ´het Begijnhof´of St. Elisabeth, a charming and quiet place to enjoy or stroll around.

name: Quiet family house in a unique car-free street
description:
Our house is situated in a quiet, green, car-free street. We have a little garden and roof terrace. In summer time children play outside and there's a unique atmosphere. We have lot's of supermarkets nearby, a superbe café where you can have a drink and something to eat. It's a 15 min. walk to get to the city centre. There's a bus nearby or bikes at your disposal. Our house is perfect for couples or families. We only rent the place when we're out ourselves so you have to live with our stuff ;-)

The space
Our house has everything you need: a good kitchen, a nice livingroom, a piano, tv, a bathroom with bath and rainshower, a little garden with bbq, swings for the children, toys for children, bikes to use, a quiet roof terrace and a little library.
We have a cat, Winnie. She likes to be fed, but she can stay outside in spring/summer/autumn if you have a cat allergy.

Guest access
Guests can use al spaces.

Other things to not
neighborhood_overview: We live about 15 minutes walk (2 km) from the city centre. Our neighbourhood is calm, has lots of supermarkets and a nice café around the corner. There's a natural domain in 5 min. walking and a swimming pool nearby.

name: Inge's Studio in centre Ghent
description:
Welcome in my spacious studio in the historic centre of Ghent. The train station of Ghent Dampoort is nearby (a 13 min walk). The studio of 50m2 is equipped with a living area with a convertible couch/bed and a big double bed. There is a kitchenette with fridge, microwave, coffeemaker, juicer,... There is a private bathroom with shower, toilet and sink. Perfect for a couple + 1 or 2 persons. Close to public transport. You can park in the street or in public parking Vrijdagsmarkt (both paying).

The space
Mooie studio in rustige straat in centrum Gent. De Vrijdagmarkt is in het oudste deel van de stad en is op 700m wandelen. Er zijn een aantal mooie ontbijtgelegenheden in de buurt. Op aanvraag en tegen betaling kan ik voor ontbijt zorgen, een wasje draaien of was drogen. De studio omvat een zitgedeelte met slaapsofa, een kitchenette (frigo, microgolf, koffiezet, sap-pers,..) en een slaapgedeelte met ruim dubbel bed. De badkamer met WC, douche en lavabo is privaat v
neighborhood_overview:
De studio is gelegen in het oudste deel van Gent, op 700m van de vrijdagsmarkt, de oudste markt van de stad. Ook het Patershol met zijn talrijke restaurantjes is binnen diezelfde afstand bereikbaar.
Er is overal aansluiting op de bussen van De Lijn en het treinstation Gent-Dampoort is op 13min wandelen.

The studio is located in the oldest section of Ghent, on 700m from the Vrijdagsmarkt, the oldest market in the city. The Patershol, which houses countless restaurants, is within the same distance.
There are bus stations for public transport everywhere and the station of Gent-Dampoort is just a 13-minute walk.
host_about:

I love dancing (Lindy Hop) and sailing.

The space
The place you will book is a town house in a quiet one-way residential street.

The house itself is 120 years old but recently renovated. We take pride in being climate neutral: our energy is produced by our own solar panels, and the natural gas for heating is offset by planting trees.

Also there's super fast WiFi and a high quality Sonos speaker system for you to use as well as a Chromecast enabled TV. Play anything from Spotify, Netflix and Disney+.

Guest access
You have a fully equipped kitchen, living room, two bedrooms and
neighborhood_overview:
Book this house in a super relaxed residential neighbourhood with low crime rates. Kids play on the streets all the time and traffic is limited. You see a very mixed kind of population here. Every demographic is represented. Everyone has a lot of respect for each other.

name: Brand-new, trendy apartment, sublimely located!
description:
The apartment is located at the heart of Ghent, right next to the gorgeous Portus Ganda. It's brand-new (build in 2017), trendy and full of light. The apartment is easily reachable by public transport and car. There is an underground parking spot available if desired.

The space
The apartment has a spacious bedroom with a double bed, a bathroom with shower and a separate toilet. There is also a separate storage room with a washing and drying machine that you can use. The living and dining area are bright and spacious and the kitchen is fully equipped, including a dishwasher. There is a sunny terrace of about 10m2 with a nice view on the courtyard. Bath towels, shampoo and soap are provided, as well as television and WiFi.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in the heart of Ghent, right at the gorgeous historic site: Portus Ganda. The historic center is easily reached by foot. Shops, restaurants  and nightlife are readily available. The apartment is part of a nice, luxurious building with no night noise or disturbances of any kind.
host_about: I am Charlotte, a 30-year old, happy girl, living in Ghent and enjoying living and working in Ghent to the fullest. I am living together with my boyfriend in my own apartment in the city-center. I have travelled a lot with Airbnb before and I've only had amazing experiences so far. That's why I decided to start hosting myself. I am most happy to share my lovely apartment (yes I really adore it :)), with others as I think it is the perfect place to stay when in Ghent. Looking forward to hosting you!

name: Cosy 3-bedroom apartment, nearby the train station
description:
Welcome in our Cocoon!

- The apartment is cosy, modern and still quite spacious
- Conveniently located near the train station
- The kitchen is very well equipped and has everything you might need
- Only a 10min. walk to the city centre
- You will be able to self check-in yourself upon arrival
- We do have neighbours that appreciate their nice and quiet; because of this we prefer not to host big groups of 'party animals' at our place
- No groups of young friends/students allowed, apologies

The space
The appartement is on the second floor of the building and has three floors itself.

On the first floor we have a living room with Smart TV (no digital TV but you can watch Netflix with your account), a dining area and a kitchen + a separate toilet. Outside is a terrace.

In the living area is a sofa bed.

On the second floor, you can find two bedrooms and a bathroom with shower and extra toilet.

name: EXCLUSIVE: Charming Guesthouse in Ghent
description:
This 17th century townhouse is the perfect holiday house for your family, friends or colleagues. It's located in one of the most picturesque neighbourhoods in the heart of Ghent. (5min walk from the city centre!)

Our guesthouse has everything you might need:
- 2 private parking spots available for €10 / booked night / car
- a fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances
- 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms
- a stunning rooftop view
- a city guide

Read our amazing reviews!

Instagram: @friday.gent

The space
Welcome in our guesthouse, Friday!

Friday is the perfect vacation rental: a fully furnished holiday house for up to 8 people. We’ve renovated this beautiful 17th century town house with a lot of care. You’ll experience all the modern comfort while still feeling its unique & authentic charm. The house is bright, comfortable and ideal for your family, friends or colleagues.

PLEASE NOTE:
neighborhood_overview: Our guesthouse is situated in 'Het Prinsenhof', a medieval gem in the historic city centre of Ghent.  ‘Het Prinsenhof’ or Prince’s Court was a grand castle, birthplace of Emperor Charles V (16th century). The neighbourhood is super charming and above all quiet and calm. We are 5 minutes away from the famous 'Gravensteen' castle and 'De Graslei'. There are plenty of nice coffee bars, restaurants and supermarkets within walking distance.
host_about:
Hi, 

I'm Marie and I grew up in the historical centre of Ghent. 
Now I live with my little family just outside of the city. 

I still love wandering through this hidden gem. 
I'm sure you'll love it too!

You'll find plenty of places to eat and to do in my Guidebook. 

Welcome! 

Marie

name: Gezellige loft in centrum Gent met privé terras!
description:
Onze gezellige loft is erg geschikt voor rustige koppels of gezinnen met 1 of 2 kinderen.
De loft ligt pal in het centrum van Gent, in een autovrije straat naast de Kouter. Onder de Kouter is een grote overdekte publieke parking die 24/24 open is.
De open structuur van de loft geeft een gevoel van ruimte terwijl de badkamer (met deur!) voor de nodige privacy zorgt. Er is ook een uniek dakterras met zicht op de 3 torens van Gent.
De loft ligt op de derde verdieping en er is geen lift aanwezig.

Other things to note
Deze loft is absoluut niet geschikt voor feestvierders:
er zijn meerdere appartementen in het huis en nachtlawaai kan absoluut niet worden getolereerd.
Omdat de loft op de bovenste verdieping ligt is het er aangenaam stil terwijl je toch middenin de stad zit.
Ideaal voor mensen die graag een beetje rust opzoeken en respect hebben voor de nachtrust van anderen.
host_about:
Ik vind het erg belangrijk dat onze huurders zich heel erg welkom voelen in onze loft.
Gent is erg gezellig en ik geef graag tips en uitleg zodat uw verblijf aangenaam en comfortabel verloopt.

name: Cozy Green Apartment in Historic Center of Ghent
description:
Hello there and welcome to Ghent! The apartment is located in a calm street in the middle of the historical center of Ghent. In fact, the house itself is a part of it. The building's origins go back to the 14th century and the interior has numerous original 19th century elements such as ceiling, fireplaces and hardwood floors. The iconic must-see churches, cathedral, town hall, belfry, museums and much more are literally around the corner, as are dozens of restaurants and small bars.

The space
The apartment is located on the 1st floor. It has a private bathroom with shower and toilet, a small kitchen, diner table, sitting area and a double bed. There is a small balcony overseeing the street.

Guest access
Guests can use the entrance and hallway which give direct access to the apartment.

Other things to note
I've been trying to keep as much of the authentic architectural elements in place while at the same time provi
neighborhood_overview: The house in located in a somewhat forgotten street, even for locals. That makes it very calm and quiet. 200m on our right you'll bump into the busiest shopping street of Ghent, 500m to our left you're at the town hall and belfry. There's even a shortcut through the 'Werregarenstraat' also known as 'the Grafitti-Street', the only place in the city where it's legal for artist to make spray-paint murals. And there's not a stone  left uncovered. The 'Vlasmarkt' and 'Patershol' areas around the corner are known for their many restaurants and bars. As much as I've tried, there are still many I haven't visited myself
host_about: Hello I'm PJ! I've been living in Ghent for as long as I can remember, I've grown up here and have always loved its ancient buildings, small streets and vibrant social life. Although it's a fairly small city, its cultural and gastronomical opportunities never seizes to amaze me.

name: 'The Boutique' Studio, free CoffeeHouse Breakfast
description:
Charming recently renovated studio with wooden floors and high ceilings. Located on a quiet corner, 5m walk from the centre of town.
FREE BREAKFAST included (coffee, juice, croissant) in the coffee house below.
Flexible self check- in after 3pm.
Bicycle storage available in the ground floor garage, underground public car park nearby (150m). 20m from the central train station, the perfect base to explore Gent and other cities!!

Guest access
It's a private studio. No access to other spaces in the building, expect of course, to the coffee house.

Other things to note
Enjoy a perfect start of the day before you start strolling around the city: we offer a free breakfast (coffee, juice, croissant)!

Gasten kunnen een ontbijt (koffie, sapje, croissant) nuttigen in het koffiehuis op het gelijkvloers! Geniet van een perfecte start van de dag voordat je de stad gaat verkennen...
neighborhood_overview:
‘Asking citizens of Ghent what they think of their city is a pointless exercise: you’ll find only unanimous love. And with good reason. Ghent is one of Europe’s greatest discoveries - small enough to feel cosy but big enough to stay vibrant. It has enough medieval frivolity to create a spectacle but retains a gritty industrial edge that keeps things ‘real’. Tourists remain surprisingly thin on the ground, yet with its fabulous canalside architecture, wealth of quirky bars and some of Belgium’s most fascinating museums, this is a city you really won’t want to miss’ (Lonely Planet). Everything on walking distance from the appartement!

Het unieke karakter van - het historisch centrum - van Gent behoeft nog weinig reclame. Ondertussen algemeen gekend als topbestemming voor een onvergetelijke citytrip. Alles bevindt zich op wandelafstand van het appartement!
host_about:
After an academic career and being a teacher for some years, I now am the proud owner of my own coffee bar “Café Labath”. I’m spending a great deal of my time on my passion for coffee and hospitality. Doing sports, traveling, reading and riding my motorbike are some other things I love. 
At this point I have expanded the business to the point that we follow up on the entire chain from coffee tree to cup. I’m spending a lot of time in Colombia, where I visit local farmers in order to get the best coffee for the coffee bar. 
I used to travel quite adventurously myself. I still cherish these memorable moments of spontaneous hospitality and I take this as starting point to treat my guests.

Na een academische carrière en jaren in het onderwijs, ben ik sinds 2011 de trotse eigenaar van het koffiehuis “Café Labath” te Gent. 
Mijn passie voor koffie en hospitality vraagt het grootste deel van mijn tijd, daarnaast ga ik graag sporten, lezen en motorijden. Ik heb enkele avontuurlijke reizen gedaan, en de reismicrobe heeft me nog steeds niet losgelaten. Intussen spendeer ik veel tijd in Colombia, om daar “Direct Trade” koffie te zoeken. Door goede banden op te bouwen met lokale boeren, kan ik de lekkerste koffies importeren voor de koffiebar.
De memorabele momenten van spontane gastvrijheid op mijn reizen koester ik nog steeds. Die gastvrijheid heb ik steeds zelf voor ogen bij het ontvangen van mijn gasten.

name: Ground floor loft near city centre + garage
description:
Only 1 km from trainstation Gent Dampoort and 300 m from the busstop (line 3) that brings you to the city centre. Distance to the historic city centre (Vrijdagmarkt, Sint-Jacobskerk) is 2 km. You can park your car in our garage and we have free bikes for you (always check if the lights are still working to avoid a fine) .

We live in a friendly multicultural neigbourhood with many shops within walking distance (bakery, Carrefour, Aldi, Delhaize, Colruyt).

The space
We offer a very spacious and bright loft with view on a sunny garden. The loft is situated on the ground floor of our family house just outside city center. The loft has huge windows, a big sofa, flatscreen TV, Telenet digital cable, DVD player, a separate private bathroom (with walk-in shower and sink), a separate toilet, hairdryer, a fridge, microwave, coffee and tea making facilities (NO KITCHEN).

We offer you free coffee and tea. Free soap, shampoo, conditioner, towels and
neighborhood_overview: At the end of our street is a beautiful park with a tropical indoor/outdoor swimparadise with waterslides and sauna (Lago Gent).   Some trendy breakfast and lunch hotspots are just around the corner (Clouds in my coffee, Wald, Ma & ik).

name: Private new studio in art deco home-great location
description:
Recently renovated studio in our home with all privacy. Few steps from the main train station (Sint-Pieters) and public transport. Very calm street. We are Superhosts and guarantee you a pleasant and comfortable stay.

The space
This 25m2 studio has everything you need. You have your own kitchen (oven, fridge, stove, espresso), bathroom (shower and washing basin) and a separate toilet. You can relax in the sunny studio; watch some television (Google Chromecast) or surf the web with good free Wifi.

The studio is perfect for people looking for a longer stay.

Guest access
We also live in the house but the studio is completely separate. We only share the stairs.

Other things to note
We have a friendly dog, but the dog never comes in the studio and stays downstairs.
neighborhood_overview: We are in a calm neighbourhood that was built in the 1930's. You will see great houses with art deco elements. We have a very nice bakery just 5 houses down the street. There is a grocery store at the station and a couple of nice restaurants and bars. Please check out our home made city guide.
host_about:
We are a young couple living in Ghent. Simon works in EU affairs and Robin is a teacher. We have a busy schedule so we will not bother you. We are always ready for all your questions! We love to go out for dinner so can give you tips where to eat or go for drinks. 

We hope you will choose our place. We are looking forward to hosting you.

name: Cute house with a private little garden & 2 bikes
description:
In 2015 we bought this charming house for our student daughters. It is a very atmospheric place. Both, inside and outside. The house is one of the 19 small houses of 'Koer Langerode. Koer Langerode is a very quiet and pedestrian lane in the Ekkergemstraat. We ask our guests to respect this peace.
There are two student bicycles with which the center can be reached very quickly. Nature (Blaarmeersen Park + Beach) is also nearby!

The space
Het huisje klein maar heel gezellig ! Alles is voorzien om er met vier te verblijven. De keuken biedt alle basis comfort. Er is één slaapkamer met een twee persoonsbed en een kamer met bed met uitschuiflade. Indien reservatie voor 4 personen wordt dus een dubbel bed klaar gezet.

Er is een mini tuin (14 M2) achter het huisje. De tuin sluit aan bij de statige tuin van de dekenij van Ekkergem. Je kan er de hele namiddag en avond genieten van de zon en de natuur. ’s Avonds geniet je van een glaasje wijn en/of maalti
neighborhood_overview:
Wil je overdag Gent verkennen ? Afstand is hier geen probleem ! In principe kan je alles te voet doen. Je verblijft op 15 minuten van het historisch centrum van Gent. Na een leuke wandeling van 15 minuten sta je in de winkelstraat van Gent.
Wanneer je even de natuur in wil is dit ook geen probleem. Je bent op 2km afstand van de blaarmeersen. Ook de watersportbaan is op wandelafstand.

Als je boodschappen wil doen heb je de keuze uit alle gekende supermarkten dichtbij. De dichtste supermarkt is op 350 meter ! Er is bovendien een nachtwinkel in de buurt (500 m).

Gent is een fietsstad. Er zijn ook twee studentenfietsen ter
beschikking !
host_about:
Ik ben echtgenoot van Dominique De Vos en  trotse vader van Babette en Margot. 

Ik werk als sociaal werker in Dagcentrum De Trompet ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) ) Dagelijks help ik ouders en kinderen in het creëren van een warme thuis voor hun gezin. 
 
Klussen en ruimtes inrichten is één van mijn passies !  Dit is hetgeen waar ik dan ook in mijn vrije tijd hoofdzakelijk mee bezig ben ! Ik werk ook heel graag in de tuin en lees graag boeken die me helpen in mijn persoonlijke ontwikkeling . 

Zowel op mijn werk als thuis vind ik het belangrijk om een positieve sfeer te creëren waar iedereen zich goed voelt en zichzelf kan zijn. Ook in het verhuren van ons huisje hecht ik samen met mijn vrouw heel veel belang aan sfeer. We verhuren niet zomaar een huisje. We verhuren een beleving !! 

De vele positieve reacties nadat mensen bij ons kwamen logeren geven mij ongelooflijk veel energie !

name: Classy penthouse with terrace in the heart of Gent
description:
A guesthouse in style for people with style.
Our high-end duplexapartment is very accessibly located in between the 'Kouter' (rectangle square where the Flemish Opera is) and the medieval center (St-Bavo-Cathedral, Graslei, Korenmarkt, Gravensteen to name a few highlights).
Brand new, comfortable and classy, with a library-staircase which is not only an eyecatcher. 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms. Sunny terrace!
We called our gem "LaCasitaBelMundo”, just adding the dot Gent, to get the full picture.

The space
"La Casita", technically not a real house, located in a small residence. As an upper floor duplex, it gives at least the feeling. Passing through a terrace looking out on the University backyard, you enter la casita.
"Bel Mundo", explore and taste it yourself!
Lots of comfort, with a personal tasteful touch, will let you feel at ease. Approved by the Flemish Board of Tourism, we're proud to have got a 4 star-rating (the 5th. star coul
neighborhood_overview: You can't hardly be located more central, nearto Kouter and Korenmarkt with a lot of hip bars, nice restaurants, fancy shops, quality supermarkets (Delhaize, Cru, Albert Heijn, BioMarket) and on only a few minutes walk from the historical center (Graslei, Gravensteen, St.-Bavo-Cathedral).  You will notice, time is too short.  Explore and taste Ghent, a worthwile visit.
host_about:
We like to travel ourselve, within Europe mostly last years.  But in our earlier life we used to backpack in South- and Central-America, Asia,..   something we hope to do that soon again, though we'll probably prefer a bit more comfort at our age ;-)
Our common interest is broad with an open mind on what is happening in our turbulent world.  We try to give that through to our 9-year-old son.  But let us keep to the love we share for culture, art, music, cinema, theater, ....
Although we like nature a lot, a vibrant city gives us such a wide variety of impressions.  We are new on airbnb, but we booked recently Lisbon and Barcelona.

name: Cozy apartment in the historic center
description:
Quiet apartment in the historic city center of Ghent, in a residential area near the Recolettenlei. The largest shopping street in Ghent and the Graslei with its many terraces are within walking distance. Public transport and car parks are at about 500 meters.

The space
This apartment on the first floor consists of two rooms, separated by a small corridor: a spacious bedroom with a double bed and modern bathroom (shower + toilet), and a sunny living room with a sofa bed where another two people can sleep. For the sake of clarity: the bathroom is separated from the bedroom by a curtain. So, anyone who sleeps in the living room has to go through the bedroom to take a shower or use the toilet.

There is no equipped kitchen but a microwave, fridge and kettle are available in the living room. The rooms still have the authentic wooden floors and beams. Complete privacy is guaranteed: the rooms on the ground floor and in the attic are not occupied. I do spora
neighborhood_overview:
The house is very centrally located in a particularly quiet neighborhood with hardly any traffic. The Veldstraat, the busiest shopping street in Ghent, is a five-minute walk away. The bustling Graslei, cultural center Vooruit, the Medieval towers, museums and countless bars and restaurants are also nearby, as are public transport and various parking garages.

Ghent is also ideally located for visiting the other Flemish art cities, such as Bruges (30 minutes by car), Antwerp (50 minutes) and Brussels (40 minutes). The surrounding countryside, with the artists' village of Deurle and the Flemish Ardennes, is also worthwhile.

name: Stylish Loft in Charming Townhouse in City Center
description:
- Beautiful 18th century townhouse with grand staircase, high ceilings and hardwood floors. Completely renovated in the past year.
- Excellent location in the city center, next to Castle Of The Counts (Gravensteen). Everything within walking distance.
- Great public transport to train stations (Gent-Sint-Pieters & Gent-Dampoort) and business centers (Dok Noord, Flanders Expo, Gent Zuid...)
- Easily reachable by car with plenty of parking solutions.
- Daily disinfection of doorhandles (Covid-19).

The space
You will be staying in a beautiful 18th century townhouse that has been completely renovated in the past year. The high ceilings, large windows and hardwood floors make the place feel very spacious with a lot of natural light. The grand wooden staircase takes you back to the luxury days of Ghentian nobility...

In the past year, the building has been completely renovated to the latest standards (incl. state-of-the art fire safety).<
neighborhood_overview:
Experience Ghent from it's beautiful historic center! Located right next to the Castle Of The Counts (aka Het Gravensteen), all the city's treasures are within walking distance:
- Veldstraat and Korenmarkt for shopping
- Korenmarkt and Vlasmarkt for going out
- Patershol and Graslei for restaurants and outside terrasses
- Lievekaai and Prinsenhof for a romantic walk
- A lot of museums (Design museum, Huis Van Alijn, Kunsthal Gent), medieval churches, cathedrals, belfry... around the corner

All the while you are in a quiet neighbourhood without much street noise. You'll be hard-pressed to find a better location to explore the city from!

name: Living The Moment - Your Charming House
description:
Living The Moment is een volledig gerenoveerde woning in hartje Gent. De woning is gelegen in een zeer rustige straat, vlakbij de gerestaureerde rivierboorden. Hier zit je echt tussen de locals en toch vlakbij het bruisende oude stadscentrum. Je bent op enkele passen van alle bezienswaardigheden, bars, restaurants, musea.
Goed bereikbaar met de wagen. Je kan immers je bagage uitladen voor de deur en parking is slechts op 200 meter. Ook vlot bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer.

The space
Je komt binnen in onze gezellig , knusse living, met zithoek, leeshoek , en met een nieuwe , moderne open keuken. De eigentijdse inrichting en de vele lichtinval maken van Living The Moment een rustpunt in het stadscentrum.
Op het eerste verdiep is de badkamer met een grote douche en een zithoek met een zitbank die kan omgevormd worden tot slaapruimte voor 2 personen. Op het tweede verdiep zijn er twee ruime aparte slaapkamers voor telkens 2 personen.

G
neighborhood_overview: Living The Moment is gelegen in een heel rustig, gezellig straatje. Je bevindt je hier in een typische buurt van Gent. Local en relaxed.
host_about:
We reizen de wereld rond, maar houden ongelooflijk veel van onze favoriete stad, Gent. 
We houden van een leuk optreden, een goede film, een origineel theaterstuk en een lekker hapje eten.
In de week , werken we hard, maar in het weekend genieten we van de mooie dinges des levens.

'French Green' is a fresh, beautiful room with a lot of light in the newly opened B&B Petit Prince. The room has a view and direct access to the garden . It has a private toilet and bathroom and a comfortable eco shower in the room. Most of the materials are chosen with respect for nature. B&B Petit Prince offers a delicious breakfast at € 12,5 pp. Starting from 15 august 2018 , we will not charge any extra's for city tax, it will be included in the price per night.

The space
It has a 1.60 m bed with gorgeous linnen covers and cushions. It has no real wardrobe but there is a drawer for clothes under the washbasin and a table for luggage . Nice sitting corner with view and acces to the garden.

Guest access

Other things to note
There are stairs to go to the breakfast room on the first floor but peopl
neighborhood_overview: The BnB is located near the city center. It is about 8  min walking to the central square Korenmarkt and the medieval Gravensteen fortress. Restaurants and bars are also within walking distance.  Although located close to the center, the BnB is situated in a quite neighborhood and you will enjoy a peaceful sleep. Churches, cathedrals, the Belfry, the Town Hall,  a boat trip on the Leie Canals, musea.... Discover the beautiful city of Ghent by walking through the small streets in a relaxing atmosphere.

I welcome you in my modest, but very cosy house, taken over by plants, and a beautifull terrace to enjoy in summer.

The space
Your room is upstairs in my small house, nothing luxurious. We share the living room, bathroom, a bright kitchen and a beautifull terrace... all taken over by plants 😉

Guest access
All rooms, except for our bedrooms are shared. I am happy to share my house with you.

Other things to note
I am really engaged to live in a sustainable way. Laundry, cleaning, washing... is mainly done with eco-friendly/safe products.

Don't expect any luxury or a trendy interior, choose for a charming ecological stay in the middle of a lively student-neighbourhood.

The space

name: Stylish fully equipped apartment in Gent
description:
90 square meter, 2-bedroom newly renovated and fully equipped apartment with designer touches. Suitable for two couples, a family of four, or business travelers.

The space
“… beauty through function and simplification.”

Our apartment features an original kitchen designed by Raymond Loewy and was fully renovated with a design theme in his honor. You will see some modern touches combined with an artful '60s design style. There is some original designer furniture and also original artwork.

The apartment features two bedrooms suitable for 4 people, hallway, living room & dining room, fully equipped kitchen, laundry area, a bathroom and independent toilet, a storage area, and high speed wifi.

Bedrooms

This apartment has 2 bedrooms. The main bedroom consists of a 180cm bed with 2 separate mattresses and a big wardrobe with hangers. The second bedroom contains two 90cm single beds that can be put together into one double be
neighborhood_overview:
Gent-St-Pieters is a beautiful residential neighborhood in Gent situated just outside the city center. Hosting the newly renovated train station, with lots of green and waterways surrounding it, the neighborhood hits the right balance of quiet peacefulness combined with practicality.

The apartment is located at a 5 minute walk from Sint Pieters station. Sint Pieters Station is reachable directly by train from Brussels Airport in about 50 minutes, and from Brussels South in 35 minutes. From Sint Pieters station the train takes you directly to the Brussels City center in 40 minutes and to Brugge in 25 minutes.

Everything is within walking distance from the apartment: the many museums in the vicinity (STAM, SMAK, Museum of Fine Arts), the historic center and its monuments, the St Bavo's Cathedral, the opera, the theater, cinemas, shops, breakfast and coffee houses . We also offer you tips for the best and most charming restaurants in Ghent.

For those who

Just discover the historic heart of Ghent.... all at walking distance.
If you also want to visit other cities, Dampoort station is only 800 m away!

Whether you're a couple, a family with small children, good friends or a professional, everything you need is right here in our bright condo with fully equiped kitchen and private bathroom.

Located in a quiet residential area close to Dampoort (train), free parking on the streets, a park with sporting facilities (pool) around the corner.

My 9yo and I will be happy to give you all the insights on Ghent!

The space
This studio is brandnew. We made it out of the attic and upper floor of our house in 2018. It has central heating, a bathroom with walk-in shower and a toilet, a comfortable kitchen with all utencils and mezzanine with a large bedroom.

neighborhood_overview:
Sint-Amandsberg is a very colourful and layed back neighbourhood. Our house is located at a 2 min walking distance of a large park with an (indoor and outdoor) swimmingpool, playgrounds, sauna, Finish running track etc.

It's a very quiet neighbourhood with lots of hip coffeebars, nice lunchplaces, cool cafés, a nightshop just outside the house, two bakeries nearby, all kinds of grocerystores and supermarkets etc.
host_about: I'm a single mom of a son who was born in 2010 and have been living in Ghent for over 20 years. As long as I can remember, I've had this dream to move to a more southern country. But then life happened. So for now, I love to travel with my boy and explore the world as much as I can. Either by letting people stay at my studio or by going out on an adventure myself.

description:
Welcome to my house! It is located within 3km of the city centre.

The entire house is at your disposal. There is a terras and a garden to the South to have a BBQ or to chill out. In front of the house there's a nice little forest to escape in after your day.

If you come to Ghent by car, you have free parking space here next to the house, which is trustable and safe. Much more than in the city centre.

All the (girl) toys and board games are at you

From the minute you step out of the apartment, you will have your pick of bakeries, coffee shops, restaurants, bars and adorable little boutiques.

name: La bellétage
description:
Well situated and quiet studio, with terrace & airconditioning, just 200m across Gent-Dampoort railway station, Flixbus and Eurolines, and possible free parking on the station's parking lot.

Gent-Dampoort is the railway station, closest to the city centre, (1km) and has direct trains to Antwerp, Bruges, Kortrijk, Lille Flanders (France), Ypres, and the coastal cities Ostend and De Panne. Weekdays direct train to Brussels at 07h47…

Very easy for city-trips to these cities.
Gay friendly.

The space
Completely renovated & airconditioned belle-étage floor in an old Town House.
Everything you need for overnight, or longer stays.
We like to keep the place clean, however a cat sometimes might slip in while we're cleaning…
So maybe best not to be booked by people with a cat allergy.

When looking for dates to book, you might notice that we are not available on saturdays for checking in or out. That way we keep our satu
neighborhood_overview:
Dampuurt, little old Town House on Hagelandkaai, just across the old lock.
Near Kiosko, a summer bar in the little lock house.
City Hall at 900 m, not 25km…
Nightshop just behind us in Dampoortstraat, literally our back neighbours, we call it The Big Fridge.
One block further along the big road is an artisanal Bakery.
Turkish, African, Bulgarian, … shops in Dampoortstraat, and a good SPAR supermarket on Joremaaie, passing in coming home, like 300m from the house.
Dok Brewery is in walking distance, with 30 beers on tap, pizza, burgers, barbecue.
Really nice place with good food and beer. It's on an newly renovated old Factory site, worth a walk around. That area along the other site of the water leaving the city, is now being newly re-developed.
host_about:
Hello, we are Jurgen & Tom
History teacher/guide and train chef
Happy to have you stay with us in our house, we hope it makes you feel at home.

When looking for dates to book, you might notice that we are not available on saturdays for checking in or out. That way we keep our saturdays somewhat to ourselves (cleaning wise) However if you're staying for four or more days, you can always inquire to arrive or leave on a saturday. You have a no, but you might get a yes…

name: Romantic 17th century workers house + free parking
description:
Dit volledig vernieuwd huisje bevindt zich in het centrum van Gent. Op wandelafstand van alle bezienswaardigheden maar toch heel rustig gelegen. Het gehele huis is voor u beschikbaar. Het huisje heeft een stadstuintje, keuken, badkamer, slaapkamer, living, apart toilet en ingang.

The space
A very romantic cosy house in a small street. The street is very quiet although it is in the city center. When you come in the house the toilet is in front of you. If you go left you are in the living room that has a comfortable sleeping/sitting sofa. Also a table with chairs for 5 people make it cosy in front of the heater. To the right you have a stair to the bedroom. If you walk further in the living room you have a kitchen with the bathroom on the left and a window door to the garden.

Guest access
All rooms of the house are yours
neighborhood_overview: Op wandelafstand vind u imposante historische gebouwen en plaatsen, musea, winkelstraten en tal van toffe cafés en restaurantjes. Waar je ook kijkt, in het grotendeels autoluwe centrum van de stad zie je altijd wel een gebouw of een monument met een verhaal. Een versterkte burcht van 1000 jaar oud, drie middeleeuwse torens en de mooiste dubbele huizenrij van Europa liggen op slenterafstand van elkaar.

neighborhood_overview: A quiet, Belle-Epoque residential neighborhood with all kinds of facilities in the area. Two parks around the corner; for a drink & lunch you do not have to walk more than two minutes; a bakery & supermarkets take up 1 to 7 minutes to reach. A multicultural neighborhood with all sorts of eateries within 10 minutes; from hipster bars to kebab. 20 to 25 minutes walk from the historic center which is livelily flooded by students, locals and tourists offer a very extensive choice of dining options. 15 minutes walk from both the Beguinages of Sint Amandberg and Onze Lieve Vrouw ter Hoyen, both UNESCO World Heritage Sites, just like the Belfry Tower (Het Belfort) in the medieval center. You easily need multiple days to explore Gent and its architecture & history.

name: In the heart of the Historic Center!
description:
Welcome to Residence George, where classic urban design meets spacious floor plans. This bright, airy and sunny apartment with atmospheric décor and tasteful design furniture is located in the very center of Ghent. Residence George is a modern 3-bedroom apartment, a few steps from the Christmas Market, at two minutes walking from the Graslei and very close to the famous tourist sights. Restaurants and shops can be found in the immediate vicinity.

The space
The apartment is on the 1st floor of a beautiful mansion dating from the mid 19th century. It was designed by a famous Belgian architect who put together the initial plans for an estate with a mirrored ballroom. The building was completely renovated and equipped according to modern standards, including an elevator. Our apartment offers pleasant living spaces for families, professionals, groups of friends and couples, who want to spend some time in the historic medieval city of Gent. All the rooms have nice oak
neighborhood_overview:
Food, Drinks and leisure we recommend



Breakfast:

Paul

Paul is a very nice place to enjoy breakfast; located on the “Vrijdagsmarkt” it is very close to our apartment. We can recommend going via “Graffitistraatje”, which is just beside our building.

Fusion Kitchen:

Mosquito Coast

Mosquito Coast is by far the best restaurant in town to enjoy fusion food. MOSQUITO COAST is a restaurant with a 'travel theme' in Ghent, since 1999. “An offbeat cafe with an adventurous character”, as they call themselves. About 2 minutes’ walk from our place.

Alternative Pizza:

Otomat

Otomat has invented pizzas made from the best beer in the world: Belgian Duvel Beer. All the pizzas are also served with exclusive Belgian Beers. Three minutes and you are there!

Italian:

Pane & Vino

Pane & Vino serves by far the best traditional I
host_about: Hi, I'm Aygul , born and raised in Holland. After studying and working in Amsterdam, I decided to start my own film production company in Istanbul. description:
Spacious, bright house with large private garden located in a quiet neighbourhood, suitable for up to 4 adults with children. Less than 3km from the historical center of Ghent. Easy to reach by public transport or by bike. Parking in the street is for free.
Ideal for families with children or couples traveling together.
Via the R4 (Ringroad) you can reach the E17 or E40-highway very quick, towards the coast, Kortrijk, Bruges, Antwerp or Brussels.

The space
The house was recently renovated and has all the comfort, with large bright rooms.

Downstairs is the entrance hall, toilet, open kitchen with dining and seating area, everything with underfloor heating. In addition, a spacious desk and play area.

Our neighbourhood is a quiet neighbourhood, ideal for escaping the hectic city life. Within walking distance there is a Delhaize supermarket (200m) and a fresh bakery (800m). In the neighbourhood there are some nice restaurants where it is delicious dining. Would you rather eat something at home? Deliveroo or other delivery services are available.

Nearby you have the Rozebroeken Park with the Lago Sports and Recreation Center, a real swimming paradise.
