Bicycle storage available in the ground floor garage, underground public car park nearby (150m). 20m from the central train station, the perfect base to explore Gent and other cities!!

The space
It's a private studio. No access to other spaces in the building, except of course, to the coffee house.
neighborhood_overview:
‘Asking citizens of Ghent what they think of their city is a pointless exercise: you’ll find only unanimous love. And with good reason. Ghent is one of Europe’s greatest discoveries - small enough to feel cosy but big enough to stay vibrant. It has enough medieval frivolity to create a spectacle but retains a gritty industrial edge that keeps things ‘real’. Tourists remain surprisingly thin on the ground, yet with its fabulous canalside architecture, wealth of quirky bars and some of Belgium’s most fascinating museums, this is a city you really won’t want to miss’ (Lonely Planet). Everything on walking distance from the studio!

Het unieke karakter van - het historisch centrum - van Gent behoeft nog weinig reclame. Ondertussen algemeen gekend als topbestemming voor een onvergetelijke citytrip. Alles bevindt zich op wandelafstand van de studio!
host_about:
After an academic career and being a teacher for some years, I now am the proud owner of my own coffee bar “Café Labath”. I’m spending a great deal of my time on my passion for coffee and hospitality. Doing sports, traveling, reading and riding my motorbike are some other things I love. 
At this point I have expanded the business to the point that we follow up on the entire chain from coffee tree to cup. I’m spending a lot of time in Colombia, where I visit local farmers in order to get the best coffee for the coffee bar. 
I used to travel quite adventurously myself. I still cherish these memorable moments of spontaneous hospitality and I take this as starting point to treat my guests.

Na een academische carrière en jaren in het onderwijs, ben ik sinds 2011 de trotse eigenaar van het koffiehuis “Café Labath” te Gent. 
Mijn passie voor koffie en hospitality vraagt het grootste deel van mijn tijd, daarnaast ga ik graag sporten, lezen en motorijden. Ik heb enkele avontuurlijke reizen gedaan, en de reismicrobe heeft me nog steeds niet losgelaten. Intussen spendeer ik veel tijd in Colombia, om daar “Direct Trade” koffie te zoeken. Door goede banden op te bouwen met lokale boeren, kan ik de lekkerste koffies importeren voor de koffiebar.
De memorabele momenten van spontane gastvrijheid op mijn reizen koester ik nog steeds. Die gastvrijheid heb ik steeds zelf voor ogen bij het ontvangen van mijn gasten.

name: Grote gezinswoning in Gent. Spacious familyhouse.
description:
Ons huis bevindt zich vlak aan het centrum. Heel gemakkelijk te bereiken met het openbaar vervoer. Tram 1 rijdt van het Sint-Pietersstation en naar het centrum.
Het is ons eigen huis, waar we met ons 6 in wonen, en dat we graag open stellen voor andere gezinnen die Gent willen leren kennen.
Je kan gebruik maken van alles wat hier in huis is, natuurlijk met respect voor alles.

The space
We wonen zelf in dit huis. Dus alles wat ongeveer nodig is, is aanwezig. Je kan hier koken, wassen en ontspannen.

Guest access
Tot alle.
neighborhood_overview:
Het huis bevindt zich niet in het oude centrum van Gent. Het is hier rustig, maar alles is wel dicht bij en gemakkelijk bereikbaar. Kom je voor de Gentse feesten? Dan geraak je er heel gemakkelijk, maar kan je weer in alle rust gaan slapen.
We wonen in een multiculturele buurt, wat er ook voor zorgt dat er dicht bij heel wat "gewone" supermarkten zijn maar ook Turkse, Syrische, Marokkaanse winkels, bakkers en restaurants aan goedkope prijzen.
Ga je de andere kant uit, dan kom je snel in de Bourgoyen, een mooi natuurgebied dat elk seizoen prachtig is.
host_about: We are a family of 6, 2 parents and 4 teenagers. We welcome people here when we're not (all of us) at home, because it's a pity to leave our home empty as others would like to visit Ghent. We like to travel a lot. We love our home and Ghent so we are always glad to return home. So other travellers are welcome here. It's more cosy and cheaper than a hotel. So we'd like to let our house used by other family's. Welcome!

name: Stylish Studio 'Suite César' in the heart of Ghent
description:
If you are looking for a short time stay in Ghent, 'SUITE CESAR' is the ideal place for you!

Situated in the Tinnenpotstraat, 400m from the Gravensteen Castle, our bright studio will be your cosy cocoon in the heart of the city.

We provide you a fully furnished, modern and affordable studio with room up to 2 people.
It's perfect for couples or solo travelers!

Also as a base for a visit to Bruges, Antwerp or Brussels our location can be an added value!

The space
We provide you a fully furnished, modern and affordable studio with room up to 2 people in the historical centre of the city, near The Castle of the Counts (Gravensteen).

Other things to note
The city tax of 2,83 euro per person per night is not included in the price.
neighborhood_overview:
Suite César is located in a prime location in the historical center of Ghent.
Situated in the Tinnenpotstraat, a charming and quiet neighborhood, a few minutes walk from the bustling center.

The Tinnenpotstraat owes its name to the hostel 'In den Tinnen Pot' (house number 44-46).
It already existed in the 14th/15th century and still can be recognized by the sign above the door.
This street is also famous for the Tinnenpot Theater on number 21.

Nearby is the Prinsenhof, created by buildings around the former Hof ten Walle, the residence of the Viscount of Ghent.
This Hof ten Walle was the birthplace of Emperor Charles V and was named from then on 'Prinsenhof'.

400m away the Gravensteen Castle is located, the only surviving medieval castle in Flanders and a very important tourist attraction for the city.

The space
The apartment is located right in the city center right across the Opera of Ghent! It is easily accessible with public transport. If you walk 2 minutes through the shopping street you will find yourself standing between 2 of the iconic church towers of Ghent.

Guest access
The whole apartment is yours! You will have access to a spacious living room with a nice couch, and lots of light. There is also a big table where you can work or have breakfast. There is a Bluetooth speaker if you like to have some background music. Furthermore there is a nice 2 person bed, a separate toilet and a nice kitchen where you can prepare some basic recipes.

PS: don't forget to check the fridge for a

name: Central Classy App 4p, free Coffeehouse Breakfast
description:
This is a newly renovated corner apartment in the historic centre of Ghent. The spacious two floor app with tons of light is situated above one of the nicest coffee bars of Belgium, it’s the perfect spot to start your day.
FREE BREAKFAST (coffee, juice, croissant) every morning!!
Flexible self check- in after 3pm.
Bicycle storage available in the ground floor garage, underground public car park nearby (150m). 20m from the central train station, the perfect base to explore Gent and other cities!

The space
You enter this recently renovated apartment through the garage. There are stairs to the first. At the first floor there is an other door with key lock. The stairs behind this door lead to the actual apartment.
At the second floor you can find the living room with high quality sound system and television and quite a basic kitchen. Fridge, microwave / oven and dishwasher are available. It’s a nice, welcoming, open space with tons of daylight.
neighborhood_overview:
‘Asking citizens of Ghent what they think of their city is a pointless exercise: you’ll find only unanimous love. And with good reason. Ghent is one of Europe’s greatest discoveries - small enough to feel cosy but big enough to stay vibrant. It has enough medieval frivolity to create a spectacle but retains a gritty industrial edge that keeps things ‘real’. Tourists remain surprisingly thin on the ground, yet with its fabulous canalside architecture, wealth of quirky bars and some of Belgium’s most fascinating museums, this is a city you really won’t want to miss’ (Lonely Planet). Everything on walking distance from the appartement!

Het unieke karakter van - het historisch centrum - van Gent behoeft nog weinig reclame. Ondertussen algemeen gekend als topbestemming voor een onvergetelijke citytrip. Alles bevindt zich op wandelafstand van het appartement!
host_about:
After an academic career and being a teacher for some years, I now am the proud owner of my own coffee bar “Café Labath”. I’m spending a great deal of my time on my passion for coffee and hospitality. Doing sports, traveling, reading and riding my motorbike are some other things I love. 
At this point I have expanded the business to the point that we follow up on the entire chain from coffee tree to cup. I’m spending a lot of time in Colombia, where I visit local farmers in order to get the best coffee for the coffee bar. 
I used to travel quite adventurously myself. I still cherish these memorable moments of spontaneous hospitality and I take this as starting point to treat my guests.

Na een academische carrière en jaren in het onderwijs, ben ik sinds 2011 de trotse eigenaar van het koffiehuis “Café Labath” te Gent. 
Mijn passie voor koffie en hospitality vraagt het grootste deel van mijn tijd, daarnaast ga ik graag sporten, lezen en motorijden. Ik heb enkele avontuurlijke reizen gedaan, en de reismicrobe heeft me nog steeds niet losgelaten. Intussen spendeer ik veel tijd in Colombia, om daar “Direct Trade” koffie te zoeken. Door goede banden op te bouwen met lokale boeren, kan ik de lekkerste koffies importeren voor de koffiebar.
De memorabele momenten van spontane gastvrijheid op mijn reizen koester ik nog steeds. Die gastvrijheid heb ik steeds zelf voor ogen bij het ontvangen van mijn gasten.

name: Ruime en kleurige woning voor interieurliefhebbers
description: Welkom in ons kleurige huis te Gent! Het huis dateert van 1915 en werd volledig gerenoveerd met respect voor de oorspronkelijke materialen en staat van het huis. Als interieurarchitect en styliste heb ik mijn creativiteit de vrije loop gelaten wat resulteerde in een eclectisch en vooral kleurig geheel dat voortdurend mee evolueert met hoe ik mij voel en in het leven sta. Ons huis staat volledig ter uwer beschikking GENIET! Op 15 minuten wandelafstand van Gent centrum.
neighborhood_overview: Ik woon in een jonge buurt aan de rand van Gent, op 20 minuten stappen van het historisch centrum. Als je geen zin hebt om te stappen: op de hoek van de straat stopt de bus die je naar het centrum brengt. Het  jaagpad aan de Schelde is de ideale plek voor een ochtendrun, een wandeling of fietstocht in het groen, weg van de drukte. Om de hoek is een bakker en een supermarktje het blokje om.

name: Penthouse with sunny terrace, ideal for expats!
description:
Deze penthouse is helemaal nieuw. We hebben alles modern, gezellig en comfortabel ingericht, net zoals we voor onszelf zouden doen. Er is enorm veel licht en de zichten zijn over gans Gent. Er is geen lift in het gebouw, je zal 5 comfortabele trappen moeten beklimmen. Het appartement is op 15 min wandelafstand van de Korenmarkt. Er is plaats om fietsen veilig te parkeren in onze garage. Auto's op straat voor 6 euro per 24h. Vlotte verbinding voor bus en trein (5min v Dampoort).

The space
Je hebt het appartement helemaal voor jezelf. Er is snelle wifi en je mag onze Netflix-account gebruiken.
We voorzien lakens, handdoeken, zeep en shampoo, tabletten voor de vaatwas en vaatdoeken.

host_about: I'm a mother to 2 boys. My husband, my boys and I all live on this address in Gent. We have recently started hosting here on Airbnb, with some success. We always try to make our guests feel completely at home. We hope you will enjoy your stay as much as our previous guests!

name: privat family home in car-free street
description:
Op een boogscheut van gent centrum, in de bruisende Brugse poort is een kleine autovrije straat. Daarin bevindt zich ons huis met 2 slaapkamers. Het is een zeer licht huis met veel ramen en glas. Het speelterrein voor de kinderen is onze kleine tuin en de straat.
Makkelijk bereikbaar via de hoofd ingangswegen rond gent, doch geen lawaai in huis of in de straat van het verkeer.
op 15 minuten wandelafstand van het centrum van gent.

The space
Het is een open huis met een open keuken. Op de gelijkvloers is er voorts een living met tv, radio en een platencollectie. Er is Wi-Fi aanwezig.
Op de eerste verdieping is de kinderkamer en de badkamer met inloopdouche, toilet en wasmachine. Met een schuifdeur kan je naar de 2 de verdieping waar de ouder slaapkamer is. Buiten hebben we een klein tuintje met planten en een tafel met stoelen.

Guest access
De gasten hebben het gehele huis voor hen

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview:
Bruisende buurt
Diverse winkels op wandelafstand. Colruyt, Aldi, Carrefour, bio planeet. Marrokaanse kruideniers en Turkse bakkers op 10 minuten stappen alsook eetcafe Woest, cafe congé en theehuis trafiek.
Het prachtige historisch centrum van gent makkelijk bereikbaar met het openbaar vervoer of te voet.
Park 'de groene vallei' op minder dan 5 minuten stappen.
Zwemmeer 'de blaarmeersen' op 10 minuten fietsen
Natuurgebied de bourgoyen op 5 minuten wandelafstand
Antwerpen, Brussel en Oostende aan zee, 3 kwartier rijden met de auto
Brugge op een half uur met de auto
host_about: Ik verhuur mijn huis wanneer we zelf de wijde wereld intrekken. Mijn dochter ( 9 jaar) en ik wonen hier zeer graag en willen anderen ook laten genieten van een leuk huis in een fijne buurt op wandelafstand van het centrum van Gent.

name: Private room in cosy and colourful home #2
description:
My boyfriend Lorenz and I welcome you to stay with us in our cosy and colourful home. Come feel at home in our place and get inspired by this great and vibrant city, which we love so much.

Get a taste of Ghent and fall in love like we did ;): Check out this short video 'Ghent in Motion (2018)' about our city at Youtube.

The space
You could say that our house is a funky mixture of modern wooden furniture, some antiques and art, lots of bright colours, a few Scandinavian things, some bohemian vibes and lots -yes lots- of plants. We just love our home and are looking forward to share it with you. Here are some of the basics about your room and our house: your private room is located on the first floor near the bathroom and is actually the master bedroom of the house. With it's high ceiling and big windows it feels really spacious. You have a small wardrobe for your clothes, a mirror, bluetooth speakers and of course a comfortable bed.
The living room
neighborhood_overview: Our house is located near the Ghent St Peter's station, "Het Zuid", the museum of modern art (SMAK), the museum of fine arts and the St Peter's Church. The city centre is reachable by foot, but there is also a bus- and tramstation nearby. We live in a quiet area of Ghent with lots of parks and green areas in the neighbourhood. There are also supermarkets and some nice bars nearby.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Justine. I'm 29 years old and living in the amazing city of Ghent. I graduated as a historian and am currently working for the Mobility Department of the City of Ghent. My friends would probably say that i'm expressive, quirky, honest, curious, enthusiastic and friendly. I live together with my boyfriend, Lorenz, who is also a historian and a really social and open-minded person. As from 2020 our lives have been enriched by a four-legged friend, named Apollo. He is our lovely and stubborn little sausage dog who will welcome you home with a friendly bark and make you laugh with his funny moves and playful tricks.

My boyfriend and i love to travel and in 2017 we left for a 6 month Asia trip, starting in China. These are some of our other interests: meeting interesting and honest people, history, culture, (contemporary) art, good food, almost all types of music, wine and beer, whiskey, (summer)festivals, hiking, dogs!, camping, scouting, photography, authentic places, coffee, tea, yoga, smoothies, running,...

The house can accommodate 2 to 5 gasts with 2 large bedrooms/double bed + 1 comfortable sofa bed.
A big comfortable bathroom and seperate toilet.
The house is forseen of a lot of naturel light and despite located so central, very quiet to sleep!!

Other things to note
Possibility to leave your luggage in storage after ch
neighborhood_overview:
This particularly beautiful corner of Ghent is a city-in-the-city.
Try to forget for a moment where you are and immerse yourself in the Middle Ages. Playfully expose the age-old history of this beautiful City district!
Sniff the nostalgia of old habits.
Enjoy architecture and art.
And certainly the picturesque streets full of cozy restaurants, popular cafés and trendy bars, welcome at the Patershol!

name: Villa Leona deluxe with amazing rooftop terrace
description:
Villa Leona
A brand new, fully furnished, well situated, cosy and trendy loft for at least 5 people with amazing and very spacious rooftop terrace.

It is perfect for family, friends, couples and business travellers who want to visit Ghent and Sint-Martens-Latem, known for its rich art tradition. There are excellent restaurants nearby.

This luxurious, first level apartment (part of HUIS19) is adaptable to your needs. So it’s also for rent for meetings, presentations, workshops, etc…

The space
Large living space with
-fully installed kitchen with all equipment (oven, dishwasher, microwave, nespresso,...)
-free wifi, cable TV, sonos,...
-one very comfortable sofa bed for 1 adult or 2 kids (110cm wide)
1 bathrooms with large walk-in shower
1 private toilet
2 independent bedrooms each with a queen size bed
In the basement:
-1 storage room;
-1 technical room with washer and dryer

1 pri
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is very close to the river Leie where you can take the manually operated ferry to cross it. From that point you can walk endlessly into the nature.
You have lots of very nice biking routes in all kind of categories.
We can arrange a boat or kayaks (both optional) to get to Ghent using the river Leie (in summer only).

The apartment is situated just outside Ghent and just next to the world famous Sint-Martens-Latem, known for its rich art tradition that characterises the East Flanders Lys Valley. There are excellent restaurants nearby.

name: Cosy spacious bright duplex-roof appartment.
description:
Cosy, bright and spacious duplex(-roof apartment) in the center of Ghent.
Quietly located and with all major attractions within walking distance.
Furthermore, the apartment has everything you need to make this your home away from home.

The space
The apartment is located on the 3° (= highest) floor (easily accessible by elevator!) and has 2 levels.
Downstairs you have the cozy sitting area and dining area - kitchen - toilet and storage room.
In summer, but on sunny days in general (there is also a patio heater) it is nice to relax on both terraces: one along the side of the sitting area and one along the side of the kitchen.
On the first floor you have the bedroom - bathroom (shower & bath) and separate toilet.
In the bathroom you can also find the washing machine and dryer.

Guest access
During your stay the whole apartment is YOUR HOME!
neighborhood_overview:
De Kouter is a square in the center of the Flemish city of Ghent.
Older names for this square are Paardenmarkt, and Place d'Armes.
The square was traditionally used not only for all kinds of festivities, but also for public assemblies in the city.Since 1772, and until today, a flower market is held on Sundays.

The Kouter is surrounded by stately, mostly nineteenth-century buildings, including the Handelsbeurs building and the Opera.
Another reason why the neighborhood today is one of the most exclusive (and safe) in the city.
It is also the financial center of the city.

It connects the popular shopping street De Veldstraat with De Brabantdam where the more exclusive stores can be found.

On the square there is a late 19th century, cast iron kiosk, built to the design of the Ghent city architect Adolphe Pauli in 1878.

There is also a modern work of art by the American artist Jessica Diamond entitled "The Mystic Leaves".

description:
Het huis bevindt zich in een rustig straatje. Binnen is het gezellig ingericht. Er is een terras en een dakterras, waar het heerlijk zitten is 's avonds bij de laatste zonnestralen.

Als je de straat uitloopt van het rijhuis kom je direct aan het water van DOK Noord. Je kan er aangenaam wandelen en aan het water zitten.
Als je over de brug langs het water loopt kom je aan het eind van het kanaal, daar kan je zitten en pootje baden. Op diezelfde plaats is er ook een sfeervol Buitencafe 'Bar Bricolage'.
De buurt is toegankelijk, met enkele kleine en grotere supermarkten in de buurt. Er is een moderne taverne aan het uiteinde van de straat en een frituur en een bakker om de hoek.

description:

Be our guest and enjoy the comfort of our place shared with us (the family) at the most convenient location of the city. Roam around in the city/finish your business, feel relaxed when you get home; a serene place with enough hospitality to give you a comfortable experience.

neighborhood_overview:

Sint Pieters being the transport hub, you can move around very conveniently in the city. You can even walk to get to the city center and many other tourist attractions.

host_about:

name: Minimalistic House Near Ghent
description:
Welcome to our little house in the suburbs of Ghent! We are expats who divide their time between two lovely cities: Uppsala (Sweden) and Ghent. When we are away, we decided to share our house with other travelers, who can enjoy a restful stay in the quiet suburbs and combine it with visiting the beautiful city of Ghent.

The space
The house has a spacious living room with dining table and a seating area. There are two bedrooms, each of them has a double bed. The bathroom has a bathtub and a shower. Of course, we also have a washing machine, as we know that traveling with kids sometimes involves a lot of laundry. Because we are a family with small kids, we have almost everything for little ones. There are toys, books (mostly in Dutch and Swedish), a baby chair, toddler bed and baby cot

Other things to note
The garden is a great area to play in, but because we are often away, it sometimes can look a bit like a jungle. Feel free to roam around,
neighborhood_overview: Within walking distance from our house, you can find a supermarket (Carrefour), a bakery and a butcher. If you like to be outdoors, we can recommend the nature park “Bourgoyen-Ossemeersen”, which is only 1,5 km away and is nice green spot to relax. If you are by bike, it only takes about 15 minutes to go to the city center, there are lots of cycling routes to choose from. Or you can go to the nearest bus stop (100m) or the tram stop (1,2 km)

name: Maison Etienne, luxurious short stay near Ghent.
description:
Maison Etienne
A brand new, fully furnished, well situated, cosy and trendy loft for at least 5 people with a garden.

It is perfect for family, friends, couples and business travellers who want to visit Ghent and Sint-Martens-Latem, known for its rich art tradition. There are excellent restaurants nearby.

This luxurious, ground level apartment (part of HUIS19) is adaptable to your needs.
Therefore it’s also for rent for meetings, product presentations, workshops, etc

The space
Large living space with
-fully installed kitchen with all equipment (oven, dishwasher, microwave, nespresso,...)
-free wifi, cable TV, sonos,...
-one very comfortable sofa bed for 1 adult or 2 kids (110cm wide)
1 bathrooms with large walk-in shower
1 private toilet
2 independent bedrooms with real beds:
-one bedroom with queen size bed, with optional baby cot;
-one bedroom with 2 bunk beds.
In the basement:
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is very close to the river Leie where you can take the manually operated ferry to cross it. From that point you can walk endlessly into the nature.
You have lots of very nice biking routes in all kind of categories.
We can arrange a boat or kayaks (both optional) to get to Ghent using the river Leie (in summer only).

The apartment is situated just outside Ghent and just next to the world famous Sint-Martens-Latem, known for its rich art tradition that characterises the East Flanders Lys Valley. There are excellent restaurants within short distance.

name: NEW: Book a luxury stay, enjoy the Ghent city life
description:
Looking for a unique place to stay in Ghent? Choose our place for contempory living in a completely refurbished authentic townhouse that dates back to the beginning of the 20th century.

Discover and enjoy the Ghent city life at walking distance.

Right across the city park 'Groene Vallei' (green valley), ideal for picknicks and only a breath away from 'Blaarmeersen' sports and recreation park.

Fresh linen and nespresso? We offer all the modern amenities that make you feel right at home.

The space
Our place has a master bedroom with ensuite bathroom (sleeps 2 - baby cot possible at request), and a large duplex room (sleeps 3) with ensuite shower and mezzanine. We have a normal sized extra bed for a child at your disposal should you need this. We have to say that the stairs in the duplexsuite are steep, as you can see in the pictures. The bedrooms are fitted with new quality beds.

The living room has an eco-leather sofa
neighborhood_overview:
You are in walking distance to the city center.

Ghent's best restaurants are around the corner (check out Volta, Oak and Door 73, just a few steps away) and there is a large grocery store for all your supplies across the street.

Our place is located right across the city park Groene Vallei (green valley), ideal for picknicks and close to Blaarmeersen sports and recreation park, a green jewel beside the Watersportbaan in Ghent. This is where Ghent residents come jogging, and rowing clubs battle it out on the water. It is a lovely area for walking, with a vast lake. You can swim, hire a pedalo, or go kayaking, surfing, fishing and diving. A large sandy beach for everyone makes the Blaarmeersen in Ghent complete. If you’re looking for sporting activities in Ghent, this is the place to be!

name: Ruime suite in herenhuis met zonnig privé terras
description:
Of je nu als koppel, vrienden of gezin in het pas gerenoveerde OH2 verblijft, aan comfort en luxe ontbreekt het niet.
Hoge plafonds en ramen zorgen voor lichtrijke ruimtes en een rustgevende vibe. Een groot, zonnige terras/binnenkoer laat je maximaal van de warme dagen genieten. Uniek in het centrum van de stad. Van cosy kamerjassen over toiletartikelen tot de Nespresso machine...alles is aanwezig om het hotelgevoel te evenaren. Voor de doe-het-zelver zijn er een oven, kookplaat enz. aanwezig.

The space
Je privacy en rust zijn belangrijk en zijn hier in overvloed te vinden. De slaapkamer ligt aan de achterzijde van het pand zodat je nachtrust niet door stadse geluiden verstoord wordt.
Het luxueuze king size bed kan tot twin beds omgevormd worden.
Voor de beste nachtrust kiest men uit een 'medium' of 'firm' matras.
De dekbedden en hoofdkussens zijn uit hypoallergene/antibacteriële bamboo vervaardigd.
Ook het zetelbed (1m40) met pocket
neighborhood_overview: Je vindt OH2 in hartje Gent, op een steenworp van de beroemde 3 torens. Zin in een ontbijt in de hipste koffiebar van Gent? Je hoeft enkel de straat over te steken. Op zoek naar een gezellige, lekkere restaurantje? Draai de hoek om en   geniet van heerlijke Italiaanse keuken. Het afzakkertje neem je gewoon in de coole jazzclub ernaast. Come and visit our beautiful city Ghent!

name: The Blue Room
description:
Cozy room available on the first floor in the lively Brugse Poort neighbourhood of Ghent, Belgium.
1.8km from the centre of the city, an easy walking distance along the canal or 5 mins with public transportation.
Communal kitchen, dining, living, bathroom and outside courtyard.
Currently a share house for an Australian girl and other Airbnb guests.
Note - The city of Ghent charges a tax of €3 per person per night. This can be paid on arrival or through Airbnb.

Other things to note
Tourist tax in Europe 2020.

In Ghent, tourists are obligated to pay an overnight accommodation tax.
This city tax is €3 per person per night.
This can be paid on arrival in cash.

name: studio medieval city center at river "de Leie"
description:
Hedendaagse privéstudio met eigen ingang in een jonge creatieve buurt in het historisch centrum van Gent. Unieke ligging aan de Leie, in het verlengde van de Graslei en rechtover het middeleeuwse Pand met tal van leuke eet-en drinkgelegenheden, winkels en historische gebouwen rondom. Gratis parkeren op P+R, 5 minuten met pendelbus naar het centrum en studio op korte wandelafstand.
Belangrijke mededeling: mogelijke hinder door renovatiewerken aan historisch gebouw naast de studio.

The space
U verblijft in een heel nette, inspirerende moderne studio met alle voorzieningen. Snelle WIFI inbegrepen. Goed uitgeruste keuken om uw eigen potje te koken. Een heerlijke koffie of theetje zijn aanwezig. Afkoelen in de zomer (ook ventilator aanwezig), lekker warm nest gedurende de rest van het jaar. Gedesinfecteerd, goed gepoetst (producten aanwezig). Handdoeken, gels, body producten inbegrepen.

Guest access
Uw private studio is volledig ter uwer be
neighborhood_overview: Winkels, eet- en drinkgelegenheden, musea, cultuur, water: alles is mogelijk in de onmiddellijke omgeving. Uw studio bevindt zich in het midden van het historische centrum van Gent.
host_about:
Wij zijn ondernemende mensen die onze gasten graag in alle vrijheid Gent willen  laten ontdekken.
Zelf houden wij van een dagje aan zee of een stadsbezoek en een jaarlijkse reis naar Frankrijk met de kinderen om te genieten van het goede leven.

description: Studio Edville Gent biedt verschillende studio's aan in twee verschillende gebouwen. Gelegen aan het water in het kunstkwartier van het gezellige Gent. In de studio is een keukentje aanwezig met alle basisbenodigdheden, een badkamer met douche en toilet.
host_about:
We are Edward and Daphné, while traveling for our job we got to know airbnb. We love the concept and always have stayed in lovely places and met friendly people.
In the villa of my grandfather we started our adventure by renting out some beds, now we have 2 great locations. One is for big groups up to 32 persons just 5km of the center of Ghent and the other location are studio's in de center of Ghent. We love to share on airbnb. We love to meet new people and are sure you will love your stay with us.
We are an easygoing young couple and can give you lot's of information about the region, especially Ghent. 
We are working in our own company "ed", a baby and interior design studio. Our life motto is "every accomplishment starts with a dream"

"rooftop studio" is een gezellige en ruime studio met zonning terras, gelegen in de 19de eeuwse gordel van Gent, met heel wat bartjes, restaurants, winkels,... nabij het historisch centrum.
Je slaapt er in een fijn ingerichte dakstudio dat uitkijkt op de Gentse torens. Het heeft een knusse slaapkamer verstopt achter een groot gordijn, een kleine kitchentte, een open badkamer en een verrassend zonnig terras. De loft is voor 2 personen met 1 tweepersoonsbed.

name: Newly Renovated Cosy Apartment in City Center
description:
- Newly renovated apartment with a stylish Scandinavian design and a cosy feel
- Excellent location in the city center (Next to Gravensteen). Everything within walking distance.
- Great public transport to train stations (Gent-Sint-Pieters & Gent-Dampoort) and business centers (Dok Noord, Flanders Expo, Gent Zuid...)
- Easily reachable by car with plenty of parking solutions.
- Daily disinfection of doorhandles (Covid-19).

The space
You will be staying in a stylishly designed, Scandinavian inspired apartment with a cosy feel to it. It is the ideal place to explore the city with friends, family or colleagues!

- In the past year, the building has been completely renovated to the latest standards (incl. state-of-the art fire safety).
- A high chair and baby cot can be provided upon request
- Fresh bed linen and towels are provided

Guest access
You will have the entire loft to yourself, including a priva
neighborhood_overview:
Experience Ghent from it's beautiful historic center! Located right next to the Castle Of The Counts (aka Het Gravensteen), all the city's treasures are within walking distance:
- Veldstraat and Korenmarkt for shopping
- Korenmarkt and Vlasmarkt for going out
- Patershol and Graslei for restaurants and outside terrasses
- Lievekaai and Prinsenhof for a romantic walk
- A lot of museums (Design Museum, Huis Van Alijn, Kunsthal Gent), medieval churches, cathedrals, belfry... around the corner

All the while you are in a quiet neighbourhood without much street noise. You'll be hard-pressed to find a better location to explore the city from!

name: Deluxe Double/Twin Room in the city centre
description:
Cosy room for 1 or 2 guests, hidden in a quiet and narrow street in the heart of the city centre. The room has a DOUBLE BED, but can be prepared with TWIN BEDS upon request (before 1:00 pm on check-in day). The en-suite bathroom is equipped with a shower, bath towels, shampoo and a hairdryer. Stunning view of St. Bavo's Cathedral. Suitable for couples or friends.

The space
Our hotel is a little home right in the heart of the city. We have recently renovated the common areas downstairs based on our project for a "New Flandria Hotel", more connected to the city of Ghent. In our bar you can meet Betty Bijoux, a lady from the 20's who will be happy to serve you some good Belgian beers or strong Italian coffee : )

Guest access
You have access to your room and all the common areas of the building (hall, reception, breakfast room, bar).
neighborhood_overview: Our hotel is located in the heart of Ghent, a few steps away from St. Bavo's Cathedral, the Castle of Counts and other important attractions of the city. It is hidden in a little street surrounded by canals where you can admire the beautiful lights of the city. Thanks to its special position, you will be able to enjoy the most vibrant spots of the city, knowing you have a calm and cosy room waiting for you at walking distance.
host_about:
With only 22 rooms, our FLANDRIA HOTEL FEELS LIKE A HOME, a cosy place where you can find us: local, multilingual people, ready to welcome and help you. We are just 10 people here; a small family that’s happy to make you feel at home and to show you the best our city has to offer. Apart from the homely atmosphere, there are other reasons to stay at our place: 

PERFECT LOCATION – our hotel is hidden in a narrow and calm street, where you can sleep peacefully and dream the sweetest dreams. At the same time, we are close to the vibrant spots of the city where you can experience the best Belgian beer and the best city views.

BEST COFFEE IN TOWN – if you are a coffeeholic, our hotel is the place to be! In our bar you can drink a real Italian espresso and cappuccino, or try different specialities with coffee as the main ingredient. Our coffee provider (Caffè Pedron) is 100 % Italian – and nobody does coffee like the Italians do!

name: sunny townhouse in Gent
description:
Perfectly situated and recently renovated spacious townhouse in a quiet neighborhood at 15 min walk from Gent St-Pieters train station and 15 min walk from the historic city center. A direct tram connection gets you there even faster. There are two bikes available for you to explore the city.

The space
You have a separate bedroom on your own floor, with private toilet and bathroom with bathtub, rain-shower and sink. Showergel, shampoo and hairdryer are provided. The king size bed with Emma quality matras will provide for a relaxing sleep. Towels and bedlinen are provided.

Guest access
We will share the ground level: open dining area/breakfast bar/kitchen/living room and you have the possibility to use a modern, fully equipped kitchen. You also have access to the sunny rooftop terrace on the first floor, or if that gets too hot, the cosy city garden at ground level next to the living room always keeps it cool.

Other things to n
neighborhood_overview: The place is on the edge of the inner city, a 10 to 15 min walk to the historic city center. You will find several cosy café's en route to the city center. Nature reserve Bourgoyen is also close by, just outside of town. Several supermarkets, a bakery, and Ghent's most renowned 'frietkot' are all within 200 meters.
host_about: I like adventure traveling, mountain hiking, biking and road trips. I work as researcher in biological sciences, and a few years ago I finished Art Academy photography on the side. I am spontaneous and optimistic, and like getting to meet new people. I am happy to share my modern but cosy house with visitors looking to explore the wonderful and lively city of Ghent.

name: Casa Gante 9000 with garden and covered terrace!
description:
Beautiful renovated apartment with spectacular garden and covered terrace. Located in the arts neighbourhood of Ghent. Parks, shops bars and restaurants at walking distance

The space
You have the whole ground floor at your disposal with separate shower, toilet and kitchen, a glass door gives you acces to a spacious covered terrace and garden.

Guest access
The house is a spacious bell-etage house. You will stay in the renovated ground floor and we live upstairs. The ground floor has a bedroom and living room separated by a glass door. Further down the hall there is a toilet, shower, kitchen and acces to the terrace and garden. The basement can be used for clothes cleaning and drying. Everything upstairs is off limits to guests!

Other things to note
The house is a typical Belgian bell- etage, so you have the ground floor to your selfs and we live upstairs. we only share entrance and garden.
neighborhood_overview: Very nice neighborhood in the arts center of the city. Everything within walking distance. Bakkery, grocery, restaurants, bars within 1k. Also a splendid view from the garden on the city skyline.
host_about:
Hey, I've been living in Ghent for over 15 years. Ghent is the ideal mix between Brussels, Antwerp and Bruges. But most important Ghent is by far the most fun of all Belgian cities. It has a unique, lefty, young and dynamic atmosphere. With lots of nice restaurants and bars to go out and to have contact with the locals, because people in Ghent are multilingual and have a broad view on the world and his inhabitants!

As flight attendants  we’ve been travelling all over the world and had to stay in hotels. Hotel rooms are practically all the same and so I find it more enjoyable to stay in houses of local people. In addition you get more insight information wich I value.

My house is situated in the arts neighborhood and very close to the trainstation and the main highways entering the city.

Hallo, ik woon al 20 jaar in de mooiste maar vooral leukste stad van België. Ons huis staat in het centrum van de kunstenbuurt en is voorzien van alle comfort.

Wij reizen voor ons werk de hele wereld af en moeten noodgedwongen in hotels overnachten. Dat is vaak heel eentonig en saai. Daarom vinden wij reizen en slapen bij mensen thuis een mooi alternatief.

You can reach easliy the appartment by bus if you come from Ghent Sint Pietersstation ( bus 9 "Gentbrugge" or tram 2 from the city centre in 5 and 10 min.) Biking is a most in Ghent, in 7 min you are in the city centre. If you come by car, you take the exit "Gent Centrum" of the E40.

host_about:
Hi,
I am Afef and I have no age (as this is the most insignifcant thing to say about him/herself). I am a truely Ghentlover and native. But spend a lot of time abroad , either traveling or working. I am virtuous polyglote and lifelover. I enjoy hiking and dancing ( salsa mostly , but a big reggae chilling mover). I like exchanging experiences ( philosophical, linguistical, historiographical or spiritual). Ask me anything about literature, history and backpacking in Latin continent, I will be pleased to share my experdiences.

description:
Your room is bright, cosy and in the attic of my recently renovated house.
it is perfect for a young couple, for solo travelers or business people.
In the room you will find a comfortable bed, fresh linnen, fresh towels, a cupboard with drawers and you will also find plants.
The shared bathroom is one level below (first floor), it provides hot water, a walk-in rain shower, a toilet, 2 sinks (the one on the right hand side is mine),
more fresh towels if needed and all kinds of soap and shampoo.

The space
My house is located at less than 5 km from the city of Ghent, at a ridiculous walking distance from a bus stop (a bus which takes you to the historical centre in no time) and at 650 meters from the Merelbeke train station,
where you can jump on the train to go to Ghent Sint Pieters station (3 minutes), Brussels, Zaventem international airport and elsewhere in this amazing country.
If you are a guest in my house, you can use the ki
host_about:
Sociable, outgoing, welcoming and devoted.
I thrive when surrounded by genuine people, sitting together around a table filled with plenty of food and drinks, sharing experiences and life stories. My fridge is always full and the wine is always cold. I enjoy spending time at my place because there are books, wifi and an open door for welcoming friends and guests. My house in a row is a warm, open and green spot very close to Ghent.

name: Modern and comfortable apartment
description:
Enjoy sitting in the morning sun on the terrace overlooking a quiet city park.
Go for a nice walk or run via a pleasant foot path along the Scheldt to the beautiful Liedemeerspark or the impressive (240 Ha!) nature domain the Gentbrugse Meersen.
Visit the beautiful historic center or the many must-see cities around Ghent, such as Bruges, Antwerp and Brussels via easily accessible highways and public transport.

The space
The apartment has an equipped open kitchen, storage room, bathroom with shower, separate toilet, a bedroom with a large double bed, desk room and a terrace overlooking a quiet city park.
There is an underground parking space available and a covered bicycle storage area next to the building.
The neighbors are very quiet and friendly.

name: Modern apartment close to Flanders Expo
description:
Modern and stylish apartment on the outskirts of the lovely city Gent.

In walking distance to the ‘Flandes Expo’ event center and close to the train station Gent Sint-Pieters (+/- 1.5 km). It will take you about 10-15 min to reach the city center by bike or car.

If you travel by car, you have immediate access to the highways E40 (Brussels - Belgian coastline) and E17 (Antwerp/Netherlands - France).

There is a tram stop at the Flanders Expo that goes straight to the heart of the city center.

The space
Extra: free parking, netflix, city information (inside tips)
neighborhood_overview: The recreational (sport)park ‘de Blaarmeersen’ is just around the corner. More information on activities and getting around upon request!
host_about:
Hi! 

I am Koen, pronounced as in ha-koen-a matata or Koen-Fu :). Friends also call me a lot by my middle name: Roger!

Enjoying life to the fullest and truly happy when enjoying a nice drink in the presence of good company, preferably in an exciting location. When I am traveling, I try to get to know the city at an easy pace without going through a busy program. 

My apartment is located in the outskirts of the lovely city Gent, close to the train station and the 'Flanders Expo' event center. Also, the recreational (sport)park ‘de Blaarmeersen’ is just around the corner. By bike or car it takes 10-15 min to the city center (yes, it's the same!). 
If you travel by car, you have immediate access to the highways E40 (Brussels - Belgian coastline) and E17 (Antwerp/Netherlands - France).

Looking forward to meet you.
Koen (Roger)

The space
A big living area with dining table and fully equipped kitchen is to be found on our ground floor, on sunny days we invite you to have a drink on the terrace in our garden. Three big bedrooms and two bathrooms await you once you climb the stairs to the other floors.

We provide you with everything you need to have a great stay, but please note that there is no television in the house. You'll have soft towels and quality bedding. We provide you with coffee. If you want to cook, there's basic spices and oil available for you.

host_about: Angela and Boudewijn are retired “empty nesters” and enjoy traveling immensely.  When traveling ourselves, we very much like to stay in a real home, rather than a hotel. Ideaal qua bereikbaarheid met de auto (afslag Gent-Antwerpen E17), de trein (station Gent Dampoort & dan 12' het fiets-en wandelpad volgen) of de bus.

In deze buurt kan je heerlijk ontbijten, brunchen en shoppen. Ook op amper 20' wandelafstand, in de andere richting, 'Portus Ganda'. Deze jachthaven met de 'Gentse Lorelei' bevindt zich net naast de Sint-Baafsabdij, 1 van de meest poëtische historische sites van Gent. Hier geen gebrek aan gezellige terrasjes, betaalbare restaurants en hippe cafés.
Een half uurtje wandelen van de Gentse universiteit site Sint-Pietersnieuwstraat/Blandijn.
Op 20' van een zwembadcomplex en een kwartiertje van een 240 ha groot natuurreservaat langs de Schelde met een fiets- en wandelpad. Ideaal voor joggers of om te bekomen na dat nachtje stappen...

name: Master Bedroom in Ghent (8 min. from center)
description:
Welcome to our house near the waterside in Ghent. We are situated in a quiet area with easy access to the city center and the train stations (tram stop is 1 minute away).

We offer towels, soap, and laundry service. In our kitchen you'll find coffee, tea, cooking herbs, olive oil, pots and pans, utensils. All are free to use.

This is a family-owned house with 2 Airbnb rooms. We are cleaning and disinfecting our rooms after each guest and we maintain social distancing.

The space
Ground Floor: living room, kitchen, toilet, and bathroom.
First Floor: we have 2 x Airbnb rooms available.
Second Floor: we have reserved the second floor as a private space.

This master bedroom has a private toilet and sink attached.

Guest access
All the common spaces and your own private room.
neighborhood_overview:
This entire city area has been renovated by the city government to include a new shopping center, housing projects, public schools, cultural venues, etc. Our street has just been renovated. The wobbly and narrow pavement has been replaced by a broad and flat one, and we all have a small facade garden now. Also the tramway and the parking spaces are brand-new.

Within 500 m of our house:
• ING Bank ATM
• Q8 Gas station
• Tram & Bus stops
• Dok Noord Shopping Center:
- Supermarket
- Pharmacy
- Fitness
- Coffee
- Sports Bar

In een zeer rustige buitenwijk van Gent op 4 km van het stadscentrum in een verkaveling uit de jaren 60. Alles gelijkvloers. U hebt als gast de beschikking over een studio met aparte ingang, overdekt terras, privé tuin, autostaanplaats en 2 fietsen. name: Ghent - the place to be The Cactus Room 2pax
description:
This guesthouse is located in the lively Brugse Poort neighbourhood in the city of Ghent.
Super cozy room on the second floor, it’s the perfect base for a weekend away.
1.8km from the centre of the city, an easy walking distance along the canal or 5 mins with the bike or public transportation.
Communal kitchen, dining, living, bathroom and courtyard.
Owned by an Australian, shared with other Airbnb guests.
Note - The city of Ghent charges a tax of €3 per person per night.

Other things to note
Tourist tax in Europe 2020.

In Ghent, tourists are obligated to pay an overnight accommodation tax.
This city tax is €3 per person per night.
This can be paid on arrival in cash.

name: Bright room in Art-deco House, Top location
description:
Bright spacious room in a newly renovated art deco house from the early 40's. Located in the heart of Ghent. You have a private kitchen + bathroom (shared w/ the 1 other airbnb-room) and we provide a set table so you've got a 'private restaurant' feeling. There's a lot of great take-aways in our street (such as Shazanna, Edgar Kaasbar, Golden Gai, Mission Massala, Baravins, ... We also have a cat called Dennis, who will give you the warmest welcome!

The space
The 3rd floor is only for our Airbnb-guests. We have 2 airbnb-rooms with a shared bathroom & kitchen.
neighborhood_overview: Our house is situated on a top location in Ghent: very central and easy accessible. All the restaurants, cafés etc are just around the corner (just like the famous Charlatan or St. Jacobs-church).
host_about: We're Clara & Agnör, a young couple from Belgium, Ghent. Agnör is working as a manager at the Airport, and Clara is working in photography & marketing. We both love traveling, electronic music, food, meeting new people and our cat Dennis.

name: Artist Loft
description:
Set in a townhouse in the heart of historical Ghent, a 10-minute walk from the Belfry, St Bavo’s Cathedral and Gravensteen’s castle, you can find the Artist’s Loft. Located in an old ‘cité’ recently renovated by Monument services, and decorated with original works of art, this loft offers painting and drawing facilities as well as free WiFi. It features two levels with a seating area on each, and coffee and tea facilities, micro-wave and minibar on the top level.

The space
The loft comes with a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer, free toiletries and bathrobes. For breakfast, lunch or dinner guests can visit one of the many establishments in the immediate surroundings.

name: M/S Carpe-Diem "Cargo Hold" - Loft on a Barge
description:
M/S Carpe-Diem, "Seize-the-Day", is a barge built in 1951. The ship is moored in the old docklands of Ghent and has been transformed into an exceptional, eco-friendly home.
The ship's cargo hold has been renovated into a contemporary, loft-like residence of 65 square meter, with all modern comfort, including a heated outdoor pool with jet stream.
The cargo hold accommodates maximum 4 people, with two separate bedrooms with double beds.  Ideal for tourists and expatriate professionals.

The space
The ship, with registration n° 0600465, was purchased from a retired skippers couple in 2014.  The vessel had always been used to transport goods (e.g., wheat, steel rolls, etc.).  The ship measures 39,10 meter long by 5,05 meters wide.  It is powered by a still functional 268 kW Cummins Marine diesel engine.
​
The renovations started in 2015, based on a novel concept whereby the cargo hold remained intact and the main residence - consisting of conta
host_about:
Hello, I am Filip, father of two beautiful daughters and husband of an exceptional wife.

A few years ago we bought an old ship - actually in a flash of absolute lack of sense of reality.  In the meantime, we have renovated the ship and transformed it into a modern home.  Feel free to view the photos, the ship is the ideal base camp for exploring the city of Ghent and Flanders.

Travel safely ... and maybe see you soon, in Ghent.

Filip & C°

name: Stay aboard our 1914 Dutch Klipperaak
description:
We very much regret that due to the ongoing Coronavirus pandemic bookings are limited to guests who have been double vaccinated and have their official COVid19 Safe Certificate.

SUMMER BOOKINGS:
Our barge is moored in Gent from 1st October through to 31st March. From 1st April to 30th September we are travelling with the barge and bookings are limited during this time. Please contact us to enquire about availability.

The space
You are warmly welcomed aboard our beautiful 1914 Dutch Klipperaak barge. Check in is between 1500 - 2100hrs. We hope you will be very comfortable here with us. Our guest suite is dedicated to you for the duration of your stay and it is priced on a per night basis for up to two people. No discounts or single occupancy rate is offered. All bed linens, towels and basic toiletries are provided for our guests comfort and use during their stay onboard with us. Our minimum stay is 2 nights (longer by arrangement). Breakfa
neighborhood_overview:
Our mooring is in the city and you are minutes away on foot from a plethora of shops, cafes, bars and many other visitor sites and attractions. We are happy to recommend various eateries based on our personal dining experience, so please do ask.
Parking: we do not have dedicated parking onsite, nor are we permitted a 'residents parking permit' as we do not own a car. However, there are various public parking options nearby. Some street parking is available on a first come first served basis and time limits will apply for the gratis (free) and paid (via street meter) spaces that are available. Ghent operates a park and ride system in addition to the many larger public carparks dotted around the area. All the information you might need regarding parking in the city is readily available on the internet for you to consider before making your booking.

name: Vrijdagmarkt Apartment (entire place)
description:
Newly renovated cosy and spacious apartment in the heart of Ghent. Located above a supermarket on one of the main squares of the center in a quiet pedestrian zone. All comfort and kitchen equipment available. All city's points of interest bars and main restaurant on walk distance. Big underground public parking in front of the apartment for €1.80 per hour and €1.00 after 7PM-9AM

The space
The guests can use all apartment.
neighborhood_overview: Its really central. The apartment is located in the heart of the city center, it is walk distance of all tourist attractions and the bests restaurants in town.
host_about:
Hello. Im Tais from Brazil, i live in Ghent, with my boyfriend Tim. We love to travel. We love our privacy.
For our guests: we will be here to help and attend you always but we like to have our privacy and space. We rent the room and you can use the kitchen for a quick meal prep and the fridge. The living room to eat or take a quick picture. But we like our space. You are free to use the toilet and the bathroom as many times you want but the living room and the kitchen its the places we love to stay so use the minimum. The room its totally private and separated from the rest of the house so you will have your space there and privacy. We have our own room too.

name: Cozy room with bikes
description:
A cosy room in a bright appartement, located 10 minutes walk away from the historical city center ? That's what you'll find here! Ideally located to visit Ghent and its surroundings.

It will be our pleasure to host you and to give you tips to make the most of your stay in Ghent.

The space
You'll have your private room with a double bed, a desk and and a shelf.
You are also very welcome to use the fully equipped kitchen, where tea and coffee are at your disposal, the living room, the bathroom, the toilet and the small terrace. All these areas are shared with us.
There's wifi everywhere.
neighborhood_overview:
The appartment is located in a residential area. It is 10 minutes by foot to the city center. On your way there, you'll find various restaurants and cafés.

If you want to catch some fresh air or do a picnic, recreational parc Blaarmeersen is also easily reachable (15 minutes by foot). Nature reserve Bourgoyen-Ossemeersen is a 30 minute walk or 10 minutes by bike or public transport.
Facilities nearby: bars, bakery, big supermarket, gym, swimming pool, ...

name: Duplex Apt in City Centre with Terrace
description:
This spacious duplex apartment is perfect to discover Ghent, it is situated in the historic heart of Ghent, ideal to enjoy the cultural medieval city. Within 2 min walk, you have all the landmarks that Medieval Ghent has to offer; Graslei, Korenmarkt, the Castle of Counts, St Bavo's Cathedral, the Design museum and much more. You can enjoy the good weather on the terrace or have a cosy night inside, enjoying Netflix.

The space
The apartment is situated on the fourth floor and has 2 bedrooms with 2 double beds. The duplex has a great view on the Castle of Counts. The terrace offers an amazing view over historic Ghent.

Guest access
The whole apartment is accessible to guests.

Other things to note

name: Shelter 7 - your hideout for Oikofilia
description:
Een heel stadswoning voor jullie alleen? Shelter7 is een moderne architecturale parel midden in het centrum van Gent. Een mix van brutalisme, minimalisme en Wabi Sabi.
De voorgevel bestaat uit een betonnen structuur, die de krijtlijn vormt van een oude afdruk. De vide brengt licht van buiten naar binnen. Een verrassende combinatie van 3 etages bestemd om elke gast tot rust te brengen. Oikofilie op zijn best.
Shelter7 is een B&E, een bed & experience, het biedt extra ervaringen op maat.

The space
Shelter7. Een inspirerende ruimte die Wabi Sabi uitademt en fungeert als rustpunt, een stilteoord binnen de bruisende stad. Een plek die je even naar een hoger niveau tilt en die jou en je gasten bijblijft, modern met een hoek af, een onafgewerkte cirkel van zenitude.
neighborhood_overview: Midden in het historisch stadscentrum, op 50 meter van het Belfort, op 100 meter van het stadshuis en stadshal, op 250 meter van de Graslei en op minder als 500 meter van het Gravensteen. Maar toch in een gezellig, rustiger straatje.
host_about: Happy, curious, positive person who likes to travel, meet, learn, explore and meet new people & energies

name: Studio Black Cat — Ghent downtown
description:
Cosy studio hidden behind Ghent's greenest facade. Fully furnished for a short break or long stay in the heart of Medieval Flanders.

The space
Our studio has a private entrance, its own bathroom, an equipped kitchen, a dining space and a sleeping area. It has windows on both sides of the house so there is ample light at any time of the day. Wooden floors all over, give the room a cosy touch.
The kitchen is fully furnished, has a small fridge, microwace, coffee machine and water kettle. We provide coffee & tea, and some herbs for your cooking comfort.
The bathroom comes with fresh towels, has a toilet, bath tub & shower and sink. Close to the bathroom there are plenty of closets to store your clothes.
The dining area seats three, and a comfy chair will give you a space to sit back and relax.
The bed (160cm width) comes with high quality Auping matresses, is covered with a down duvet and fresh bed linnen.

Guest access
The
neighborhood_overview:
Our studio is located in the city centre. As the city of Ghent is not a gigantic metropolis, all must sees are within walking distance. Public transport is just around the corner, and the connection to both of Ghent's train stations is excellent.
How about a morning stroll along the gorgeous 'Visserij', taking you straight into Portus Ganda? Or wander through the cobblestone squares and alleys along the towers of the city's historic heart?
Around the corner you'll find an artisanal bakery and a small supermarket providing you with everything to kickstart your day.
We have a few excellent restaurants - a bit off the beaten track - within 5 minutes walking distance: Elvire (€) serves the best burgers in town, Viva la Puglia (€€) does Italy at its best & De Fobie (€€) serves a traditional Belgian cuisine. Bar Bask (€€€) is an eclectic Basque style restaurant with pintxos to die for!

name: Art-deco townhouse with city garden and rooftop
description:
Spacious townhouse in Gent

Spacious art-deco house in Gent, close to train station Gent-Sint-Pieters. The house is newly renovated and provides all modern facilities and luxury.

There is a fully equiped kitchen which is spacious enough to cook in for larger groups.

There are two bathrooms and a seperate toilet.

There is a lovely city garden with a barbecue. There's also a rooftop terrace on the first floor.

This house is perfect for being together with family or friends.

The space
The house still has a lot of its authentic elements. Built in 1935, there are a lot of art-deco elements that can be found in the house. Especially the doors, the staircase and the wooden floors are examples of the art-deco style. We combined old and new during our renovation. In the living room you can find a concrete floor and large windows. This combination of old and new gives the house a unique aesthetic.

Guest
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in Gent. Train station Gent-Sint-Pieters is just a 5 min walk away. The house is located in a very quiet and residential area of Gent. There's not a lot of traffic and almost no noise.

We have two parks at walking distance; the 'Overmeersen' and the 'Blaarmeersen'.

There is a bakery at the beginning of the street.

We have two grocery stores at walking distance (1. Proxy Delhaize Sint-Pieters;
- Koningin Fabiolaan / 2. Carrefour Express - Koningin Maria Hendrikaplein 7, 9000 Gent) and a larger one a bit further (Delhaize Watersportbaan).

The historical centra is within walking distance (+-30min) but you can also rent bikes or use public transport, more about that in 'Transport'.
host_about:
We are a young couple living in Ghent. Simon works in EU affairs and Robin is a teacher. We have a busy schedule so we will not bother you. We are always ready for all your questions! We love to go out for dinner so can give you tips where to eat or go for drinks. 

We hope you will choose our place. We are looking forward to hosting you.

name: Urban Loft | A unique spot to start your discovery
description:
Welcome at Urban Loft. Together with my husband Joachim we created this place situated in 'Machariuswijk' in the city center of Ghent. Urban Loft offers two private rooms with both their own private terrace and bathroom (both can be reserved separately).

If you like to enjoy, relax and discover Ghent
If you like to start your discovery in a unique place (building, room, environment)
If you are a food lover & desire to discover more?

--> Meaning common ground <--

Urban Loft is your spot.

The space
A double bedroom with a private bathroom AND a private terrace.
It is possible to rent two (identical) rooms when you are travelling with 3 or 4.

Guest access
You have access to your own bedroom, private bathroom and private terrace.
neighborhood_overview:
We are situated in a very unique part of Ghent. Unique in a way that we live within the city center of Ghent amongst a true diversity AND very close to transport possibilities, including railway station (Gent Dampoort) which is in fact the true main station as it is the closest to the city center.

This neighbourhood offers also nice restaurants and places to discover without being annoyed by too many people or noises.
From this place you can discover anything you want within the city center on foot. If you like to explore it differently you can, there are places where you can rent a bike, boat, stand up paddle, ...

You receive our personal recommendations and information in a brochure we have made for our guests. You receive this upon your arrival or earlier.
host_about:
Hi. I am Anissa. Mother of Nina, happily married to my husband Joachim and owner of my business. What do we have in common? Quite some things but what is really clear is that we are all three food (&drink) lovers. 

For business trips I choose to be in an inspiring environment where I can be at ease. I love to learn and support growing other people.

When going on a trip with my family we love to discover places and explore local habits (foods and drinks included ;) as well as beautiful architecture. 
Once in a year we take a longer break were we slow down, reflect on the past year at different levels, relax and enjoy each others presence. 

We also opened 'UrbanLoft' ourselves in Sept 2020. A lovely place in the heart of Ghent /Belgium.

name: b3a: Luxury apartment with terrace in city center
description:
Brand new apartment in the city center. 50 meters from the townhouse and the shopping streets. The apartment has comfortable furniture, 2 great beds and a nice bath.

You can grab a free coffee while cooking in the fully equipped kitchen or go out to one of the many restaurants within walking distance. The private terrace gives you the possibility to take a breath of fresh air.

Public parking space at 50 meters. (P1 vrijdagsmarkt) or Tolhuis parking at 1km (8€/24h)

The space
Spacious living room with digital tv, dining table for 6.
Private kitchen and bathroom with shower.

Guest access
The entire apartment is at your disposal.
neighborhood_overview: The building is in the city center next to the city hall and shopping streets. Lots of bars, restaurants and great architecture are just around the corner.

name: Spacious first floor house with homely feeling
description:
You rent from us a recently renovated first floor home. You enter through a private groundfloor front door, and arrive on the first floor in one open living space and connecting green and south-facing roof terrace.

On the second floor there is a hall with seating area and adjoining terrace + the master bedroom and bathroom. A second smaller but cozy bedroom is located under the roof. Nicely integrated custom furniture keeps the rooms sober and tidy.

The space
This first floor house has been finished to perfection. Renovated with an eye for light and spaciousness. Large glass surfaces give every room a lot of daylight and an unobstructed view. Finishes in soft gray tones combined with bleached wood give the house a relaxed atmosphere. Decorations and furniture are tuned to each other and provide a warm and homely feeling. Two terraces (one on each floor) give breathing space to the house and a view of the green inner area.
neighborhood_overview:
You stay in a quiet residential area 10 minutes from the center (bicycle / tram), close to a train station, and easy connection with the motorway.

There is always parking space in front and a tram stop + bakery within walking distance (300 m). Also there is a large nature park (Gentbrugse meersen) close by.

name: Bright studio close to the city center
description:
Bright studio on the 1st floor of a well maintained building with access to a south-west oriented terrace.
It 's situated close the railway station Ghent Dampoort (2 min. walking) and the city centre of Ghent (only 15 min walking distance – 1 km).
Attention: no elevator in the building.

The space
The studio has a fitted kitchen, bathroom with shower and toilet and a living room with access to the terrace.

Guest access
The railway station Ghent Dampoort is very close to the studio (2 min walking).
Free parking is available at the P+R Weba/Decathlon with free shuttle bus.

I’m Ine, born and raised in Bruges but moved to Ghent after my studies.
Working in Ghent for a student housing company.

name: Eco-guesthouse in the historic center of Ghent
description:
Room & Moor is a small-scale "bouteco" guesthouse. Perfect central location a stone's throw from Ghent's historic center. It is located on the hip Ghent left bank, with nice shops and nice restaurants nearby. We opted for a basic design with many recovery materials. The bathroom is completely open to preserve the architecture of the building. The decoration was applied by the Ghent graffiti artist StudioBamBam ...

Guest access
We have a self check-in system. You will receive a code on the day of arrival. You can check in whenever you want after 14pm! Check out must be before 11am.

name: Ground floor apartment with terrace
description:
- Beautiful and spacious apartment located in a prime location in Ghent.
- Enjoy the terrace in summer
- The apartment is equipped with all modern comfort so that you feel completely at home.
- You will be able to self check-in yourself upon arrival.

The space
This is a perfect accommodation for 2 in a great location in the centre of Gent, easily walkable to the centre of the town, restaurants, cafes, a park and local shops. The kitchen is very well equipped and the apartment has everything you might need. There's a bathroom w shower, sink and toilet. There's an efficient check-in/check-out process.

Free fast WiFi is available during your stay.

The accommodation is located on the ground floor (level 0)

The apartment also comes with the following:
- clean 100% cotton sheets and towels - all pressed of course!
- shampoo and shower gel
- basic cooking essentials

We really hope you enjoy yo
neighborhood_overview: We’re situated in the medieval centre of Ghent. The neighborhood is characterized as cozy and vibrant. A lot of restaurants and bars are just around the corner at walking distance. The main attractions in Ghent are easily reached on foot: Korenmarkt, Sint-Michiels church, St Niklaas church, the Belfry, St Baafscathedral, Graslei, Gravensteen, Vrijdagsmarkt, St Jacobs church, Portus Ganda, Patershol, Kouter, etc. You're right in the city center so everything you need is within walking distance; tourist sights, attractions, grocery stores, public transportation, etc. We'll gladly give  you information about all this when you arrive.
host_about:
Being born and raised in Ghent, I have a particulair and profound love for this magnificent city. Although I've always lived here, I still enjoying strolling around, looking up at the beautiful facades of the houses. Everytime I still discover something new, that's why I love this city so much. Ever changing, but yet so full of history.
I enjoy cooking and travelling to far off places to discover new cultures and habits. I hope your stay with us in our city can procure you joy and amazement

name: Spacious bedroom in the green region of Ghent
description:
We're happy to welcome you to our home!

Spacious bedroom on the second floor with kingsize bed (1m80 - box spring mattress), own sink, cosy living area with tea corner and touristic information.

Our shared bathroom has a shower, standalone bath, 2 sinks, toilet and all supplies you need. There's an extra toilet on the ground floor.

You're welcome in our garden with view over the fields! You may use our BBQ during summer.

The space
The room is situated on the second floor of our house. You can only reach it through the stairs in the main hallway. The bathroom is close to your bedroom. All rooms can be locked.

Other things to note
Non-smoking home.
neighborhood_overview: During your stay you'll have 2 FREE bicycle available. Our home is surrounded by nature and lays on the Knooppuntenroute (Google: Fietsnet - knooppunt 69) so there are a lot of bicycle trails a stone's throw away. Our garden borders the fields (hello, cows!) so you'll also find a lot of hiking trails worth a shot.
host_about:
Hi, I’m Louise and I’m living with my fiancé and most adorable cat in Drongen, my hometown since I was born. 

Drongen is only a 15-minute drive away from Ghent. The highway to Bruges and Brussels is around the corner. We lived a few months in the city center of Ghent but I couldn’t miss the countryside so we came back and bought our first home. 
Our best neighbors are the cows & they sure give us a spectacular view from the garden. If you love nature, you can use our bikes and go for a nice drive alongside the river Leie. Drongen is also known as “the green lungs of Ghent”!

name: Studio in my cozy  house nearby city center
description:
This house is 5 minutes by bike from the city center or 15 minutes walking distance. Everything is provided for a comfortable stay (wifi, TV, kitchen, bathroom,). The bedroom is a kind of studio with its own lounge and dining table. Everything is quite close: a shop on the corner of the street, a park around the corner. From here you can just as well take a pleasant walk along the water and easily enter the city life. Welcome to Ghent!

The space
The studio is on the top floor, is a bright space with its own lounge, TV with google chrome, Tea and coffee is provided. Cutlery and plates + cups are also provided. The Mezannine has a double bed. There is a wardrobe with bed linen, extra duvet and pillows, towels and a hairdryer. The bathroom is one floor lower and can be shared with me (provided toiletries). The kitchen on the ground floor can of course also be used (please use your own food) if desired. Here, too, everything is provided for a comfortable stay. There
neighborhood_overview: This house is located in a quiet area near the center. It is near the water and parks! So you can also take nice walks starting from the house along the water and so on towards a nature reserve. My neighborhood has a nice atmosphere with quiet pleasant people. There is also a neighborhood shop on the corner of my street and a bakery close by. Public transport is also no problem and is within walking distance of Gent-Dampoort Station.

name: Green, spacious and bright appt in centre of Ghent
description:
This bright and spacious apartment offers everything for a nice stay in the centre of Ghent! You will be at walking distance (only 10 mins) of the Korenmarkt and other hotspots in the beautiful city! Furthermore we have 1 double bed and 1 smaller double bed in a separate bedroom. The linen from "De Witte Lietaer" as well as the shampoo, soap, toilet paper and wifi are foreseen for every reservation. You will be able to park right next to the accommodation. Enjoy our beautiful city!

Other things to note
There is a television in the apartment, but there's only a Chromecast available. So no digital (cable) TV.

There are parking spaces in front of the building, would these be occupied, then there is a big parking across the building (50m).
Price: 0,50€ for 1 hour or 3€ for 24 hours, free after 19h (7PM) and before 9h (9AM) and free on Sundays.

We have a place where bikes can be stored (not inside the building), this is only available for
neighborhood_overview: I love going to WOEST or Café Congé, and they are close to the accommodation as well!

name: Leuke stijlvolle kamer met privé badkamer
description:
Moderne slaapkamer met eigen badkamer, op enkele minuten van het Sint-Pietersstation. Openbaar vervoer (trein, bus, tram, taxi,...) in de onmiddellijke omgeving. Ook dichtbij het stadscentrum van Gent. Geniet van de toffe authentieke winkeltjes zoals Tierentyn mosterd, het kleinste huisje van Gent is nu een drankgelegenheid 't Galgenhuisje. Of degusteer in Het Bierhuis aan de Waterkant van een lekker Belgisch biertje. Stadswandelingen zijn ook aan te raden en kan verzorgd worden.

The space
Je verblijft in een pas vernieuwde slaapkamer met tweepersoonbed (160cm) met eigen badkamer en bureau. TV en WiFi (of netwerk), kleine frigo, Nespresso en waterkoker aanwezig. !! Keuken is enkel te gebruiken bij langere verblijven vanaf 4weken!!

Guest access
enkel toegang tot eigen kamer

Recent vernieuwd, veel bewegingsruimte (2 etages). description: Een charmante gezinswoning met tuin in een groene omgeving, op 10 min rijden van het centrum van Gent. name: JunoBoat floating  accommodation on the water
description:
JunoBoat is een unieke vakantiewoning voor maximum 8 personen op het water, gecombineerd met hotelservice. (Opgemaakte bedden en handdoekenpakket zijn inbegrepen in de prijs.)

De vakantiewoning op het water beschikt over 3 aparte slaapkamers met douche en/of ligbad met zicht op de Muinkschelde. De binnentuin verhoogt het vakantiegevoel alsook de gezellige zitruimte en volledig ingerichte keuken.

The space
Junoboat is een woonboot met 3 slaapkamers, twee badkamer, een volledig ingerichte keuken en een zithoek. Junoboat heeft een moderne uitstraling.
neighborhood_overview:
Junoboat is gelegen in de Stropkaai, dicht bij het S.M.A.K gent. Gent is een fantastische stad waar er via zijn uitgebreid net van waterwegen tot in het ommeland zeer veel pittoreske hoekjes te ontdekken zijn.

VlotGent biedt je varende terrassen aangedreven met fluister-stille elektromotoren, die enkel op basis van zonne- en windenergie worden voortgestuwd.
host_about:
Hallo,
Wij zijn moeder en dochter en kunnen heel goed samenwerken. Ik werk in de Immo wereld, dus administratieve taken zijn mij niet vreemd. Mijn mama neemt het praktische voor haar rekening (inrichting, poetsen enzoverder). Beide geven we de gasten graag een welkom gevoel aan onze mooie westkust en onze vakantieboot in Gent

name: Imagine! Sleeping in the centre of Medieval Ghent
description:
Burgstraat 17 is an old Patrician house constructed in 1515. Later the house was split in 2 houses and became neglected for many years. In 2019 we started the renovation, with as only purpose, to keep the soul and respect the history and grandeur of the original house.
Its exceptional history, unique architecture and central position made it worth doing so.
Tears, joy and a lot of work resulted in the place where you are right now. We hope you enjoy and respect this place as much as we do.

The space
We created this apartment as a place of relaxation for ourselves. We are proud to share with you
1) Abundance of natural light
2) Authenticity and respect for the history
3) Comfort with subtle flavours of luxury and comfort
4) Personal well-being and relaxation

Other things to note
No breakfast, lunch or dinner services provided
Own linnen: -10€/booking
Own cleaning: -10€/booking

This is a pri
neighborhood_overview: The accomodation is located in the car free centre, in the middle of many romantic restaurants , typical bars,  historical buildings such as the Gravensteen, Korenmarkt, Graslei, .... and the shopping area. The parking is reachable by car. Normal electricity is available for charging.

name: Be our next Guest in Ghent
description:
We welcome you and offer you a cosy room in our beautiful house in a residential street, in close proximity of public transports to the city center of Ghent. South facing garden. Parking available for free right in front of the property. There are two lovely cats living in the house as well.

The space
We welcome you in our spacious spare room. Bathroom is shared but very large and clean. There is a walk in shower and a large corner bath. Breakfast is served in our open plan kitchen with a view on the south facing garden. During the summer months, breakfast can be served on the terrace or in our outdoor patio area.

Guest access
Parking is free in our street. To enter the city center of Ghent, we advice you to take the Tram. Line 1, direction 'Flanders Expo' will take you to the city center in less than 15 minutes. You get off the tram at 'Gravesteen' or 'Koremarkt' and you're right in the center of Ghent. Travel passes can be foun
