description:
This clean and trendy apartment 2 bedroom apartment with terrace is perfect for leisure or for business stays if you need to be in or around Belgium. It is equipped with all the necessary amenities for you to enjoy (either short stay or medium stay). It has easy access to al nearby highways, a tram line that runs straight to the city centre of Ghent and this while being in a quiet neighbourhood. The apartment is also located close to a supermarket and there is free parking on the premises.

The space
The apartment is newly decorated and equipped with all the necessary amenities. It is equipped with floor heating thats always cosy and comfortable during those chilly winter nights.

Guest access
the whole apartment is for the guests
neighborhood_overview: Its located in the suburbs of Ghent with easy access to every highway that lead you to Brussels (40 min), Antwerp (40 min), Bruges (30 min), Courtrai (30 min)  and Ypres (40 min). The tram line that stops near the apartment brings you to the city centre in 20min or if you go by bike it takes you 15-20 min. Ghent EXPO is 5-10min drive and the technology park in Ghent is practically walking distance.

Ghent is an awesome European City to visit, there is always something to do and to visit. Thats why I  would love to share my apartment with people who want to explore a medieval city with a touch of trendy.
I am self-employed at this moment and an everlasting student of knowledge and I hope we can meet during one of your stays.

name: Heaven@11, a jewel among other historic buildings!
description:
Heaven @11 is an apartment on floor 1 & 2 of a small historic house in the medivial center of Gent.
Although the street is a pedestrian zone, you can reach the location by car. Shops, restaurants, museums etc . . .

The space
The apartment is spacious & features a private terras, fully equiped kitchen and large dining area on the first floor. The second floor has a sitting
area with broad library and an ensuite bedroom with flat screen TV, comfortable bed, private bathroom with shower and fast WiFi connection. The view in front and the back of the house are both typical charming scenes of an authentique medieval quarter in East Flanders.
neighborhood_overview: Het Patershol is een oude wijk in het historische centrum van de Belgische stad Gent en telt een gesloten stratenpatroon dat het uit de middeleeuwen heeft bewaard. Deze bijzonder mooie hoek van Gent is een stad-in-de-stad. Vergeet even waar je bent en laat je onderdompelen in de middeleeuwen. Snuif de nostalgie van oude leefgewoonten op. Geniet van architectuur en kunst. En zeker van de pittoreske straten vol gezellige restaurants, volkse cafés en hippe bars. Het Patershol en de omgeving werden in 1981 beschermd als stadsgezicht.
host_about:
P Roelens, interior architect.
K Vandekerkhove, visual communication

neighborhood_overview: The accommodation can't be more central (!), located in a very calm alley between the waterside and one of the main shopping streets. Korenmarkt, Vrijdagsmarkt, Gravensteen all super close... The ideal hideout to explore thé most beautiful city of Belgium.
host_about:
Hi, we are Astrid and Gilles, 27 and 33. Born and raised in Moorslede and Bruges, we studied in Ghent and in Brussels. We fell in love and decided to settle in the beautiful city of Ghent. Whilst looking for a place to live, we bumped into what could be considered as one of the most centralised houses of Ghent. The house was old, dark and didn’t catch a lot of sunlight, but we saw a lot of possibilities to transform it into a little paradise in the ancient centre, close to all the hip and trendy places this city has to offer. As we travel a lot ourselves, we think we know what it takes to have a pleasant stay and discovering new cities and countries. We transformed the house in an ideal place for friends and guests visiting Ghent. By the summer of 2020 the house was finished.   
We hope you enjoy it as much as we do. 
Welcome in Ghent! 
Astrid & Gilles

description:
Always wanted to sleep on the water? This former captains lodge on a ship has a cosy and modern interior on the waters in Ghent. It is perfect for couples or singles who want to explore the city centre and combine it with an unique experience.
Sleeping on the water gives you the feeling of sleeping inside with the outside feeling.
Next to the boat studio on the same boat is a private tattooshop. On the deck there is at sunny weather a summer bar !!

The space
The boat studio was recent renovated with a modern and cosy touch with al the comfort you need. Yet it is recommended to be flexible with stairs and steps. Your stay on a boat gives you a unique experience.

host_about:
I'm an artist working and living in Ghent, Flanders in Belgium. I love to go to city's where's a lot of great art and a vibe in the city. I have a great husband, who is an interior designer, and two young children; Poppy and Lucky. We love doing city trips with our friends or just the two of us. We love to stay in large and cosy locations, because we need the space to relax. Beside City trips we like visiting nature and locations with wellness facilities. We embrase every day as a gift and live life to the fullest.  
The boathouse i'm advertising on airbnb we renovated ourselves. We made the studio with our passion for furniture. We want that guests feel themselves comfortable and enjoy it and feel the positive energy we've put in this project.

name: Spacious renovated bungalow near Ghent
description:
Newly renovated house with garden in the green region of Ghent. You will have access to the whole house with 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a spacious open plan living room and kitchen. 2 rooms are located on the ground floor. The Master bedroom is located on the first floor. The property has private free parking for up to 3 cars and is located near Drongen train station (5min walk). The bus to the historic city center of Ghent is almost in front of the door (25m)!

The space
The house is located in a quiet neighborhood close to public transport. All the rooms are spacious, very light and fully equipped. You can use everything that you will need during your stay. The bedrooms on the ground floor have a view on the garden and one of them has direct access. The Master bedroom is located on the first floor.

Guest access
You will have access the whole house!

This beautiful accommodation is truly a wonderful location to stay at. Perfect to explore & enjoy the culture, history, energy & food of this amazing city.

Welcome in our 'Oak House' , you will feel right at home in lovely Ghent!

The space
This comfortable studio is on the second floor (level +2) of a beautiful building.

It is a clean, modern studio that provides you all the comfort you need: private bathroom with bath, double bed, fridge, hairdry

name: Villa Brutalisma* Famed Architect! Nature @t Gent
description:
Exentrieke Scandinavische villa is gebouwd & geklasseerd bij Naoorlogs Erfgoed Vlaanderen . Op een boogscheut van het charmante Gent . Ideaal voor 10 personen. Verhoogde Zuid patio met zicht op natuurgebied , paardjes en kastelen en bossen. Een buurtwinkeltje 7/7 open is. Bakkers & Hazenveld & Galische hoeve een heel fijne brouwerij op wandelafstand.
Hier vertoeven is een beleving , grote tuin & klein bosje met vuurpit en boomhutje
Stad & natuur gaan hier hand in hand . Welkom & Enjoy!

The space
De villa is in de vorm van een vlinder. Volledig symmetrisch en alles is nog maar net verbouwd van 2020. Een open keuken met zicht op de velden, terras met de zon die opkomt. Een eetruimte , een living met als hart een gezellige pellet kachel in het midden. Een bureelruimte ( met slaapsofa voor 2 personen) Beneden een eigen badkamer met toilet. Bovenverdiep telt 3 slaapkamers. + Badkamer met bad en douche. Een mezzanine met leesplekje .

Guest acc

name: Whole Apartment 3 mins. from Central Train Station
description:
Cozy apartment 3 minutes from the central train station of Ghent, thanks to which it has great, direct transport options to all Belgian airports and transport hubs, big cities like Brussels, Bruges, and Antwerp, and all major attractions.

Fully equipped kitchen and bathroom, two double bed bedrooms, and located in a lovely neighborhood. The apartment is also well-connected with all of Ghent's own hotspots thanks to the biggest public transport hub of Ghent being next to the station!

The space
The apartment is on the third floor of a renovated building in one of the best-located streets in Ghent. The guests can make use of the whole apartment; two double-bed bedrooms, a balcony, bathroom, living room, and kitchen.

name: Vintage caravannetje in ecologische tuin te Gent.
description:
Glamping in een vintage Rapido caravannetje. Een knus plekje in onze ecologisch ingerichte tuin. In de caravan is er plaats voor 2 volwassenen en de bank kan omgevormd worden tot nog een dubbelbed.
Voor de sanitaire voorzieningen kunt u gebruik maken van onze badkamer in huis. Aparte toegang tot de caravan langs de achtertuin. Op 5 km van centrum Gent en achter in de tuin vertrekt een wandelpad. Mooie omgeving met vele fietsroutes doorheen de Leie streek.

The space
In de caravan vind je een klein dubbel bed (140 x 200 cm) opgemaakt met 2 éénpersoonsdonsdekens en kussens. Aan de andere kant van de caravan wordt de bank omgevormd tot 2 bedden. Kom je met kinderen, breng dan enkel slaapzakken mee voor hen. Lakens en kussens voorzien wij.
Er is een aparte koelkast in de tuin ter beschikking voor onze gasten.

Other things to note
Indien gewenst zorgen wij voor een lekker ontbijt (niet inbegrepen in de prijs). Laat ons dat dan op voorh
neighborhood_overview:
Drongen is een landelijke randgemeente van Gent met 3 prachtige natuurgebieden op een paar km afstand. De Bourgoyen, de Oude Kale Vallei en de Vinderhoutse bossen.
Recreatiedomein de Blaarmeersen ligt vlakbij, indien je graag wil zwemmen (met strandje) of sporten.
Liever wat cultuur? Met de bus of fiets sta je in een mum van tijd in centrum Gent!

name: Sleeping on a boat - Ecohostel
description:
Ship ahoy!
Looking for a hostel that shows the spirit of Ghent? Somehow different, friendly, fun, but most of all relaxed?

It's not everyday you can be a pirate, you might as well go for it! Don't forget that land was only created to provide a place for boats to moor... You'll find the boat on a lazy canal just outside the historic centre, quiet, lush and green.

So hopefully you'll love Ghent as much as we do!!

The space
We offer 4 rooms, two with a double bed, one room with 3 bunk beds and one room with 4 bunk beds.
Bed linnen is included in the price, as well as pillows and duvets.

The hostel can at the moment only be booked completely. The number of people staying is up to you but maximum 12. A group with more than 12 can contact us for possible reservations with more guests.

name: Unique experience - spacious boathouse near center
description:
Cosy yet spacious and warmly decorated appartment on my house boat Aurelia Feria, where i live also with my 2 kids (co-parenting)

- a 15min walk to the city center and at 2min walk from the train station.

- ATTENTION: be aware,the airbnb is adjacent to my private living area. You have the airbnb space to yourself but the wall between the 2 parts is not accoustically isolated so for sound you are not completely private. You can not see each other, but you can hear sounds from the other side .

The space
you have a whole space of 60m2 to yourself, next to my private part of the boat.

Furthermore there is a spacious deck to enjoy the sun and views as well as a glass roof above the living area that opens to have a cool breeze or lots of natural light streaming in. It is exceptional for a houseboat to draw so much light in. In winter there is a cosy stove to keep your feet warm.

you can expect:
- a bath in front of a
neighborhood_overview:
The boat is located at the entrance of the 'new docks' (Nieuwe Dokken), an area just next to the center where in the past this was an industrial area, operating over water.
This whole area (that used to be 'the old docks') has recently been developed (and still is) with areas to live, schools, open space, playground, beach, bars, cycling path, walking path, etc. New neighboorhood that due to Corona is now also being discovered by the Ghentians, for walking and cycling, and for water activities. It is still a quiet place so close to the city, train station and the ring of Ghent. But fun on the water (lots of kayaking, little boats, rubber boats, paddle boarding) is popular nowadays and it comes close, since you are also on the water ,-) and people are curious to see life on a boat.

The boat is next to a quay and a cycling path. There is no car road, only a simple road where residents can load and unload the car, as can you if you come with the car.

Unfortun
host_about:
Hi, I am Lies and i live on the houseboat with my 2 children, Viggo and Raffi. They alternate between me and their dad every other week.  

 I bought the Aurelia Feria end of 2017. It is a 'spits', used to be a cargo boat of 40 m long and was build end of the 60's. 

Since January 2020 the boat is back at its permanent own spot on the water after a thorough renovation. 

And my children as well as me are enjoying our new home to the fullest, even though it is not completely finished and I can not see, feel or smell paint anymore. 

The boat is also used for my coaching practice, to guide groups and individuals on their 'quest' to connection, with themselves, with others and with the world around them. 

 Finally, I also wish to offer it to people all around the world to come and experience life on a boat and discover the fantastic city of Ghent, where I have been living for the last 20 years. 

Let me know what the space brings you or still needs to serve its purpose. 

For people who are interested in exploring themselves, a coaching session can also be arranged :-)

Vanuit onze gezinswoning in Ledeberg is het centrum van Gent vlot bereikbaar, zowel met de fiets als het openbaar vervoer. Straatparkeren aan laag tarief. De ganse bovenverdieping van onze bel-etagewoning is ter beschikking en bestaat uit een slaapkamer, badkamer, zitruimte en koffiehoek. Er is zeer veel licht en het geeft een ruim gevoel. name: Gezellig gerenoveerd huisje in Gentbrugge
description:
This recently renovated and cosy house is all yours! The house is easy to reach by train or car and is ideally located if you are planning a city trip to Ghent, or if you want a good base to discover Bruges, Antwerp, Brussels or the coast.
The house is located in trendy Gentbrugge, a 10-minute bike ride from the Ghent city centre. There are numerous parks (including the Gentbrugse Meersen), public transport stops, restaurants and shops within walking distance.

The space
On the top floor you will find a large bedroom with double bed and room for an inflatable (children's) bed (provided in the house). There is also a large air mattress for older children or extra guests. On the first floor there is the living room, a separate toilet, a bathroom with rain shower and a storage room with a laundry room. On the ground floor there is a large, fully equipped kitchen and a small office. You also have access to the city terrace from here.

Guest access<
neighborhood_overview: Gentbrugge is a quiet but trendy neighborhood south-east of Ghent Center. The main assets are the excellent accessibility and the combination of the village feeling and the proximity to the city center. Although the neighborhood where the house is located is primarily a residential area, there are plenty of nice bars, restaurants and stores within walking distance.
host_about:
I work as a consultant for several NGOs in the field of 'open science'. I travel about 25% of my time, and often I prefer the more personal Airbnb experience over sterile hotel rooms. 
I'm quite passionnate about my work, so I have a preference for listings offering solid wifi and a working space. But when not working, I enjoy good food and cooking, being on the road, finding great bars and pubs, and reading everything I can lay my hands on. 
Looking forward to meeting you!

neighborhood_overview: Het Patershol is een oude wijk in het historische centrum van de Belgische stad Gent en telt een gesloten stratenpatroon dat het uit de middeleeuwen heeft bewaard. Deze bijzonder mooie hoek van Gent is een stad-in-de-stad. Vergeet even waar je bent en laat je onderdompelen in de middeleeuwen. Snuif de nostalgie van oude leefgewoonten op. Geniet van architectuur en kunst. En zeker van de pittoreske straten vol gezellige restaurants, volkse cafés en hippe bars. Het Patershol en de omgeving werden in 1981 beschermd als stadsgezicht.

Het huisje wordt op zijn geheel verhuurd. De ingang wordt gedeeld met de eigenaars.

name: Cosy room in apartment near centre of Ghent
description: The apartment is situated at the second floor of the building. The room has a double sofa bed. It has a window with entrance to a terrace (shared with the neighbors). The rest of the apartment is shared with us: bath room, separate toilet, kitchen and living room. The bath room has a bath/shower (towels, soap, … are provided), the kitchen has everything to cook/reheat a (own) meal and the living room has 1 big and 2 little sofa’s, big table and beautiful view from the big window!
neighborhood_overview:
You need 3 minutes to walk from station Gent Dampoort to our place. Walking to the centre takes about 20 minutes (or 10 minutes with the bus). Busses to all around Ghent just in front of the building. Just over the square you have a big supermarket (Carrefour and Tevhid). Close by the apartment you have a bakery, butcher, newspaper kiosk, places to eat (pitta, fries, sandwiches, Italian restaurant, …) or go for breakfast.
Parking your car is quite expensive (free on Sundays)! You can park it at the station for about 20 euros (per day) or at the parking in front of the building with the parking meter.

name: Oude jeneverbrouwerij van 1740
description:
Het huis dateert van 1740 en was origineel een jeneverbrouwerij. In 2017 werd het volledig gerenoveerd met behoud van zoveel mogelijk authentieke elementen in combinatie met een eigentijdse inrichting. De houten balken en vloeren brengen je terug naar vroeger, de stalen trappen, moderne afwerking en het losstaand bad doen je genieten en ontspannen in stijl. Er is plaats voor maximum 6 personen. Je hebt 3 slaapkamers (met telkens een tweepersoonsbed) en 2 badkamers als je Peper boekt.

The space
Peper is eat, sleep, wine. Op het gelijkvloers vind je ons restaurant waar je kan brunchen, lunchen en dineren. We hebben een authentieke wijnkelder en werken met een coole wijnmachine waar je kan proeven van 16 verschillende wijnen. Vanop het eerste verdiep kom je in onze gerestaureerde B&B waar je met maximum 6 personen kan verblijven. Eerste verdieping: een gezellige living met een volledig uitgeruste kitchenette, bar en sofa. De originele houten vloeren en balken bl
neighborhood_overview: Peper ligt op 5 minuten van het Gravensteen en op 8 minuten van de Korenmarkt in een rustige buurt. Naast ons vind je het oude Elisabeth Begijnhof wat zeker een bezoekje waard is.
host_about: Welkom bij Peper. Peper is eat, sleep, wine. Samen met mijn man Philip hebben we een restaurant, wijnbar en B&B in Gent.

name: Stay in the Historic Centre / Beautiful studio
description:
Beautiful, bright & quiet studio with double bed, kitchenette and private bathroom in the heart of the Historic Centre of Ghent, at a few minutes walking from city highlights like the "Castle of the Counts" (Gravensteen), Graslei & Korenlei and Ghent Belfry (Belfort).

This beautiful accommodation is truly a wonderful location to stay at. Perfect to explore & enjoy the culture, history, energy & food of this amazing city.

Welcome - you will feel right at home in lovely Ghent!

The space
This comfortable studio is on the ground floor (level 0) of a beautiful building.
The building is very centrally located: bus/tram stops nearby, several public car parks only minutes away, supermarket & groceries at less than 200 meters & lots of cultural, historic & culinary highlights within walking distance.

It is a very modern studio that provides you all the comfort you need: private bathroom with shower, double bed, fridge, hairdryer, fr

name: Apartment in Ghent with Terrace on Top Location
description:
1 bedroom apartment offering all the modern comfort you need. There is a fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with bath and living room with small terrace.

The location is super central and only a stone’s throw away from everything this beautiful city has to offer.
neighborhood_overview: Ghent offers a fascinating cultural cocktail brimming with trendy, modern urban life. Ghent is a city where people enjoy life, a chilled-out place where anything goes and a city that feels human. Its friendly, welcoming people love the good life. Get lost in the historic centre, explore the museums, enjoy our culinary talent and throw yourself into the bustling nightlife.

name: Spacious Ground Floor Loft near the park
description:
Situated in the medieval St-Elisabeth Beguinage, 300m from Gravensteen Castle, my recently renovated ground floor loft is great for everyone who likes to relax at home after a walk in town. It has characterful high wooden ceilings, and a modern bathroom with a rain-shower :)

No need to take any public transport form here, you're right in the historic center of Ghent. But if needed, tramway to the train station stops just across the street!

Other things to note
You have a basic kitchenette at your disposal (fridge, sink, microwave, watercooker, senseo machine). Not suited to cook elaborately, luckily we are located in the town center, so coffee bars & restaurants are right around the corner!

name: Houseboat Orfeo
description:
The houseboat Orfeo is a fully equipped 120 m2, two bedroom appartment. The boat was originally build in 1909 but has been completely renovated. It is located at less then 10 minutes walk from the city center and close to public transports and shops. From the terrace you can enjoy the idillic view on the water.

The space
The boat has one big and one small bedroom, one bathroom, a kitchen, a rooftop terrace and and a big living room with an extra double bed.

Guest access
There is a parking possibility for low emission cars in front of the boat (3€/day) or a parking for high emission cars at 400 meters (3€/day). The public transport is at 2 min walk.

Other things to note
The houseboat is fully equipped and safe but it is still a boat. We ask to respect al safety rules provided at arrival.
The acces to the main living space requires descending stairs, people with reduced mobility are asked to contact us in order
host_about: Hi, I am a bio-engineer and musician. I was born and raised in Ghent so i know the town quite wel. I travelled a lot so I know what you expect of a good host. I hope to welcome you to my place so that you can have a great stay in Ghent.

name: Upscale residence with private pool
description:
The main floor has an open floorplan with floor-to-ceiling windows offering abundant natural light. The living and dining room are directly facing the large, saltwater pool making the perfect expression of indoor-outdoor living. The gourmet kitchen has a high-end gas range, microwave, refrigerator and dishwasher. The two bathrooms one with walk in shower and one with egg shaped bathtub are designed for optimal comfort and luxury.

The space
Brand new construction with timeless design. High end finishes with large wooden beams, steel windows and upscale furniture.

Guest access
48 hours before arrival detailed access instructions will be send, and a key will be provided through a lock box

Other things to note
New Washer and dryer are available in the residence upon request.
neighborhood_overview: Privacy is highly regarded. The residence is located on a dead end street, surrounded by farmland. Nevertheless, excellent restaurants are within a 4 to 8 km radius. The historic towns of Ghent and Bruges are located 12 km and 39 km from the house.

name: Peaceful countryside studio close to Ghent
description:
Zeer landelijk en rustig geleden peaceful countryside studio close to Ghent. Gelegen op 4 km van centrum Drongen (aan de Leie) en op 10km van Gent. De studio staat los van de landelijke woning en is voorzien van alle nodige comfort en ruimte. U kan gebruik maken van een ruim afgesloten privé parking en carport, twee fietsen en een bbq staan ter beschikking. Onder het overdekte terrasje kan u volop genieten van rust en zon. Een warm en hartelijk ontvangst maken dit onvergetelijk.

The space
De met oude bouwmaterialen gebouwde eiken studio 'De Liberteyt' biedt je naast sfeer en warmte een oase aan rust. De studio is onder meer uitgerust met gezellige sfeerverlichting, Tv, wifi, frigo en eigen muziek via het sonos systeem. Onder het overdekte privé buitenterrasje kan u volop genieten van zon en rust.
neighborhood_overview: U bevindt zich op fietsafstand van dag behoeften en op 4km van het centrum van Drongen waar u alle nodige comfort makkelijk kan terugvinden. Wandel, fiets en zelfs boottochten zijn allen vlakbij. Per fiets of met de bus ben je op amper 10km van het stadscentrum verwijderd. Dit wordt zonder meer genieten.

name: Urban Loft | A unique spot in Ghent
description:
Welcome at Urban Loft. We created this place situated in 'Machariuswijk' in the city center of Ghent. Urban Loft offers two BBNT's (Bedroom, Bathroom and private terrace). We have a unique location that is easily reachable by train, bike, bus or even by car!

If you like to start your discovery in a unique place (building, room, environment) and receive our personal recommendations, then this is your 'go to' place.

Love to host you and communicate in NL/FR/ENG,
Urban Greetings,
Anissa

The space
This space is unique because of its own character. The building is entirely renovated in 2020 and offers you a beautiful place to stay within the city center of Ghent without any disturbing noise.

However this space doesn't have a kitchen.

Guest access
You have access to a double bedroom with a private bathroom AND a private terrace. If you come by bike you can park your bike, SUP, motorcycle, ...at our plo
neighborhood_overview:
We are situated in a very unique part of Ghent. Unique in a way that we live within the city center of Ghent amongst a true diversity of city members of this city AND very close to transport possibilities, including railway station (Gent Dampoort) which is in fact the true main station as it is the closest to the city center.

This neighbourhood offers also nice restaurants and places to discover without being annoyed by too many people or noises.
From this place you can discover anything you want within the city center on foot. If you like to explore it differently you can, there are places where you can rent a bike, boat, stand up paddle, ...
host_about:
Hi. I am Anissa. Mother of Nina, happily married to my husband Joachim and owner of my business. What do we have in common? Quite some things but what is really clear is that we are all three food (&drink) lovers. 

For business trips I choose to be in an inspiring environment where I can be at ease. I love to learn and support growing other people.

When going on a trip with my family we love to discover places and explore local habits (foods and drinks included ;) as well as beautiful architecture. 
Once in a year we take a longer break were we slow down, reflect on the past year at different levels, relax and enjoy each others presence. 

We also opened 'UrbanLoft' ourselves in Sept 2020. A lovely place in the heart of Ghent /Belgium.

name: Home Trietje 2 in Gent
description:
At Home Trietje 2 we offer you:
- Free WIFI.
- A standard and comfortable accommodation.
- Public transport is convenient. Different shops and stores etc. are within a walking distance
- Group and family friendly environment & Guests enjoy the whole house
-Comfortable beds with fresh linen.
-Fresh bath towels, kitchen towels.
-An equipped kitchen to prepare your meals; fridge & deep freezer.
-A washing machine to wash your clothes.

host_about:
Mission of Home Trietje:
Good relationship is the most important in life. Home Trietje is operated to serve as a place for families/friends or colleagues to share nice moments together. 
I am happy when my guests are happy. That is why I do my best to keep the place at an affordable price and to make my guests feel comfortable like at home:
-The house locates in a calm area but not far from Gent centre. 
- This is a simple but comfortable accommodation 
Home Trietje passes strict rules of the Belgian authorities. So, there is no difference between Home Trietje and a two star hotel in terms of safety, hygiene and comfort. 
-The privacy of my guests are respected (guests don’t have to share the house with anyone). 
- There is no reception desk; no one bothers my guests.  The door is accessible via self check-in with code but I am available  if needed either to solve any issue/problem occurred or my guests just feel a need to meet me in person

name: Ruime woning aan Gentse stadsrand - Lange verhuur
description:
We verhuren graag ons huis terwijl we er zelf op uit trekken. Onze charmante en lichtrijke woning met herenhuis allures biedt je veel ruimte, op 10-15 min fietsen van centrum Gent en 5 min fietsen van de Gentbrugse Meersen, een leuk natuurgebied.

Due to a temporary stay abroad we like to rent out our home to people like us, looking for a new environment. Our charming & bright home offers you ample space, 10-15 min cycling to the city center of Ghent & 5 min to a natural area

The space
- Gelijkvloers: lichtrijke leefkeuken met kookeiland, tafel en toegang tot koer, woonruimte met zetel en tafeltje dat eventueel als bureau kan dienen, TV (enkel Netflix en Streamz), gang met toilet, toegang tot kelder
- Eerste verdiep: grote slaapkamer met dressing, nineties badkamer met bad en vernieuwde douche en wasmachine
- Zolderverdiep: deze ruimte moeten we nog verder opfrissen, maar proper genoeg om spullen te leggen of je was te drogen.
neighborhood_overview:
- Op 300m: de Schelde (verkeersvrij wandelen en fietsen), bakker, leuk restaurantje voor afhaal, frituur, parkje
- Op 800m-1km: buurtwinkels, supermarkten
- Op 1,5km: E17 op/afrit Gentbrugge, Gentbrugse Meersen natuurgebied
- Op 2,5-3km: stadscentrum Gent
host_about:
We are Céline and Benjamin, always looking for the next travel adventure! 
Update 2021: For the first time we want to try out renting out our  own home while we are out exploring new places. Do not hesitate to contact us for any questions!

name: Gent Logeerplek dichtbij gezellige stadscentrum
description: Wij wonen in één van de leukste huizen in één van de leukste buurten van Gent. Gasten hebben de hele bovenste verdieping ter beschikking. Na 3 minuutjes wandelen ben je in het gezellige stadscentrum. Je proeft, voelt en ziet de sfeer van Gent van zodra je de deur uit bent. In onze wijk zijn er veel lekkere restaurants en gezellige koffiebars. Je kan ook een hele fijne graffitiwandeling doen (een plannetje geven we je mee) of lekker gaan uitwaaien in de Oude Dokken.
neighborhood_overview: Ons huis ligt op 5 minuten stappen van Oudburg en het Patershol, gezellige kasseistraten met veel lekkere restaurantjes. Op 7 minuten stappen ben je aan het Gravensteen, de middeleeuwse burcht pal in het centrum.

name: Charming guest house in the back of a garden.
description:
Our charming house near the city center is situated in the back of our garden. It is accessable through a separate entrance. The ground floor consists of a spacious bedroom with a terrace. The first floor has a trendy living room, sofa bed, open kitchen and bathroom with a shower. You will find all modern comfort. The authentic master bedroom on the top floor includes a comfortable and quiet working space . A perfect spot for tourists and professionals!

The space
This renovated coach house offers all comfort such as wifi, TV and a separate entrance with access code. There is a modern kitchen, bathroom and two separate toilets. Perfect for two couples or a family with children, but also for professionals looking for a long stay. The spacious bedrooms are also suitable as a work/study place. Privacy is guaranteed at all times. You can sit in the sun on the terrace or even play a game of table tennis.
neighborhood_overview:
Our 19th century house is located on a quiet street in a lively neighborhood. The train station is nearby, and the old town is at a 15-minute walk. There are plenty of trendy places for wining and dining.
De Nieuwe Dokken, one of the newest and most innovative districts of Ghent, is a little further away. Those who like to walk or run can easily visit the Gentbruggemeersen, a beautiful nature reserve. On foot, by bike or public transport: there is always something to enjoy in Gent.

name: Completely furnished and equipped house
description:
Want to experience Ghent as a local? Here you get a whole, completely furbished and equipped house, so you can enjoy the city as a true "Noose Wearer" (nickname of people of Ghent). We lived here for 7 years and left the house as it is, including toys for kids etc. You can use everything, there even is a bike! Internet and tv on demand is of course available. The house is in a neighborhood just outside the centre, tram stop 1 is a very short walk away and there is also a bus stop at 50 meters.

The space
The house is completey furnished, equipped. You can immediately start living there. We used to host one room only, when we were still living there ourselves. To see feedback about that, look under "Swonnie's double room". We had lots of guests with lots of positive reviews. This time, it will be different, as we will not be there ourselves, but still, the house remains, completely ready and close to the centre.
neighborhood_overview: The neigborhood used to be a working-class area for the workers in the nearby factories who were all closed in the nineties. The area is now in an upward spiral, as it is close to the centre. Lots of young families are moving in. It is also very multicultural. There are lots of shops and restaurants too. And also lots of green parks and areas.

name: Charming house nearby city center
description:
Ideal location for those who want to explore Ghent on foot and still like to sleep peacefully. There are 2 full bedrooms, each with a double bed of 160cm wide. In the attic there is an extra room with a sofa bed (120cm). Equipped kitchen and bathroom with bath. There is wifi and TV. It is a charming, small but cozy house and it will become nice and warm inside in no time. Bed, bath and kitchen linen available. Parking in the street at a daily rate of 6 euros.

The space
The house itself is cozy and authentic. There is a travel baby bed and toys for those who want to come as a family. There are 2 toilets in the house and a bathtub in the bathroom. Equipped kitchen with gas stove, oven (Miele), microwave, coffee maker, kettle and a kitchen blender. Coffee, tea and herbs are provided. After every guest visit, there is thorough ventilation, cleaning and disinfection. There is disinfectant gel in the living room. Very welcome here!

Guest access
Y
neighborhood_overview: The location is perfect: in 15 minutes you are in the center on foot and you sleep very quietly here. Older people, students, families with children live there, ... it's a diverse neighbourhood. In the Ooilamstraat itself there is a pleasant atmosphere between the neighbours, many know each other well and there is very little traffic in the street. In the immediate vicinity (max 5min walking) there are 3 parks, with or without a playground, and also several restaurants that are not touristy at all. Nearby there is the Lousbergmarkt where you can buy local organic products or get a takeaway meal. Gent-Dampoort station is a 10-minute walk away. You can also rent bicycles there. In short, you never have to go far to find what you are looking for.

name: Spacious family home in Ghent
description:
Welcome in our house just outside the city center of Ghent!

We can accomodate 5 up to 7 guests, both adults and kids will feel at home.

The house has a well equiped kitchen with dining table (2 high chairs), living room & play area, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms + separate toilet. You can also enjoy the garden with barbecue or our spacious balcony.

Every room is available for you. Our cat Kasper will check if you are taking well care of our stuff;-). Please provide him with some food and love?

name: Great Spacious Riverside w/ balcony - Patershol
description:
Free parking at Park&ride 20mins away with tram!

You stay in the middle of the historical center of the gorgeous city Ghent - you are next to the beautiful river "Leie". You have a balcony with a view on the river.

Equipped with Cable TV, Smart TV, free WiFi, PS4, Surround Sound System,...

The property is centrally located and only a few minutes away from the historic city towers, the impressive Castle Gravensteen and much more! One if the most beautiful cities in the region.

The space
The appartment is on the second floor.

We make sure it's clean and decontaminated after each guest stay.

- Queen size bed
- Sleeper Sofa
- High Speed wifi
- Cable TV
- Smart TV
- Lots of natural light
- Relaxing view on the river
- Fully Equipped Kitchen with everything you need to cook
- A place centrally located to downtown, restaurants, shops, hospital, walking,...

Guest
neighborhood_overview:
The appartement is located in one of the most famous streets of Ghent, Oudburg. This street has the most restaurants and bars of the whole city, and it’s located in the heart of Patershol. Small streets with cute little stores and even more restaurants.

Only few minutes walking and you can enjoy the views on the amazing Castle, the big squares and the three beautiful towers of Ghent.

You have a view on the river where you will be able to do boat tours and even kayaking if you want.
host_about:
Hi, I'm a life enjoying pure belgian. I'm easy going and open minded.

39 years later I’m an entrepreneur with a passion to help people. Always looking to improve myself so I can give my guests the best stay as possible.

name: Appartment Keizerpark
description:
The studio is the complete top floor of our house, full privacy.
Part of the stairs, hallway and frontdoor is shared. The studio has 3 separate rooms: the bathroom with rainshower, toilet, sink; the kitchen/livingroom with kitchen and a comfy couch plus TV on the mezzanine; the bedroom/study with a desk and a bed on a mezzanine. There is lots of natural light in the kitchen and bedroom. The kitchen is brandnew, with a cappuccinomachine, an electric ketle, an oven, induction hobs and more.

The space
The facade is south oriented, so lots of light during the day.
There are a lot of windows.
The rooms are located under the roof, but have high ceilings and the 2 main rooms have a mezzanine, which makes the rooms very spacious.
There is a curtain to block the light on the sleep mezzanine, not very well visible on the pictures.

The kitchen is fully equiped, there is a duvet in the bedroom and lots of pillows.
I offer clean towels an
neighborhood_overview:
We live in a nice quiet neighbourhood. There is a park by the water, 2minutes walkingdistance. There is also a nature reserve 10minutes walking away, where you can go for a run or just enjoy nature. We live close to the water so nice scenery's all around. (I can give some good tips for nice jogging routes!)
Public transport is very acessible from our house and can bring you to the station, the citycenter or where ever. The highway is also easy acces, E17,E40 and R4.
Shops of all sorts, gasstations, nightshops, supermarkets are at walkingdistance.
From our house you can walk to the citycenter, a nice route that follows the water. 15minutes walk.

description:
Welcome to this intimate and cosy place I call my home! This apartment has been my safe spot for years, and now I want to share that feeling with you.

In my 1 bedroom apartment (ground floor) with big kitchen, keyboard, boardgames (no TV), free underground parking space and small terrace, you'll get company from my plant friends but I promise you they won't be any burden.

name: Casa Violetta
description:
Casa Violetta is op wandelafstand van alle bezienswaardigheden in Gent-centrum. Het appartement is van alle benodigdheden voorzien: keuken, badkamer met douche, slaapkamer met televisietoestel en snelle wifi.
Voor de gasten die met de wagen naar de stad komen kunnen wij een beveiligde parkeerplaats voorzien in de straat tegen betaling (15€ per etmaal).

The space
De studio bij St.-Anna ligt op wandelafstand van het historisch centrum van Gent.

Guest access
In de studio is plaats voor twee gasten. U beschikt er over een keuken, toilet, badkamer met douche, slaapkamer en lees- en televisiehoek.

Other things to note
Indien u dat wenst kunt u onze privé-parkeerplaats of fietsen huren. De studio is gemakkelijk bereikbaar met de wagen. Parkeren op straat is echter duur. De hele omgeving is gemakkelijk te bezichtigen met de fiets.
neighborhood_overview: Wij werken zelf in de stad en ons zoontje gaat om de hoek naar school. De buurt heeft veel gezellige restaurantjes en bars. Ontbijten kan ter plekke, maar even gemakkelijk in koffiebars en ontbijtgelegenheden op wandelafstand. Er is een gezellige bioscoop op de hoek van de straat. Winkels en supermarkten zijn vlakbij.
host_about:
We're a couple in our thirties and just got the nicest son! Just before Edgar was born we lived in the apartment ourselves for three years. Now we live next door. We love travelling and now we started a family, we hope to enjoy the visits of other people exploring our beloved city: GENT
Whoever visits Ghent for the first time or even more, will hear us tell enthousistic about where to go to eat, to walk, to see and visit ...

This house is in a quiet neighborhood. Not far from shops, park, city center. It is a bright house that is build with much care. Wooden and cork floors, wooden stairs. Only ecological products are used to paint the house.

description:
The apartment is situated in the same street as the Gravensteen Castle. No need to take public transport, you're right in the middle of.. just everything ;)

On sunny days, it's great to relax in the peaceful park right behind the house. Tramway to the train station stops just across the street.

name: A beautiful and quiet haven
description:
Marie and Tom would like to host you in their house in Ghent and guarantee you a comfortable stay and warm welcome.
Tom is a notorious chef, his restaurant ‘Haven' is just around the corner.
Marie is a notorious mom and loves all things tasty and adventurous.
We love to do things with passion, with taste and with our heart.
We both love traveling and at the same time we are in love with the city of Ghent.
It is beautiful.
It is pleasant.
There is so much to see and do in this historical city!

The space
The house was built 6 years ago. It is located in a quiet neighborhood full of character, close to the Leie and just a 5 minute walk from the city centre.
The modern and stylish house has 3 floors and 3 terraces and is bathed in an atmosphere of light and tranquility.
We think you will love it.

name: Studio Stan
description:
Hello there and welcome to Studio Stan!

Brand new, bright and modern studio (40m2) in the heart of Ghent. The studio comes with a covered parking space, a kitchenette, has its own private bathroom with walk-in shower and a living/bedroom overlooking the private garden. The bedroom has a very comfortable queen size bed and a cozy sitting area. There is also a TV with Chromecast and fast Wi-Fi available. Shops, theaters, library, museums, restaurants and bars are all within walking distance.
host_about: I'm a rather outgoing person who loves travelling. My perfect holiday would mean that I managed to meet up with locals and that I managed to experience their way of living. I love nothing more than to get to know and understand a different culture. I currently live back in Belgium but I have had the opportunity to live in Canada and Scotland.

name: TIPI Eco" Casita Loquita"  Natuur & Cultuur Gent
description:
Tipi Casita Loquita.
Elk zuchtje wind vertelt het verhaal van zijn reis...
Als je goed genoeg luistert, hoor je het fluisteren.
Dat is de zachte roep om avontuur die je de wildernis inlokt.
Deze authentieke Tipi ademt enkel liefde en warmte uit!
Het vuur in het midden zorgt voor een onvergetelijke nacht.
Het is een beleving waar Natuur & cultuur elkaar de hand schudden. Op 4 km het charmante Gent.
Puur natuur & toch alle comfort met winkels en zwembad & Welness op 2 km van je tipi! Welkom!

The space
Nomadic TIPI. Exclusive romantic vacation! It's unique and the location is a perfect combination between Nature & City!
Living by nature ❤️
In the cold season we have a fire pit, wool blankets, rendeer, but always take extra warm clothes. See you soon!

Guest access
Tipi 100%+ garden!
Bathroom inside the Villa.
Kitchen it's outdoor in the right season.

Other things to note<
neighborhood_overview: In the middle of nature and 5 min from the wood. Silence hood and comfort bakery with brunch. 7/7 Little supermarket in the street. Bus to the historic center Ghent , 5km. Tropical and Olympic swimming & Wellness pool in walking distance.
host_about:
We Are Travellers. How adventurous are you?
Collect moments, not things...
Travelling is like falling in love, you are less critical and only see the nice things...
Hi dear friends!! Welcome to Casita Loquita!!

name: Boatie's * Bed bad boot
description:
Aye!
Langs de oever van de Schelde stellen wij de master bedroom van onze woonboot te huur voor een verblijf van minstens 2 nachten. Je vertoeft op wandelafstand van het historische mooie Gent, rustig dobberend in een groene omgeving.
Je beschikt over een knusse kamer in de achterroef met een stijlvolle privé badkamer.
De zonsondergang op het dek staat tot je beschikking, al valt deze te delen met de kapitein en zijn matrozen.

The space
* inschepen langs de stuurhut
* dubbel bed in maritieme stijl
* fancy fiance badkamer met boottoilet, ligbad en douche
* heerlijk sunshine-happiness dek

Guest access
De boot ligt op 25 min wandelen van Gent Sint-Pieters alsook 20 min van Gent Zuid (bus/ tram).
Gent laat zich heerlijk fietsen. Te huur in Gent Sint-Pieters.
Kom je met de auto, dan kan je betalend parkeren in de omliggende straten. De boot ligt buiten de Lage Emissie Zone Gent.

Other things
neighborhood_overview:
De woonboot ligt op de groene Scheldearm tussen Gent-centrum & Merelbeke. Rustige ligging langs het wandel- en fietspad.
Voedingswinkels vind je dichtbij in Ledeberg; alsook de zondagse markt!

Welcome to this sunny, warm and welcoming home in the beautiful and bustling city of Ghent!

If you are looking for a vibrant music scene, quaint little restaurants and bars, scenic waterside views, gorgeous nature or even adventurous walks through a medieval castle - fear not, Ghent has it all!

name: Spacious room with sunny terrace, close to Ghent
description:
Our small but cozy house is located 5 minutes (by tram/bike/bus) from the city center of Ghent. The closest busstop is at walking distance (3 min).
Relax here in your own private room. Discover the beautiful city of Ghent or a enjoy a walking or cycling tour in the area.
On the terrace or at the bar, you can end the day with a nice drink.
neighborhood_overview: Our house is very close to the old city centre of Ghent. You can take the tram or bus (5 minute) walk and hop on to the centre (10 minutes). We have shops, bakeries, butchers and some really great restaurants close by! The Gentbrugse Meersen, a greenbelt is just a few minutes walking. The train station of Gentbrugge is just 200 meters and will take you to the other cities in Belgium (Brussels:40 minutes, Bruges: 30 minutes, Antwerp: 1h,...)

name: Gentbrugge, het is niet Gent, het is niet Brugge.
description:
Je logeert in een knusse studio in een losstaand gebouw met privé ingang.

The space
Er is een ruime badkamer met inloopdouche. Je vindt er alle basisvoorzieningen zoals, koffiezet, waterkoker, microgolf en koelkast. De zetel kan worden ingezet als slaapbank. Vraag gerust naar een kinderbedje en speelgoed.
Er is een gedeeld zonnig buitenterras. Je kan de pizzaoven en barbecue gebruiken. Je betaalt alleen het hout, de rookmot en de kolen.
Wij voorzien op aanvraag ontbijt. Lunch en diner kunnen ook worden voorzien. Het weekendmenu wordt je meegedeeld bij aankomst. Al ons eten is zo biologisch en lokaal als mogelijk, maar vooral vers en huisbereid.
neighborhood_overview:
Gentbrugge is de kalme kleine broer van Gent. Je wandelt een half uurtje langs het prachtige water van de visserij naar hartje Gent. Of openbaar vervoer brengt je er binnen het kwartier.
Maar in Gentbrugge vind je alles wat je nodig hebt.
Supermarkten, bakker, slager, en een turkse kruidenierszaak op wandelafstand.
Het is de perfecte uitvalsbasis om te lopen langs de Schelde en het is het ideale startpunt om te fietsen langs Vlaamse wegen.
Er is een leuke speeltuin op 5 minuten wandelen en de Gentbrugse Meersen is een ware wandeloase. Opgepast voor de wilde koeien!

name: Cozy retro house in Ghent, with tub and garden!
description:
Welcome!

My cozy, renovated house on the outskirts of Ghent is located in a quiet street in Ledeberg.
You will find all modern comforts: Wi-Fi, washing machine, fitted kitchen with SMEG gas stove, refrigerator. And all this in retro 50s style. (Pastel all the way!;))

Shops, the market square and the Keizerpark are within walking distance. The center & station Gent-Sint-Pieters can be reached in 5 minutes by public transport. As well as the entrance and exit of the highway (2min / car)

The space
It is a small but cozy house with only open spaces. Downstairs you have the kitchen and living room with a beautiful view on the garden. The large sliding windows provide pleasant light. There is a comfortable sofa with a flat screen TV, books are also available. Upstairs you have a spacious bright bedroom with a double bed, an authentic cast iron claw foot tub (!!), sink and a large sunny balcony. There is also an electric piano for the musical
neighborhood_overview: Everything is within walking distance. Bakers, butcher, supermarkets such as Delhaize (in the same street) and Colruyt (5min on foot). The market square is one street away, here every Sunday morning there is a market full of nice, local products! The bus and tram stops are also just around the corner. Within a 5-minute walk you have the Keizerpark, a popular and beautiful park along the water.

name: Bright cozy apartment+city garden
description:
If you’re searching for a home that feels like home in beautiful Ghent, then this is the place to be!

The ground-floor apartment is a very bright and stylish decorated open space with lots of natural light overlooking the peaceful 45 square meter garden with jacuzzi where you can relax and unwind.

We highly recommend this place for people working (SUPER wifi) in the neighbourhood for a few weeks/months and would like a private, clean and peaceful stay minutes from the historic centre of Ghent.

The space
This fully furnished warm and cozy renovated apartment can host 4 people. It has a comfortable sofa, digital tv, dining table and a very well-equipped kitchen. It is stocked with basics to get you started like spices, olive oil, coffee, tea,…
It also has 3 bedrooms, 1 master bedroom with kingsize bed and 2 smaller bedrooms with one single bed in one room and a kid’s bunk bed in the other room.
There’s one stylish bathroom with bath
neighborhood_overview: Grocery shops, bakery, finger-licking restaurants and bars are footsteps away from the house.
host_about:
I'm Eva. A mother of an amazing boy and partner of a beautiful soul.
I’m a swim instructor and Group Fitness Trainer. I’m passionate about physical and mental health. On how to combine both and live a life in full awareness and gratitude .

name: 'tBegijnhof
description:
Other things to note
As you might have guessed, our name was derived from the Old Saint-Elisabeth Beguinage just around the corner. If history is your thing, you've come to the right place. Our neighbourhood is also known as the 'holy corner' where you can find no less than three different churches close by. The Saint-Elisabeth church hosts Anglican services, whilst an Orthodox and Protestant church are only 5 minutes walking distance. Can't get enough of history? Make sure to head to the city centre for a visit to the 'Gravensteen', Ghent's medieval castle, situated at the edge of the bustling city centre. Fine dining, take-out, good coffee or a quick bite, all that and more can be found at walking distance.

This House is 5 minutes by bike from the city center or 15 minutes walking distance. Everything is provided for a comfortable stay (wifi, TV, kitchen, bathroom). The bedroom is a kind of studio with its own lounge and dining table. But you can also use the regular TV room and kitchen. Everything is close by: a shop on the corner of the street and a park around the corner. From here you can just as well take a pleasant walk along the water and easily enter the city life. Welcome to Ghent!

The space
The studio/bedroom has a wardrobe with extra bed linen, coat hooks, towels and a hairdryer. There is coffee and tea provided in this studio + cutlery and plates. There is a table and a lounge. In my house there is a bathroom with toilet, a kitchen with gas stove, a storage room with washing machine and dryer and there is a small garden. There are two bikes available.

Guest access
There is nearby enough public transport, especially buses. You can p
neighborhood_overview: This house is located in a quiet area near the center. It is near the water and parks! name: Cycling retreat well connected to Gent city center
description:
A beautiful bicycle ride of 16 minutes brings you to Gravensteen which is smack in the middle of Ghent city center. Our home is on a cycling street which brings you there in a strait line. As we are quite far from the center you can park for free near to our home, if you're lucky right in front.
I work from home so I can vouch for a good Wi-Fi connection.
You will find that many beautiful bicycle and walking tours start from our place.
After a filled day you can enjoy a drink on our sunny deck

The space
The bedroom and bathroom are up the stairs. The living room and kitchen aswel as the toilet are downstairs.

Other things to note
There are 2 grocery shops within 1km, one of them has a butcher in it.

name: Cozy&bright apartment, terrace, near centre+ bikes
description:
The apartment is on the first flour of our beautiful and characterful house. It is recently renovated, so everything is brand new. Dream away in the kingsizebeds. All rooms are spacious, have high ceilings and are very bright. Enjoy the big terrace!
The city centre is only 5 minutes walk or 10 minutes by bike away. But there are also nice places to eat and drink in the neighborhood.
We have two bikes to use! Railwaystation Dampoort is nearby (5 min).

The space
The airbnb is on the first floor of our house.
The entrance and the stairs are the only spaces to share. All other rooms are private.

The apartment has a hall with possibility to leave coats, shoes or other stuff. On the right of this hall you find the living room with eating place and kitchen, the bathroom and a large terrace.
On the left of this hall you find the two sleeping rooms.

In the cozy living room you find the (smart)- television (you can link your
neighborhood_overview:
We live in a quiet and cozy neighborhood with some nice places to eat or drink. There is also a small supermarket 100 meters from our home.
Jump on your bike or take a little walk to the city centre. It is really nearby.
host_about:
Hi, I am Sonja and I  have the opportunity to live with my two lovely sons and boy-friend in this beautiful house in Ghent. I am an art teacher in a teacher training school.
We love to travel and had a lot of nice experiences with AIrbnb. So we recently renovated the first floor of our house to a bright and spacious apartment and offer it now for rent on Airbnb. So please welcome and enjoy your stay with us.

name: Lovely House - a stone throw away from City Center
description:
The perfect long-term stay in Ghent for expats or visitors: our lovely house is located in the quiet and calm Kwakkelstraat in Ghent, a mere 10 minutes walking from the city center, with a tram stop 100 meters away that takes you directly into the city center or to Ghent’s main train station (Sint-Pieterstation)

The space
The ground floor has an space for bikes, a separate toilet, dining room, kitchen with a utility room, plus a nice sunny terrace (oriented at the SouthC so sun all day long!) with barbecue. The dining room also gives access to the cellar below with lots of storage room.

The first floor features a nice living room that can be used as a second bedroom if needed (we have an extra futon bed, a very sturdy one), and an amazing bathroom with a large bathtub, a walk-in shower, toilet and two sinks.

The second floor features an office space and the main bedroom.

The house is fully furnished, with Wi-Fi, a bike to use, an
neighborhood_overview: Tramline N.1 stops at 100 meters from the house and takes you straight to the city center (Gravensteen, Korenmarkt, Veldstraat) and directly to Saint Peter's Station (Sint-Pietersstation).
host_about: Hi there, I’m Jason! I live together with my absolutely fantastic girlfriend, Serena, in Ghent, Belgium, but for the summer months we move to the south of Italy, to stay with her family. That’s why we are putting our house for rent for the months of July and August. We are mostly looking for long-term stays, but welcome guests for a week or more to stay in our lovely home in the Kwakkelstraat. We look forward to welcoming you!

description: At the heart of the historic city centre, with a view on waterways and the Castle, you find the most romantic location of Gent, Lievekaai. Just google its location and see if you agree with most Ghentians. All major sights at walking distance. This duplex apartment features all modern comfort features like climate control. All common necessities are provided for, except breakfast, which can be served right to your doorstep with the click of a button. Also features a completely private garden.

Appartement voor twee personen gelegen vlakbij het centrum van Gent maar toch rustig in het groen aan het Rozebroekenpark. In
De ochtend word je wakker met het gefluit van de vogels en kun je ontbijten op een zonovergoten terrasje. Mijn appartement is pas gerenoveerd en heel comfortabel. name: Chère Anne (City Center Top Location)
description:
The cozy apartment with a big lovely terrace is located in the city center (less than 500m from Sint-Baafskathedraal, 600m from the train station, 100m from the canals).
85+terrace 10 square meter. With two double bedrooms, a private kitchen (microwave/oven/dishwasher), bathroom, and spacious living room. Quiet neighborhood.
Pillows, comforters, towels, shower gel, coffee, and tea are provided.
A baby cot (+ € 5 /day).
Re-open in 2021. New/design furniture. Thank you

The space
You have your own apartment, and your own terrace. The apartment has one bedroom (R1). For the third guest, we use a single mattress (at R1). The apartment is on the first and second floor. There is a storage room on the second floor. This part is not open for the public. Only for the reservation with four people we open the storage room as a second bedroom (R2). Our street is next to Reep, Gent center, top location, 5 mins to the cathedral, 7 mins to the rail statio

name: Cosy gypsy wagon in our garden
description:
Cosy and warmly decorated gypsy wagon in our garden near a big park (Gentbrugse Meersen). A 25 min walk to the city center, a 2 min walk to the train station Gentbrugge and very close to bus stops. Supermarkets & bakery nearby.
Attention: the airbnb is in our garden. We share the garden, but you can enjoy some privacy on your own terrace.
There's a double bed for 2 people. There's a sink, a refrigerator and a microwave. In our house you have your own private toilet and bathroom.

The space
In de woonwagen is er een dubbel bed aanwezig en een zetel.
Er is een tafeltje aanwezig met 2 stoelen.
De keuken is uitgerust met een frigo met kleine diepvries, een combimicrogolfoven, 2 kookplaatjes, bestek, glazen en borden zijn aanwezig en een wasbak met warm en koud water. Op aanvraag kan je zeker gebruik maken van de BBQ.
Voor de koffiedrinkers is er een koffiezetapparaat aanwezig (koffiepoeder moet je zelf meebrengen)
Wifi is aanwezig.

name: Lovely bright room with double bed near centre
description:
You will enjoy easy access to everything in Gent from this centrally located place. Nice comfortable double bed, shower room with toilet and fully equipped kitchen.

We also have a couple of spare bikes available to use. They are a great way to explore the beautiful city!

In the back garden we have a sofa and BBQ which you're welcome to use too.

The city of Gent is super beautiful and we don't get tired of it. Come and explore from our house and we promise a warm welcome.

name: Large modern house 10min from downtown Ghent/Gent
description:
Just 10 minutes from historic downtown Ghent. Our spacious modern house sleeps 6 people, features a large open seating area, kitchen and eating area. Garden with pond, terrace, outdoor table. Three bedrooms with the desired beds upon request. You are renting the complete house while we live abroad. Our house is just 10 minutes from historic downtown Ghent by car, tram (stop 500m) or bicycle. Free on street parking in front. Indoor (2) bicycle storage. We welcome children but no large pets.

The space
Living room: very spacious with 6 person couch. 77" TV with 7.1 Dolby Surround (no cable TV but Netflix, Amazon Prime Video and Disney+ available). View on garden, terrace and swimming pond (not heated). Living, kitchen and dining area are one big open space.

Kitchen: features a gas cooking plate, hot air oven, Nespresso Dolce Gusto, classic coffee machine, toaster, waterboiler, dishwasher.

Dining area: very large dining table seats 10 persons.
host_about: Loving father of two children living in Ghent, Belgium.

name: Le Petit Bordeleau
description:
Enjoy a stay on board of a 1952 barge with astonishing views on the old docks of Ghent. Everything you need for a romantic waterside getaway on walking distance from the city centre.

The space
The former barge is converted into 2 luxury studios and one loft. All 3 have their own private entrance and are fully equipped. Le petit bordeleau is one of the studios in a trendy loft style.
If necessary, This studio can be connected with the big loft. Together they can be used by 4 persons, with 2 bed and bathrooms

Guest access
Tea, Nespresso and water included. Use of bikes possible on demand.
neighborhood_overview: The area used to be a busy harbour site. Nowadays, most warehouses and remains of the harbour industry are converted into living and working spaces. The former harbour site is now the biggest protected city view of Ghent and is becoming an important tourist spot.
host_about:
Hello,
As I am a 'globe trotter', I allways like to meet new people and experience new  cultures. Gastronomy and design are my key words. If you want to share the same passions like I have? Just come and stay in my luxury 19th century loft!

The room has a view over a park, with big windows so lots of sunlight.

The neighbourhood is surprisingly quiet considering it is located in the historical center of Ghent, almost everything is in walking distance, restaurant, museum, bars, shops.

I would consider this airbnb for young people/couples, the stairs are a bit tight. if you're not used to to rent a room in a shared house then this will not be for you.

Due to covid i will try to make this contact free as possible -> self check-in.

Easy going

name: Gezellig rijhuisje aan het water

host_about: Hej. Ik ben Ellen, iemand die geniet van het leven en graag met mensen in contact sta. Zelf knip ik haar en probeer de mensen gelukkig te maken. Dit probeer ik ook te doen met air bnb. Mensen op hun gemak stellen, ze begeleiden en een deeltje van mezelf laten zien. Ernaast ben ik bezig met gezondheid en een stukje permacultuur waar ik geleidelijk meer kennis wil van opdoen.

name: Spacious room in old townhouse (partly renovated)
description:
You like it cosy?

I’m renting out a spacious room with garden view for short term periods.

Please read the full description!!

For me, Airbnb is (still) a way to travel 'with the locals' and on a limited budget. The house is not a modern all-in hotel, neither is it an investment property. It's a cosy house with creaking stairs and Airbnb helps me safe some money for future renovations.

You have to like the charm if you book the room.

The bathroom is basic (plans are in the making).

The space
This is a very spacious room with a desk to work, a table to sit around to play card games ;-) and a double bed.

If wanted, I can add a mattress if you're staying with more than two people.

Your room is more or less separated from the rest of the house, but the bathroom is on the second floor. This you'll share with me and my permanent tenant.

You have access to the garden from your ro
neighborhood_overview: Close to the historic Center, to the ring road, rail road, trains and buses.
host_about:
As a freelance journalist and producer mainly in the Middle East, I am often travelling abroad. When I am in Belgian I am living alone in my house in the center of Ghent, with a spare room to rent out to people for short term projects. Besides these projects, the rooms are free for rent to anybody who is willing to visit the beautiful city of Ghent and its surroundings. During my stay abroad, my proper room is available as well. 

After being a host for more then eight years trough several ways, I still love it every day a bit more. Its amazing to host people from all over the world. To help them around if necesary and to give them the space an privacy they need to assure them the most pleasant stay they can imagine. Ghent can be crowded, and so can be the hotels and hostels, therefore I see renting out a part of my private house as a great opportunity for both guest and host.

name: Charming City Studio In The Heart Of Ghent
description: This cozy studio has everything you need for your stay in Ghent. Our place is the perfect spot for a couple or two friends who want to explore this wonderful city. The central location puts you within arms length  of all the wonderful places this city has to offer. A kitchen equipped with a microwave, induction stove, fridge and a coffee maker. There is a dining table for two. The bathroom has a shower and we will always provide soaps, hand sanitizers and towels for your entire stay!
neighborhood_overview: Just a short 5-minute walk down the road, you will find the lively city center of Ghent. Popular spots like The Gravensteen castle, Graslei, Korenlei, Korenmarkt, and the shopping street Veldstraat are just a few hundred meters away!
host_about:
Hi!

We are Marvin and Laura and we will be your new hosts during your stay in our cosy studio's. Were a couple raised in Ghent and we love to show off our city!

We make it a priority to help you guys experience our city to the fullest. So we will always be at your service and we are always happy to give you tips and tricks .

We wish you a wonderful stay.

Kind regards,

Marvin & Laura

name: Welcome in a unique place in the heart of the city
description: If you want to experience Ghent at its best then come to my place.  A creative place with flexible host.   It’s central, safe, and it’s neighborhood packed with cafes, bars, famous nightclubs, beautiful parks and other touristic highlights.  There is a car park right next to the building where you can park for a small price.  Looking forward to welcome you.
host_about: I’m a young guy who’s enjoying life.  Recently I started up my own business and in these difficult times I want to earn a little cash through airbnb.  I bought this house and we are still renovating but that shouldn't bother you, the rooms are perfectly fine.... So what's me?  Enjoying life is for me cocktails, going out, reading, movies, photography, cooking, meeting new people … I love luxury and travelling by airbnb.  I hope we can meet up and maybe I'll prepare you a cocktail...

name: Privé kamer - Gent Dampoort Private room - Ghent
description:
This centrally located accommodation is tastefully decorated. You can make coffee and tea in the room and a TV with Chromecast is also available.

The bathroom is small but cozy and equipped with a walk-in shower.
When the weather is nice, you can relax on the courtyard.

Attention: There is also a super sweet cuddling cat.

The space
The property is located near Gent Dampoort station, a 10-minute walk from the center. Bus 3 stops in the street and drops you off in the heart of Ghent.

Ideal location if you are traveling with the Flixbuses.
The room is furnished with a French bed, TV with Chromecast and facilities to make coffee and tea.

Breakfast is not provided but there are several tasty bakeries nearby and the Delhaize and Colruyt are around the corner.

Guest access
When you open the front door, you immediately enter the living room, at the end you can find the bathroom with next to it t

name: Modern ruim appartement direct aan station Gent SP
description:
Vanuit ons centraal gelegen appartement ligt het gezellige levendige Gent binnen handbereik. De ligging nét aan Station Gent-Sint-Pieters maakt dat u beschikt over verbindingen met trein, tram, bus en taxi, nét voor de deur (1 min). De gezellige en veilige buurt biedt een 7/7 supermarkt, winkels, bars, restaurants, nachtwinkel (allen op 1 min) en een groen stadspark met speeltuin in de onmiddelijke omgeving. De straat is verkeersarm en dus opvallend rustig. Het appartement biedt alle comfort.

The space
Ons ruim en modern appartement heeft een ruime afgescheiden slaapkamer met dubbel bed en met sofa, smart TV en dressingkast. In de hal met vestiaire treft u tevens een apart toilet aan. De badkamer heeft een ligbad, douche en 2 lavabo's. De volledig uitgeruste keuken beschikt over een fornuis (4 kookplaten), een frigo met vriesvak, koffiezet, servies, basisprodukten, glazen en bestek. De eethoek biedt plaats aan 4 personen. De ruime mezzanine (verdiep hoger) heeft
neighborhood_overview: Ons gezellig appartement is werkelijk ideaal gelegen net aan het Station Gent-Sint-Pieters. De transport-connecties zijn ronduit excellent. De stationsbuurt is een mooie, nette en veilige buurt. De buurt telt heel wat prima bars en restaurants. Ook de supermarkten en nachtwinkels in de straat van de accomodatie zijn allen van een prima kwaliteit. Het historische Citadelpark ligt op 5 min stappen. Een korte wandeling (10 min) brengt je in het groene recreatiedomein 'De Blaarmeersen' (zandstrand, speeltuinen, horeca en sport).

name: Spacious new build apartment with stunning terrace
description:
This new build apartment of 80m2 has a beautiful terrace with a view on the water, at De Nieuwe Dokken, one of the upcoming neighborhoods in Ghent.

I am the owner of this brand new place and decorated it as my home. I have a barista coffee machine and a walk-in shower to create the best mornings on your trip!

The space
The living room has a desk, a really comfy couch, a vinyl player with jazz records and a dining table with four chairs. You can open the windows to create an open space towards the terrace. There is a small space where you can do your laundry if wanted.

The kitchen is next to the living room and is provided with a fridge, freezer, coffee machine, coffee grinder, stove, ... It has everything you need. You can use the spices and tools provided.

The bedroom also provides a view on the water and has a small dressing (which is occupied with my clothes ;))

There is a second bedroom which is not ready yet to u
neighborhood_overview:
De Nieuwe Dokken/Stapelplein is the upcoming neighborhood in Ghent.

You have a nice coffee bar, CUP, at the other side of the water. For drinks, Bar Bricolage and Glasfabriek are fun. For breakfast, Franz Gustav is great and you should go to Amigo or Astro Boy for dinnertime. I have an entire list of nice places when you arrive.

You can rent out a SUP to go on the water here or go out and rent a boat with Minerva.
host_about:
Hi there,

I'm Margot, working as a business coach and lecturer at Artevelde University of Applied Sciences in Ghent. I am renting out my own new build apartment that is only a few months old or I love to travel with Airbnb myself. I love to go surfing and that means my place is open for awesome guests that want to discover Ghent.


Greets, Margot :)

name: Design appartment in historic building anno '1893'
description:
This historical monument is treated with the necessary respect and restored by Rietveldprojects.be.
It as converted in 2020 into 3 apartments and 1 bakery on the ground floor. Each apartment is available only 4 months of the year and is used by the owners for the remaining 8 months. The apartments were carefully restored and furnished with top design pieces. Super central location, from each apartment you have a view on the historical buildings such as the Gerard de Duivelsteen of the 13theC.
neighborhood_overview: In het absolute centrum van de historische binnenstad. Vanuit het appartement zicht op het Gerard de Duivelsteen. Een gebouw dat dateert van de 13° eeuw.
host_about: Family with 3 girls. Peter is a project developer/owner at Rietveldprojects and Leen works as Ass. Director at Procter & Gamble.

name: Gezellig Gents rijtjeshuis met stadstuin
description:
Verblijf in een gezellig ingericht rijhuis met stadstuin op een boogscheut van de kuip van Gent.

Cosy town house with lovely terrace and garden close to the historical center of Ghent.

The space
Dit ruime huis van 160m2 heeft een hele ruime woonruimte en eetplaats die uitgeven op een terras en tuin van 60m2. De keuken is volledig uitgerust met grote frigo, kookplaat, combi-oven, koffiezet. Een gezellige kantoorruimte is ter beschikking voor homeworking. Er zijn twee slaapkamers en een ruime badkamer met inloopdouche en groot ligbad.

Guest access
De woning ligt in een rustige volksbuurt en is gemakkelijk te bereiken met de wagen en openbaar vervoer. In de straat kan je mits betaling (3€/dag) makkelijk je wagen parkeren.
neighborhood_overview: Het huis is gelegen in een rustige straat in een Gentse volksbuurt. Het natuurreservaat Bourgoyen ligt op 5 minuutjes wandelen.

name: Lichtrijke slaapkamer met badkamer
description:
Welkom in onze rijwoning in de stadswijk Ledeberg, aan de rand van het centrum van Gent.

Van hieruit kan je de historische stad Gent ontdekken met tram, bus, fiets of te voet.

Wie bieden je een twee persoons slaapkamer met eigen badkamer op de tweede verdieping van de woning aan.

The space
Een privé slaapkamer met tweepersoonsbed vol natuurlijk licht en recent gerenoveerd.

Een eigen badkamer (aansluitend in de ruimte) is voorzien, alsook kan de kamer gekoeld worden via airco indien nodig.

Verder kan je gebruik maken van wifi, een Nespresso koffiemachine en een mini koelkast. Wij verwelkomen je graag met een flesje water of frisdrank.

Het gastentoilet ligt op de eerste verdieping. De kamer zelf is op de tweede verdieping, hou dus wel rekening met de trap.

De andere kamers van de woning zoals keuken, leefruimte en terras kan je ook gebruiken, maar zijn wel gedeeld met onszelf.

Ot
neighborhood_overview:
Onze woning ligt in een rustige straat in Ledeberg, een stadswijk aan de rand van het centrum van Gent.

Vlakbij vind je een supermarkt, frituur, bakker en beenhouwer. Ook enkele kleine cafeetjes en eetplekjes. Op zondag is er elke week een grote markt op Ledebergplein.

De leukste en mooiste plekjes en adresjes, die vind je natuurlijk in het historisch centrum van Gent.

Met de bus- of tramhalte op 2 minuten wandelen ben je een boogscheut verwijderd van het hart van de Stad Gent.

Met de fiets een tiental minuten, te voet een twintigtal minuten.

Geniet van de Arteveldestad in al zijn aspecten. Een terrasje in onze autoluwe stad, een mooie wandeling langs de historische gebouwen, een fietsritje langs de Leie, een bezoek aan het Lam Gods in de Sint-Baafskathedraal, een rondleiding in het Stedelijk Museum voor Actuele Kunst (SMAK). Hier kan je het allemaal beleven in de meest gezellige stad van Vlaanderen.

description:
Free parking is provided!

The apartment is on the second floor of a century old renovated Town House. It has high ceilings, a comfy saloon, full-equiped kitchen and a private bathroom.

The apartment is situated in the Portus Ganda Area, near the Dampoort Railway Station. No need to take any public transport from our house for your city visits, it’s in walking distance to the historic center:

name: Bright and Cosy Little House in the City Centre
description:
Escape the world for a moment in this peaceful, centrally located accommodation.

The space
Warm, bright and cosy south oriented house. The kitchen and dining area are located on the ground floor, as well as the toilet in the hallway. On the atmospheric first floor, there's a relaxing sofa and equipment to watch a movie on the big screen :-) The living room is connected to a little balcony, on which you can enjoy the last rays of sunshine. The bedroom on the second floor contains a spacious double bed, a shower and a bathroom cabinet.

Guest access
Unfortunately, parking on site is not possible. You can find parking in the streets surrounding the site. Note: parking is paid here.
neighborhood_overview: While the house radiates an atmosphere of peace and quiet, it's located in the heart of Ghent. Near the water of Dok Noord, the train station of Gent Dampoort and only a 15 min walk (or a 5 min bicycle ride) from the historic city centre and the shopping streets.

name: Typical townhouse in Ghent
description:
Looking for a typical and cosy stay in Ghent?

This tiny house is a 19th Century accommodation located in one of the oldest "cité" (pedestrian area) of Ghent.

You are at walking distance from the city center (15 min) in a lively neighbourhood where you find shops, cafes and other amenities as well as the biggest natural park of the region.

The space
The house has a bedroom, a bathroom, an open living space with kitchen. The living space includes a sofabed.
Outside there is a nice open-air court, shared with 3 other similar houses that can be used for outdoor barbecues during summer or campfires during winter.

Guest access
The city center is at walking distance (15 min), reachable by bike (a nice ride next to the river) or by public transport (for example bus 3 is just across the street).

The main train station, Gent-sint-pieters, is reachable by Tram 4 (15 min) which stops 300 meters from the house.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in the "brugsepoort" neighbourhood, located in the north-west of Ghent. This area is very lively, thanks to the presence of various commercial activities as shops, bakeries, supermarkets, restaurants and cafes.

We can give several advises to the curious guests!
host_about: I'm a young Belgian designer who loves tiny living and minimalism.
