name: Authentic house,  15’ walk from City center
description:
Authentic Ghentian house, 15’ Walk from city center. 4 bedrooms, 2 terraces. Relaxing neigbourhood.

The space
This house was rebuilt by a Ghentian artlover in the 70-ies. The house has a space age vibe all with vintage furniture and curiosa gadgets.

Guest access
The house is all yours, you don’t need to share any rooms with me

Other things to note
There are 4 gentle reptiles in the house, they are caged and don’t run around in the house.
If you do’nt feel comfortable with these animals there is a possibility of removing them during your stay.
If you are comfortable, i can show you how to handle them but do’nt feel obligated.
neighborhood_overview: You stay in a quiet area only 15 minutes walk from the city center. Just around the corner there is a laundry salon, grocery store, local restaurant
host_about:

name: Cosy Sous-Sol near the city center
description:
Come and relax in our cosy sous-sol on the little island at the edge of Ghent, the former service quarters of our house from 1912. With great care for the authentic elements, we have transformed this into a nice space with an eye for design. The space has a private access to our garden, where you can enjoy the green surroundings. It is located near the park at the old docks, and a stone's throw from the center.

The space
The space consists of a connecting living area and bedroom, a veranda with dining table, adjacent to the well-equipped kitchen (oven, stove, dishwasher) and the walk-in shower. The veranda gives access to the garden.

Please note that the bedroom and living area are only 2m high, so less suitable for people taller than 1m90.

Guest access
It is possible to get the keys out of the lockbox yourself, if desired we will of course be happy to receive you in person (we live above the studio). Parking is available in the
neighborhood_overview: Our sous-sol is located on the island 'de Muide', the former port area of Ghent. You can still find numerous references to the old glory days in the neighborhood, warehouses, cranes, etc. Nearby a park has been laid out with a small beach overlooking the old docks. The city center is a fifteen minute walk, or just take the tram 200m from our door.

name: Gezellige moderne woning vlakbij Gent
description:
Moderne, nieuwe woning nabij Gent. Op het gelijkvloers vind je de grote leefruimte bestaande uit salon, eetplaats en keuken.
De trap leidt je naar de eerste verdieping met de 3 slaapkamers en badkamer.
Op elke verdieping bevindt zich een apart toilet.
De woning heeft een voortuintje met carport aan en een achtertuin.
Ze is gelegen in een rustige buurt op en boogscheut van Gent centrum (op 3 km), vlot bereikbaar met openbaar vervoer en fiets.

The space
Er is een slaapkamer aanwezig met 1 dubbel bed en twee slaapkamers met telkens een dubbel bed en hoogslaper.

Guest access
Op 500m bevindt zich een tramhalte. Elke 6 minuten (overdag) of 20 minuten ('s avonds) heb je een tram naar Gent centrum (duur 20 min) of Station (duur 30 min). In de straat kan gratis geparkeerd worden. Onder de carport kan 1 auto staan.
neighborhood_overview: Rustige omgeving, ideaal huis om te verblijven met kinderen en toch vlakbij Gent centrum. Vlakbij zijn vele supermarkten te vinden alsook enkele winkels en restaurants/afhaalmogelijkheden.

name: Le Grand Bordeleau
description:
Enjoy a stay on board of 1952 barge with astonishing views on the old docks of Ghent. Everything you need for a waterside getaway on walking distance from the city centre.

The space
The former barge is converted into 2 luxury studios and one big loft. All three have their own private entrance and are fully equipped. Le grand bordeleau is the trendy loft. If necessary, the loft can be connected with one studio. Together they can be used by four persons, with two beds and 2 bathrooms. The loft is perfect for long term or business stays.

Guest access
Tea, nespresso and water included. Use of bikes possible on demand.
neighborhood_overview: The area used to be a busy harbour site. Nowadays most warehouses and remains of the harbour industry are converted into living and working spaces. The former harbour site is now the biggest protected city view of Ghent and is becoming an important tourist spot.
host_about:
Hello,
As I am a 'globe trotter', I allways like to meet new people and experience new  cultures. Gastronomy and design are my key words. If you want to share the same passions like I have? Just come and stay in my luxury 19th century loft!

name: Villa with citygarden  for WE getaway or LT-stay
description:
A charming villa that combines the best of both worlds. This recently renovated house offers city garden, private (free) parking space and all amenities to enjoy the best of both worlds. Close to the Ghent City centre and still far enough to enjoy the peace and quite of a detached house.
Ghent-Dampoort station is a 6 minute walk.
Ideal for a romantic getaway or Long term stay with sufficient room to unwind.
For long-term stay inquiries or expats please send DM via Airbnb.
neighborhood_overview: Just next to the beautiful Rozebroek park and cute Azalea Park, the house offers the opportunity to unwind. Make sure to visit the quaint Begijnhof, just 1 block away.
host_about:
A sucker for
sea-view and quiet spots that offer all amenities a modern place deserves.

name: Cosy Room Double Bed close to Dampoort train (1)
description:
In our house you’ll find a simple but clean and big room, located nearby the city centre (15 min. walk / 7 min. bus)

You can take the train to Dampoort train station, from where it's a 10 minute walk. Or you can safely park on the street (€3/day)

Inside the house you’ll find a shared kitchen and bathroom, coffee and water. The house has a little garden which is accessbile via the garage.

We’d like to welcome you with all our hart and make a little time for you and listen to your requests!

The space
Your room is located on the upper floor of our house next to the bathroom. There is water, coffee and a fridge available.

We also provide a guidebook with local tips from your host to make your stay the most comfortable we can :)

Guest access
You'll have access to your private room and shared kitchen, bathroom and garden.
BUS
The bus stop is located 5 minutes from the house and there will
host_about:
Hi, I’m sander. I’m a musician, and give workshops and teambuildings with music. I’m very excited to meet new people. As a host you can aspect from me a warm welcome. And a nice chat, you’re always welcome to do so. 

Coffee will be for free and you’ll always wil find a nice beer in the fridge.

name: Room w/ private bathroom - near train station
description:
Enjoy a beautiful, cozy room with a spacious private bathroom located on the top floor of our home - a recently renovated 1960s house in a calm street. Our home is located near the Sint-Pieters train station and is at walking distance of the city center.

The space
The bedroom consists of a double bed (180 x 200 cm), a bench, a clothing rack, a Nespresso machine and a TV with Netflix (not seen on the pictures as it was added afterwards).
The bathroom is accessible via the hall and consists of a shower, a sink and a toilet.
Both rooms are located on the 3rd floor of our house. You will have to use the main entrance and main hall and stairs for access.
The hall and stairs are the only places that will be shared with us. On your floor, you have complete privacy.

Other things to note
Please mind that we have an adorable cat named Billie. If you aren't fond of her, you can of course keep the door to both the bedroom and bathroom
neighborhood_overview:
The main train station 'Gent Sint-Pieters' is at 8 minutes walking distance. From there, you can easily take public transport to all parts of town.
From our house, the city center is located at approximately 20 minutes by foot or 8 minutes by tram (using the tram line 2, which stops at 2 minutes from the house).

name: Edville Penthouse
description:
Edville Penthouse is een lichtrijk appartement met 3 ruime slaapkamers en aangenaam terras met buitenbar.
De penthouse is voorzien van 2 badkamers en een apart toilet.
Alle ruimtes zijn voorzien van kwalitatieve en stijlvolle meubels.
Vloerverwarming verwarmt het gehele appartement.
Voorts is het appartement ook voorzien van alle benodigheden zoals beddengoed, handdoeken, vaatwasmachine, wasmachine en wasdroger.
U kan parkeren in de ondergrondse parkeer parking.
Gratis snelle WIFI + netflix.

Guest access
U kan parkeren in de ondergronds parking.
U kan ook gratis parkeren op straat aan het appartement.

Other things to note
Wij zullen u ontvangen bij aankomst.
Indien wij niet aanwezig zijn, zullen we de sleutel in de keybox plaatsen.
Wij voorzien alle informatie via mail en/of binnen in het appartement.
neighborhood_overview: Rustige buurt vlakbij het centrum van Gent.
host_about:
We are Edward and Daphné, while traveling for our job we got to know airbnb. We love the concept and always have stayed in lovely places and met friendly people.
In the villa of my grandfather we started our adventure by renting out some beds, now we have 2 great locations. One is for big groups up to 32 persons just 5km of the center of Ghent and the other location are studio's in de center of Ghent. We love to share on airbnb. We love to meet new people and are sure you will love your stay with us.
We are an easygoing young couple and can give you lot's of information about the region, especially Ghent. 
We are working in our own company "ed", a baby and interior design studio. Our life motto is "every accomplishment starts with a dream"

name: Trendy Apartment to Discover Belgium
description:
This clean and trendy apartment 2 bedroom apartment with terrace is perfect for leisure or for business stays if you need to be in or around Belgium. It is equipped with all the necessary amenities for you to enjoy (either short stay or medium stay). It has easy access to al nearby highways, a tram line that runs straight to the city centre of Ghent and this while being in a quiet neighbourhood. The apartment is also located close to a supermarket and there is free parking on the premises.

The space
The apartment is newly decorated and equipped with all the necessary amenities. It is equipped with floor heating thats always cosy and comfortable during those chilly winter nights.

Guest access
the whole apartment is for the guests
neighborhood_overview: Its located in the suburbs of Ghent with easy access to every highway that lead you to Brussels (40 min), Antwerp (40 min), Bruges (30 min), Courtrai (30 min)  and Ypres (40 min). The tram line that stops near the apartment brings you to the city centre in 20min or if you go by bike it takes you 15-20 min. Ghent EXPO is 5-10min drive and the technology park in Ghent is practically walking distance.
host_about:
Ghent is an awesome European City to visit, there is always something to do and to visit. Thats why I  would love to share my apartment with people who want to explore a medieval city with a touch of trendy.
I am self-employed at this moment and an everlasting student of knowledge and I hope we can meet during one of your stays.

name: Cozy apartment close to the city center.
description:
A beautiful cozy apartment located in de Muide, Ghent.
Perfect for a couple or two friends who wants to discover Ghent for the weekend or a longer period!

The space
Spacious apartment with artistic influences and earthy colors and lots of plants.

There is an open kitchen in the living room with lots of light. I have a big collection of photography books and you'll find art on the wall . There is one bedroom with a large double bed and a bathroom with bath/shower and 2 lavabos.

In the morning you can enjoy your coffee on the balcony.

Guest access
The closest train station "Gent Dampoort", you can have a nice walk along the old docks, the water to my apartment, only 25 minutes by foot or take bus 6 (behind the station) and go off at "Gent Muide Brug".

You can park your car in the street but you have to pay (on sunday it is free!) or park your car at the free parking space P+R Muide (Pauwstraat 11, 9000
neighborhood_overview: Just around the corner you have 'Kapitein zeppos park', This district park around the Houtdok has a sports square and playground. You can cycle or walk on the promenade and relax on the lowered quays or beach area. You can walk further alongside the water to the old docks and have a coffee at CUP. From there you can cross the bridge as well to go to the center! It is beautiful!
host_about: Hi, my name is Titus and I am a freelance photographer! I work for newspapers, advertising and I teach photography. I publish photobooks and make exhibitions.  I look forward to welcoming you!

name: BnB Renee - trendy apartment near station
description:
Recently renovated modern 2 bedroom apartment very close to trainstation Gent Sint-Pieters, city center, several musea (SMAK, STAM, MSK), nature park (citadelpark), delicious breakfast place, several restaurants, butcher, bakery, farmacist, small supermarkets,..
You will enjoy the location, neighbourhood and athmosphere of the (babyfriendly) apartment.
Please don't hesitate to contact me when you have any question or special request.

The space
The apartment is very spacious. The wooden floor gives a warm athmosphere.

Sun, light, warmth, modern furniture, a practical kitchen and bathroom with good equipment to prepare some breakfast, lunch or dinner (also salt, pepper, oil, sugar available).

Two bedrooms you can only dream of with comfortable desk-office. Good basis to work here for some days during conference or courses.

available: Towels, sheets, toiletpaper, free wifi, TV and digicorder.

Baby stuff on
host_about:
Hello, I'm an active and creative person of 37. I live in an art-nouveau characteristic house in Gentbrugge (part of Ghent). The B&B apartment is located 10 minutes from where we live, in the nice city of Ghent. 
I like to discover and try new things. My passion is meeting people. 
My device: do whatever makes you happy!

name: Furnished Expat flat centrum Ghent
description:
A spacious apartment for 5 people. Simply furnished and fully equipped kitchen and bathroom.
Ideal for a group of expatriate workers working in the port of Ghent. On the other hand, it can also be fun to discover Ghent with a group of friends.

The space
The flat has 3 bedrooms. 4 beds, 1 of which is a double bed. You can also use the sofa bed in the living room.
There is a small laundry room with washing machine, ironing board and drying rack.
The kitchen is equipped with a refrigerator, gas cooker, microwave. No freezer or dishwasher.
Wifi, TV set, HDMI cable, Apple TV with Netflix. (Login with own account). The bathroom and bedrooms are well supplied with bed linen, towels, dishcloths and cleaning materials.

Guest access
Zowel stadsbussen als regionale bussen. Tram en treinstation in de buurt. Zie voor meer info bij ‘De Lijn Gent’ en ‘NMBS Dampoort’

Other things to note
Wij voorzien geen park

name: Sfeervolle woonwagen in  stadstuin met zwemvijver
description:
Onze ruime woonwagen is een plaats van schoonheid en rust vlak bij het historische centrum van Gent. Perfect voor Glamping: prachtig ingericht met oog voor detail, alle basisvoorzieningen en een tikkeltje glamour. Je hebt het huisje op wielen helemaal voor jezelf. Het ligt verscholen tussen het groen achterin een sfeervolle stadstuin. Er is een klein terras. De zwemvijver en vuurplaats zijn niet privé, maar kunnen gebruikt worden op voorwaarde dat de rust rond het huis bewaard blijft.

The space
Als je houdt van gezelligheid, sfeer met een beetje bohémien zal je betoverd worden door deze bijzondere woonwagen. Verwacht je niet de luxe van een chique hotel en niet de stilte van een afgelegen bos, maar een unieke eigenzinnige plek in een rustige groene omgeving vlak bij een bruisende stad, dan ben je helemaal op de juiste plaats.

Guest access
Parkeren kan gratis naast het terrein.
Je kan met de trein aankomen in het station van Gentbrugge
neighborhood_overview: Gentbrugge is een levendige, relatief groene deelgemeente van Gent. De wijk ligt op een boogscheut van het historische centrum maar grenst ook aan het natuurgebied de Gentbrugse Meersen. Er zijn winkels, restaurants, cafeetjes op wandelafstand. Treinstation, tram en bus zijn vlakbij.

name: Lovely one bedroom apartment in the heart of Ghent
description:
Lovely newly-built one bedroom apartment in the heart of Ghent. Located in one of the main shopping avenues and within close walking distance of all the main cultural, entertainment and commercial hubs.

The apartment is located on the second floor. Even though it is located in the city centre, the neighbourhood is very peaceful and quiet, especially in the evening and during the night.

The apartment is perfect for a city-trip and expats looking to stay in Ghent for several weeks or months.

Other things to note
The Bulthaup kitchen is fully equipped and includes the following: induction cooktop, refrigerator with freezer compartment, oven/microwave combination, dish washer, Nespresso machine, traditional coffee machine (SMEG), water boiler (SMEG), toaster (SMEG), cutlery, glasses, … The kitchen is complete with crockery and kitchen utensils.

The apartment has a beautifully furnished modern living room with a large sofa, display ca
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in de Brabantdam, close to de Kouter, so it’s within very close walking distance of everything that Ghent has to offer.

name: DeLux City Apartment with lounge terras and BBQ
description:
Maison Drappier is a luxuriously finished one bedroom apartment on the ground floor of a renovated town house in the heart of Ghent. It has a fully equipped kitchen, a bathroom with a bath and shower function.
There is a adjacent city terrace with lounge chairs and a bbq so you can enjoy the peace and quiet when the weather is nice.
If you would like to rent it for 4 people, the sofa bed ensures a perfect sleep.
It can also be used for business purposes. There is a workspace for 2 people.

name: Studio Kalvermarkt.
description:
Welcome to Studio Kalvermarkt. A cozy and peaceful hangout spot on the top floor of our home.

Located nearby Portus Ganda, the city centre and railway station are just a stroll away. You'll find plenty of good food, coffee bars and shops just around the corner. We're happy to give you advice on where to go, what to do and make you feel at home.

See you soon,
Sofie, Arne & Sesam the Labradoodle

description: Relax and unwind in this peaceful, refined space. A cosy and stylish apartment decorated in colonial style, on walking distance from the train station. name: Studio Tzawel : private ensuite downtown Gent
description:
Deze vakantiewoning bevindt zich op het gelijkvloers van een huis uit de jaren 1890 in een rustige straat in het centrum van Gent. Op 75meter afstand is er al een eerste (en populair) restaurant, bovendien meer keuze op 350meter afstand in het Patershol.
De ruimte is groot (60m²) en er is een buitenplaats om fietsen en kayaks te plaatsen. Private toegang tot de studio. Enkel de gang is gedeeld met mij.

Guest access
NMBS-trein tot Gent-Sint-Pieters of Gent-Dampoort.

Flixbus tot Gent Dampoort.

De Lijn tot een halte nabij via tram of bus.

Other things to note
Leven mag in huis, raven niet. Vanaf 22u respect voor de buren.

name: Something Els, guestroom in the centre of the city
description:
Enjoy an extraordinary visit to our city of Ghent and stay in this spacious and cosy room. The room is situated at the second floor of a stilish old house. The medieval street is very quiet, with nearly no trafic. The bathroom is directly connected to the room. You can find coffee and tea in the room. An ideal spot to come to rest after an exciting day of city experience

The space
The room is 5 to 5 metres big. There is a coach, and table to eat at. Bed linen and bath linen is provided. On demand there is also a babybed and child's chair at your disposal, suitable for children up to 2 years.

Guest access
The house is on walking distance from the tram stop. There is a public parking place nearby. You can also park your car at the border of the city and come to the centre by shuttle.

Other things to note
You can enter the house independently. The key is for your disposition in a key box. Take care of the other hosts i
host_about:
Hallo, 
Ik woon in het centrum van Gent en vind het een plezier om mijn mooie burgerswoning te delen met tijdelijke bezoekers aan onze stad.  Ik woon zelf met mijn 2 jongvolwassen kinderen op het gelijkvloers en de eerste verdieping.  Op de tweede en de zolderverdieping hebben we een vakantieruimte ingericht.  Het is een mooi en ruim appartement voor 2 personen,  of voor een gezin met maximum 2 jonge kinderen.  We genieten van het internationale bezoek in ons huis.  Bezoekers geven zelf aan of ze zin hebben in een praatje.  We respecteren de privacy en je kan op eigen houtje de woning betreden en je weg vinden in het appartement.  
Van harte welkom.

name: Masterbedroom in monumentale Interbellum-Villa
description:
Uit deze charmante, unieke accommodatie wil je nooit meer weg. In een beschermde art-deco woning ligt deze kamer met private badkamer. Een uitstraling van weleer in combinatie te midden van rust, natuur EN stad. Als onderdeel van het bedrijvencentrum UR.zone kan je genieten van de extra faciliteiten : centrale keuken, authentiek salon, buitenzwembad (zomer), tuin. Voel je welkom ! Je kan aansluitend een werkplek, vergaderzaal of coachruimte huren in de co-working. (ontbijt apart bestellen)

The space
Dit is de master bedroom in een directeurswoning. Ze kijkt uit op de riante tuin met (onverwarmd) zwembad. De kamer is uitgerust dubbel bed, tafel met stoelen, kasten, open haard (indien gewenst / apart aan te vragen). De badkamer is vernieuwd en kijkt met een groot raam uit op de slaapkamer. Het toilet en de douche zijn nog old style.

Guest access

name: Charmant herenhuis voor kattenliefhebbers
description:
Beautiful townhouse in the center of Ghent with a super cozy, green city garden. Stylishly decorated. Near the water, in the beautiful neighborhood 'De Visserij'. Easily accessible by public transport (bus stop in front of the door), near Ghent Dampoort station.

The townhouse has three bedrooms (each with its own bathroom and toilet).

You'll share the garden of our beautiful house with our three cats. They are very cute and used to people, they won't bother you at all!

The space
Complete house, available for 6 people.

On the ground floor you can find a big hallway, a toilet and access to the kitchen and the living room. The big glass door in the kitchen gives access to the garden. We have great internet (Telenet wifi!) and Netflix on the television. We have a cozy stove (you can find wood in the garden shed).

On the first floor there is a laundry room, a bathroom (bad, toilet, shower) and a bedroom (for 2).

name: Spacious and bright room in the center of Ghent
description:
Located at the edge of the historical center, this is the ideal base for a Ghent visit. Almost all of the places to be or visit are within walking distance.

We'll be more than happy to help you get the Ghent experience that we've fallen in love with.

The space
Your private room covers the whole 3rd floor of our house and is therefore very bright and spacious. Besides the queen sized bed, you have a desk and a small sofa to relax in.

The bathroom is right down the stairs of your room at the second floor. It's spacious and has a toilet, bathtub, washing machine and dryer.
You can use our fully equipped kitchen as well: oven, gas stove, microwave, toaster, coffee machine, kettle, etc.

Guest access
If you arrive by train:
If you arrive at train station "Gent Dampoort": 1.3km / 17min walk
If you arrive at train station "Gent Sint-Pieters": take tram no. 1 to Gravensteen castle - 900m / 11min walk.

name: Charming room in central Gent
description: A spacefull, lightfull, cosy and large room in Gent. You have the bus stop to take bus 9 (goes to the station), tram 1 goes to the center (10min.) you can use a bike. All shops near by, swimming pool, nature Bourgoyen if you like to run. Sports, nature and nice shops near by.
neighborhood_overview: Bus stop 9 goes to the station. Tram  1 (flanders expo) Joseph Guisluin stop brings you to the center in no time (10 min.) we have an extra bike for you to use.  Nice shops, restaurants and sports accommodation near by. You share the house with 2 responsable, working, friendly guys (Gert and Jowie).
host_about:
Hi, I am a swim teacher, live guardian and French teacher in secondary school.
I live about 8 years in Gent. I love the concept of cohousing, meating new people and travelling.

description: This appartment is located right in the city center of the beautiful city of Ghent. It has 2 bedrooms: one with dubble size bed, one without bed, but plenty of space to put a blow up matrass there. In the large living room there is a sleeping couch for 2 persons. name: Private room with bathroom in Edgar Guesthouse
description:
Our cozy six-room guesthouse is located in the centre of Ghent.

The design of the classic room will definitely surprise you with its tactility, soft tones and the use of natural materials.

Each room features a king size bed, rain shower, coffee machine & waterboiler, desk, free wifi and air conditioning.

Edgar’s breakfast basket is optional (15 EUR/pp) and can be delivered at your room.
neighborhood_overview:
OUR NEIGHERBOURHOOD:

‘Rond Sint-Jacobs’ is one of the most lively areas in the city. At night it is the habitat of students and party-goers; during the day it is the playground for treasure hunters. In this shopping area with pleasant streets you will find original fashion, design and vintage.
